42b7(rgyud 'grel): sho gam gnas rnams dang // khang stong dang ni grams dang // zhes bya ba ni/ de dang dang ldan pa'i gnas su bsdad cing // gzugs mi gcig par snang ba'o// gnod sbyin gang rnams bla 'og dang // phyogs bzhi dang ni/ 
42b8(rgyud 'grel): mtshams rnams nas// zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de dang ldan pa ni// phyogs mtshams brgyad du gnas pa'o// gnod sbyin bye ba stong rnams ni/ rig sngags zhags pas bkug pa rnams// zhes bya ba ni/ stong phrag 
43a1(rgyud 'grel): de dang de yod pa// ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams// rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i zhags pas 'dren pa'o// rdza rnga dag ni brdungs nas su// la las rnga zlum dag ni brdungs// zhes bya ba ni/ sgra la 
43a2(rgyud 'grel): dga' ba'i gnod sbyin rnams bsam gyis mi khyab par snang ba'o// pi wang gling bu khar ba'i rnga// stobs chen dag ni sgra 'byin te// zhes bya ba ni/ tshan cig yang rol mo la dga' zhing // sems can rnams la 
43a3(rgyud 'grel): gnod par byed pa'o// rol mo'i sgra dbyangs sna tshogs dang / glu dang gar rnams byas nas su// zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams slu ba'o// dbang po zla ba chu lha dang / ba ra d+h+wa dza skye dgu'i bdag ces pa ni/ gnod sbyin
43a4(rgyud 'grel): gyi ded dpon sum cu rtsa gnyis su gnas shing // sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba dag go/ ma ldan pa dang kun tu ldan// mngon shes gangs can rdzogs pa dang // zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams yang de'i ster bcas shing // 
43a5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba'o// tsan dan dang ni 'dod mchog dang // mgul ba mdzes dang mgul mdzes dang // zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang sems can gyi don byas shing / rig sngags la 
43a6(rgyud 'grel): gus pa'o// skye dgu'i bla mar 'gyur ba dang / lha las byung ba'i ma ldan dang / zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi tshan de dang der ldan zhing // nam mkha' dang sa steng 'og tu rgyu ba'o// dri za sna tshogs de dang ni// mi rgyal rgyal ba 
43a7(rgyud 'grel): khyu mchog dang // zhes bya ba ni/ sde bo cher grags shing stobs dang ldan pa'o// de bzhin phung po lnga zhes bya// g.yer ma dang ni zhi zer dang // zhes bya ba ni/ nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa// yud tsam gyis stong gsum 
43a8(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa'o// nya lcibs dang ni ral gri bu// kun gnyis bshes dang grags 'dzin dang // zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po sde tshan de dang ldan pa/ ral gri bzhin du rdo ba'o// 'brog gnas dang ni yid bzangs dang / 
43b1(rgyud 'grel): khab sna dang ni ri sul dang // zhes bya ba ni/ sde bo che nyi shu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/ de rnams yang gzugs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'o// rnga 'dzin dang ni khab bzangs dag/ sde dang dpung dang bzhon pas byas// 
43b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ stobs dang ldan pa sde bo cher grags pa'o// lha dang klu dang dri za dang // gnod sbyin 'byung po lha ma yin// zhes bya ba ni/ gdon rigs mi cig pa lha'i gdon la sogs pa stong phrag brgyad cu'o// 
43b3(rgyud 'grel): nyin gsum pa'i smyo byed dang / de bzhin bzhi pa'i rims dag dang / zhes bya ba ni/ nad sna tshogs gtong zhing spro bar byed pa rnams yin te/ de rnams yang gzhan gyis mi thub pa stobs dang
43b4(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa'o/ 'jig rten 'tsha ba gang yin pa// gnod sbyin 'byung po ma rungs rnams// zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig yud tsam thang cig gis rgyu ba/ 
43b5(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa'o// phyogs bzhi nas ni bkug nas su// bcing ba lnga yis bsdams pa rnams// zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams la// ye shes lnga'i zhags pas 
43b6(rgyud 'grel): bcings pa'o// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan mnga' ru// thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad smras// zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis spyan sngar// gus par 
43b7(rgyud 'grel): byas nas zhus pa'o// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi 'joms pa la// dpa' ba/ skyes bu mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang 
43b8(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa/ dpe byad bzang pos sku la brgyan pa// sems can rnams la mnyam pa nyid du lta ba/ snying rje dang byams pas khyab pa/ thal mo sbyar ras phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// 
44a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyi zhabs la gus par phyag 'tshal te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la/ chos kyi rgyal srid mdzad pa'o// de dag gi mdun du rgyug pa/ 'byung 
44a2(rgyud 'grel): po gnod sbyin lus po che/ zhes bya ba ni/ che ba ri rab dang mnyam pa/ chung ba bas spu'i rtse mo tsam// de dang der ldan pa'i 'byung po rnams rgyu ba'o// lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa// rkang mangs dang ni rkang gcig 
44a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // zhes bya ba ni/ mda' dang gzhu dang ral gri mdung rnams thogs pa/ stong tshe gcig gi rkang pa yod pa/ rkang gcig ni gnyis spel nas rgyu ba'o// rkang bzhi pa dang rkang gnyis dang rkang pa bsgreng la
44a4(rgyud 'grel): spyig tsug dang // zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po yang spyi bo'i gtsug gis 'gro zhing / sems can rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o// de bzhin du rkang bzhi rkang gnyis kyang 'jigs par byed 
44a5(rgyud 'grel): po'o// lus mangs mgo bo gcig pa dang // lus gcig pa la mgo bzhi dang // zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs che zhing 'jigs su rung ba bzhin mi sdug pa rnams so// mig mangs po la lus byed dang // mig 
44a6(rgyud 'grel): gcig lto ni bcu gnyis dang // zhes bya ba ni/ rkang gcig lag gcig lus su snang zhing / lus de la mig mang po yod pa ste/ 'byung po gzhan yang lto ba ri bo lta bur gnas pa/ mang po bsdebs pa 
44a7(rgyud 'grel): mig gcig tu snang ba'o// bong bu rnga mo glang chen mgo/ lag pa bsgreng la mgo sdud dang // zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs mi'i gzugs la mgo bo sna tshogs su snang ba// rkang pa dang lag pa bsgreng bar byed 
44a8(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// mtshon cha'i so dang mtshon cha'i lag/ mtshon cha'i rkang pa srin po rnams// zhes bya ba ni/ de kun gyi yan lag dang ral gri dang / mda' gzhu dang mdung la sogs par snang ba'o// zangs kyi 
44b1(rgyud 'grel): skra dang zangs kyi so// zangs kyi mig dang zangs kyi lag ces bya ba ni/ shin tu dmar ba 'jigs su rung ba ste/ mtshon cha bzhin du snang ba'o// zangs kyi tho ba rkang pa dang / zangs kyi sna dang zangs kyi kha/ 
44b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ mtshon cha mi 'jigs pa 'dzin pa/ rkang pa yang tho ba'i tshul tu gnas pa'o// de bzhin du kha la sogs pa yang // zangs kyi sgra bzhin du snang ba'o// rkang lag kun tu 'bar ba dang // 
44b3(rgyud 'grel): mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams// zhes bya ba ni/ me bzhin du 'bar te/ des kyang mi la zhe sdang la sogs pa 'bar bar byed pa'o// skur zhar sba ba gsum yod pa/ mig mi sdug pa kha glel ba zhes bya ba ni/ 
44b4(rgyud 'grel): bong thung zhing lus po skur te/ de'i ske la lba ba gsum yod pa// lus po zha zhing kha gdangs pa/ mchu sngon por snang ba 'jigs pa'o// chu srin stag gi gzugs dang ni// gzugs mi sdug dang kha ral po 
44b5(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ me'i lus la mgo brnyan du yod pa/ kha gdangs shing mi sdug pa'o// mchu 'phyang po dang so yon po/ rab tu sdug pa'i khro zhir can// gdong pa yo ba/ de bzhin du mchu dang so yo ba'o// khro ba 
44b6(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing sems can la 'jigs par byed pa'o// gsus po tshe dang bum sna bo// rna 'phyangs po dang rna ba med ces bya ba ni/ gsus pa ri tsam snang ba// rna ba gos su gon pa/ rna ba bcas pa'i 'byung po
44b7(rgyud 'grel): rnams so// lag rings dang ni rnga ba ring // sna yi rtse dang lag rtse ring zhes bya ba na// lag pa brkyang pas dpag tshar brgyar slebs te/ snas lus khebs te glang po che'i sna dang 'dra ba// de bzhin du sor mo yang 
44b8(rgyud 'grel): ring ba'o// lus bskams lus ni ring ba dang // skra rings rab tu brgyan pa dang // zhes bya ba ni/ shin tu nag pa/ shing lpags gyon pa 'dra/ ring ba ni ring ba bas kyang ches ring ba lus rnams kyang skra ring ba brgyan pa'o// 
45a1(rgyud 'grel): rkang pa med pa phra ba dang / dri nga ba dang bum lto'o// zhes bya ba ni/ yan lag gi tshig rdog por yong ba/ rkang pa phra bas te/ dri mi zhim pa rnam pa/ gsus pa ri bo tsam yod pa'o// yan lag chu srin 'dra ba 
45a2(rgyud 'grel): dang / gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lto zhes bya ba ni/ lag pa dang rkang pa yang chu srin 'dra ste/ gzugs ring ba/ rked pa zhag pa/ nar por snang ba'o// gnam lto ba dang rna bo che/ gyen du brdzes sku rab tu dmar zhes 
45a3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sA yang 'khyil pa glang po che'i sna 'dra ba// khab kyi rtse mo dang 'dra ba'i spad mar zhing 'bar ba'o// mgo bo che la gzhu mgrin po// rked pa srur po bum lnga ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po la len gzhu bzhin 
45a4(rgyud 'grel): du rked pa skur bas te/ de bzhin du yan lag dang lus po rnams kyang skur ba'o// ri rab rtse mo brgal nas su// me 'dag gi ni char pa 'bebs zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid dang / stobs dang ldan zhing / 
45a5(rgyud 'grel): ri rab dang sa g.yo bar byed pa ma rungs pa'i char 'bebs pa'o// lho ni shing ri dang stong pa dang // sprin gyi tshogs kyi mdog 'dra ba zhes bya ba ni// la la gzugs bzang bar gnas pa/ gzhan rnams yang 
45a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin mi sdug pa'o// dung dang rnga chen rdza rnga dang // grul bumarda bran rnams kyi sgra// zhes bya ba ni/ sgra dang rol mo la dga' ba gar sna tshogs dang ldan pa'o// 'jigs pa'i sgrani rab tu 'byin// ming po che la 
45a7(rgyud 'grel): bung bu'i sgra zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi rtse mo nas gling bzhir thos pa'i sgra/ sgra des sems can 'jigs pa'o// nag po sngon po ser po dang / dmar ser me ltar dmar ser dang zhes bya ba ni/ bzhin mi sdug pa gzugs sna tshogs/ 
45a8(rgyud 'grel): snang ba/ bskal pa'i me'i 'od dang 'dra ba'i 'od zer snang ba'o// khab 'dra'i spu dang ral gri swa// dmar po'i khrag gis bskus pa rnams zhes bya ba ni/ shin tu rno ba lus dang mgo rnams la khyab pa// kha yang khrag gis bskus 
45b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// mi ro dag ni khyer nas su// za bzhin tu ni rnam par rgyug ces bya ba ni/ mi rnams la 'tshe bar byed cing srog 'phrog pa rnams yin te/ glags tshol zhing 'phrang kha sgugs pa rnams yin no// so rnon lag pa 
45b2(rgyud 'grel): dmar po dang / mchu ni khrag gis bskus pa dang zhes bya ba ni// mche ba ring ba/ mtshon 'dra ba ste/ sems can rnams kyis lag pa dmar por snang ba/ khrag 'thung ba la dga' ba'o// lus phyed dag ni zos pa dang // 
45b3(rgyud 'grel): mkhal ma snying dang nang grol gyis zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pas/ sha dang khrag la dga' ba dang / don snying lnga la dga' ba'o// snying pa shin tu bkang ba dang // byin pa dag ni za bzhin du/ 
45b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ mi rnams kyis ni srog phrogs nas don snying rnam pa lnga phyung nas za bar byed pa'o// mer mer po dang srog chags kyi/ rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrog ces bya ba ni/ byang chub sems chags su 
45b5(rgyud 'grel): mi ster bar za ba/ ma'i mngal nas gzi brjid 'phrog pa'o// keng rus kyi ni lus kyis su skye bo mang po skrag par byed ces bya ba ni/ lpags pa dang sha med pa dang rus par snang te/ de lta bu'i gzugs kyis kyang 'tshe bar 
45b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o// khrag gis rab tu bkang ba yi/ mi'i pags pa thogs nas su// zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams kyi khrag 'jib cing // mi'i pags pa gon pa'o// mi zad dug gis kun bkus te/ phyogs 
45b7(rgyud 'grel): phyogs dag tu rnam par rgyugs ces bya ba ni/ bsam pa dang / mthong ba dang reg pa dang / mche ba'i dug rnams bskus pa/ stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams rgyug pa'o// grong khyer rnams kyi sgo/ 
45b8(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang // khyim nas khyim du rnam par mthong zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la glags 'tshol ba/ grong dang grong khyer grong rdal tu rgyu ba'o// rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa rnams/ phyogs bzhi dag tu 'khrug par byed// 
46a1(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyi mdze dang po la mig la sogs pa nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi gtor ba'i bdag po'o// de ltar de la rgyal po yi// gdon dang 'jigs pa chen po gnas zhes bya ba ni/ 
46a2(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang 'byung po'i gdon de rnams 'dul ba'o// lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang // rig sngags zhags pas rab tu bsdams zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mo'i rig sngags kyis/ 'byung po 
46a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams rang dbang med par bkug pa'o// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa'akhyod la// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// zhes bya ba ni/ ma rigs pa la sogs pa nyon mongs pa 'dul ba la dpa' ba'o// skyes 
46a4(rgyud 'grel): buchen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang pos sul brgyan pa/ 'jig rten khams kyi sems can thams cad la mnyam pa nyid du byed pa'o// thal mo gyur nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba ni/ 
46a5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po rnams kyis kyang gsungs par phyag 'tshal te/ stong gsum gyi ches kyi rgyal srid mdzad pa'o// grong khyer grong dang yul 'khor dang / pho brang 'khor du rgyu ba dang / zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rgyu ba'i dus tshod ni/ 
46a6(rgyud 'grel): snga dro shar gyi phyogs na chu// nyi ma byed na lho nar+g+ha/ nyi ma smar nas nub kyi phyogs su rgyu/ nyi ma smar nas ma nub bar du byang gi phyogs nas rgyu/ nyi ma nub nas sa sros bar du shar lho mtshams su n+ya/ sred 'khor 
46a7(rgyud 'grel): nam byed bar du srin po'i phyogs nas rgyu/ nam byed skya rengs tshun chad nub byang phyogs nas rgyu/ skya rengs shar nas nam langs tshun chad byang shar mtshams nas rgyu/ de dag dus rgyu ba ni mchod phyir lhags kyang 
46a8(rgyud 'grel): 'tshe ba med/ chos grangs dag la chu ba rnams// de dag mi la 'tsho bar byed// chos gcig dang ni bcu gcig la/ shar gyi phyogs nas chu tshod bzhi'i bar du rgyu/ chos gnyis dang bcu gsum la lho'i phyogs
46b1(rgyud 'grel): nas chu tshod brgyad rku/ tshes gsum dang bcu gnyis la chu tshod bcu'i bar du rgyu/ srod 'khor tsam/ tshes bzhi dang bcu bzhi la nam phyed nas chu tshod drug byang gi phyogs nas rgyu/ tshes lnga dang bcu drug la ni nyi ma dros 
46b2(rgyud 'grel): nas shar lho mtshams nas chu tshod bdun tsA ba'o// chos drug dang dgul chu tshod sum cu zam pa lho nub mtshams nas sde dro nas rgyu'o// tshes bdun dang bcu tham pa'i dus su nub byang mtshams nas sde dro nas chu tshod 
46b3(rgyud 'grel): bco lnga la rgyu'o// tshes brgyad dang gnam stong la byang shar nas snga dro nas chu tshod bcu gnyis bar du rgyu'o// de dag ni 'byung po rgyu ba'i dus bstan pa'o// gnod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'phrog pa// snying rje med cing khrag 'thung
46b4(rgyud 'grel): ba zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la 'che bar byed cing srog 'phrog pa ste/ 'byung po de rnams sha dang khrag la dga' ba'o// lus chen 'jigs pa chen po s+ho/ stobs po che la sgra yang che zhes bya ba ni/ lus ni ri rab 
46b5(rgyud 'grel): dang mnyam pa/ stobs kyis ni ri rab skul ba/ skad yang drag po'i tshul du snang ba'o// mgrin bcu po la mig stong po// gdon chen mig ni dmar po rnams zhes bya ba ni/ mgo re re la mig brgya brgya yod pa ste/ mig de
46b6(rgyud 'grel): yang dmar por snang zhing 'jigs su rung ba'o// 'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste/ lag na mtshon thogs rab tu 'jigs zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin ma rungs pa mang por snang zhing / ral gri la sogs pa'i mtshon 
46b7(rgyud 'grel): cha mang po thogs pa'o// sbrul gyi pags pa thogs pa dang / lag bzhi lag na sgron me thogs zhes bya ba ni/ dug sbrul gyi pags pa gon po/ mi gsal ba gsal bar byed pa kha nas me 'bar zhing 'jigs 
46b8(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa'o// lag na mtshon thogs dbyig pa thogs// rdo rje'i mdung rtse lag na thogs zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po me rungs pa rnams kyang / lag na mtshon sna tshogs thogs shing / 'jigs su rungs pa'o// 
47a1(rgyud 'grel): / rab tu drag pa'i dmag rgal nas// phyogs bcu kun tu skrag par byed ces bya ba ni/ dpung mang po dang ldan zhing phyogs bcu dag tu 'khod pa ste// de dag gis kyang sems can rnams la 'jigs 
47a2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang skrag par byed pa'o// sdang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa yi/ gsang ba po ni dang kun yang zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la sdang ba/ rgya cher gnod pa skyel ba'o// mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu// skyes pa/ 
47a3(rgyud 'grel): bud med gzhan yang 'dzin ces bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi mi rnams la 'byung po de rnams kyis 'tsho bar byas pa'o// sha khrag dron mor bcas pa la/ rnam par 'khrul cing 'dod pa'i gzugs zhes bya ba ni/ mi 
47a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis srog gcod cing sha dang khrag la dga' ba'o// seng ge dang ni stag dang rta// ma he ba glang bong bu rnga zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs mi gcig pa byol song rnams kyi gzugs su sprul pa'o// glang po che ya 
47a5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs 'dra dang // dom dang gzigs dang spyang gi dang // zhes bya ba ni/ de dang der ldan pa'i gzugs su snang zhing / sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa'o// khyi dang wa dang ra dag dang // byi la byi ba spre'u 
47a6(rgyud 'grel): gzugs zhes bya ba ni/ gnod pa skyel ba'i dus su gcan gzan gyi gzugs su sprul pa'o// bas dang phag dang bsre mong dang // zhwa dang rus sbal dag gi gzugs zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs kyang sna tshogs su 
47a7(rgyud 'grel): snang ba// rmi lam yang de bzhin du snang ba'o// kha cig dag ni sram gyi gzugs// khwa deng 'ug pa khu byug dang / zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i gzugs su snang zhing gnod pa cher skyel ba'o// bya rgod khra dang nya ming 
47a8(rgyud 'grel): bcas// rma bya dang pa thi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ de'i gzugs su ston cing / skad mi gcig pa mang po 'don pa'o// khrung khrung dang ni bya rnams dang // kha cig bya gag gzugs rnams su// zhes bya ba ni/ 
47b1(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs su rung ba ma rungs pa rnams yin te/ ltas dang rmi lam ngan par byed pa'o// gnod sbyin rnams ni mi yis mthong // 'dab bzangs bya yi tshul gyis kyang zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs
47b2(rgyud 'grel): ston pa/ sems can rnams la skrag par byed pa'o// skye bo mang po skrag par byed cing bya ba ni/ skyes pa bud med byis pa rnams la skrag par byed pa'o// kha cig ni mi yi mgo can la// lus ni bya gag pung pa/ 
47b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dra// zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs su rung ba'i 'byung po rnams kyang / mi'i mgo can la byol song gi lus so// kha cig mtshon gyis rab tu 'tshe// lus dang bral ba nyid du snang zhes bya ba ni/ sna tshogs mtshon 
47b4(rgyud 'grel): gyis 'tshe zhing / khrag khrug la dga' ba'o// rnam par 'khrugs shing 'dod la mos// rgyu ma'i 'phreng bas rab tu dkris zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la dga' zhing sems 'khrugs par
47b5(rgyud 'grel): byed pa ste/ yan lag mi'i rgyu ma'i phreng bas brgyan pa'o// rtse gsum mdung gis rab 'debs shing // srog chags rnams la gnod par byed ces bya ba ni// 'jigs su rung ba'i 'byung po de dag yang
47b6(rgyud 'grel): snying rje dang bral ba'o// mi zad pa'i dbugs 'byin cing // skye dgu 'di dag skrag par byed ces bya ba ni/ ske ba che zhing skad che ba ste/ sgra des sems can rnams klag pa'o// srog chags rgyud rnams 
47b7(rgyud 'grel): ji snyed par// sna tshogs kyi ni gzugs su snang zhes bya ba ni/ nya la sogs pa'i sems can gyi gzugs su snang zhing / gzugs mi gcig pa mang po snang ba'o// kha cig cig dag ni ri yang thogs// 
47b8(rgyud 'grel): lal ral gri 'khor lo thogs zhes bya ba ni/ stobs dang ldan zhing ri rab thegs par nus pa/ mtshon rnon pos 'tsho bar byed pa'o// grangs ni brgya phrag stong rnams te// dbyug pas bsdigs shing kha dog 
48a1(rgyud 'grel): drag po zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams sde chen por gnas shing sems can rnams la chad pa chen po gcod pa'o// mig chung pa la bzhin mi sdug/ srin po'i so ni rno ba dang / zhes bya ba ni/ bzhin mi sdug pa/ 
48a2(rgyud 'grel): kha dang mo rnams yod pa'o// sna dang rna ba gcad pa dang // lce gcad gdong ni gnyer ma can zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs ngan par snang zhing / dbang po rnams ma tshang ba'o// rkang lag dang ni gtubs pa dang // mgo bo 
48a3(rgyud 'grel): gdud pa'i srin po rnams zhes bya ba ni/ mgo bo med par brang nas gdong ba snang bas te/ tshigs rnams la yang gdong pa snang ba'o// skabs ni rab tu tshol bar byed/ sdig pa can rnams gzi brjid 'phrog ces 
48a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la glags tshol zhing / sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi dpal 'phrog pa'o// mi yi lus rnams dag la ni/ rab tu phra ba'i gdon du snang zhes bya ba ni/ mi yi lus la
48a5(rgyud 'grel): zhugs nas mi dga'i sems dang / lteb pa'i sems dang ldan par byed pa'o// sgra yi bar dang nad rnams dang // de bzhin rma yi kha rnams su zhes bya ba ni/ ba spu'i bar du 'dzin cing / rma med pa rma yod par byas
48a6(rgyud 'grel): te/ rma'i nang rul bar byas nas/ phyi sums nas na ngan tshwa chen po dang ldan par byed do// lhags pa de dag thams cad kyang // rig sngags zhags pas rab tu drangs zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi
48a7(rgyud 'grel): dmod mo'i zhags pas ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams bcings pa'o// phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la// zhes bya ba ni/ de dang der ldan pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang // yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la 
48a8(rgyud 'grel): gus par phyag 'tshal lo// thal mo sbyar nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba ni/ stod gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten khams chos srid du mdzad cing / stong gsum gyi chos kyis
48b1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal por snang ba'o// ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams na 'dod yon lnga la spyod pa bzhin/ 'byung po rnams kyang 'dod pa'i yon tan lngas spyod do// ji ltar spyod ce na/ gzugs mthong bas 
48b2(rgyud 'grel): mdangs 'phrog pa dang / sgra sran po thos nas 'dzin pa dang / dri zhim po tshor nas 'dzin pa dang ro zhim po myangs nas 'dzin pa dang / lus rig pas 'dzin pa dang / de dag kyang gang na gnas she na/ ri rab 'khor yug la 
48b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas nas 'dzin pa'o// de bzhin 'khor ra 'khor yug dang / bya rgod phung po gshol 'da' 'dzin ces bya ba ni/ dbus kyi ri bo mchog rab nas/ phyi'i 'khor ra 'khor yug la thug pa'i ri bo chen po la
48b4(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams so// de bzhin du bya rgod phung po dang / ri bdun la sogs pa'o// spos dang ldan dang gangs kyi ri/ sna tshogs sde dang par+N+Na ba zhes bya ba ni/ de yang 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas
48b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ri rnams so// na la da yi ri gnyis dang / dpal gyi ri yi rtse mo ni zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam bu'i gling gi lho phyogs na gnas pa'o// gang de gshin tu mthong 'phags dang // ri bo de dag kun la yang
48b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin rnams 'tshegs shing / 'byung po'i tshogs rnams 'dul ba'o// lha dang drang srong gang gnas pa// de dag thams cad mi dga' zhing zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen po rab tu 'joms
48b7(rgyud 'grel): ma'i gzi brjid kyis/ ri rab de rnams na gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams yid mi dga' ba'o// 'jigs pa'i yid kyis mya ngan byed// bye ba stong gi lha dag dang // bye ba phrag brgya'i lha dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig 
48b8(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ 'dar zhid kyi hud ces sgra 'byin pa'o// lha yi bu mo skal chen dang / thal mo rab tu sbyar bar byed ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'jigs pas gus par sangs rgyas 
49a1(rgyud 'grel): la phyag 'tshal lo// thag bzangs ris dang sgra gcan dang // tshim par byed pa'ang der phyin to zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po la sogs pa yang / rig sngags kyi dmod mos bkug ste/ gus par
49a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas la 'dud pa'o// lha min bye ba phrag stong dang / lha min bye ba phrag brgya dang zhes bya ba ni/ de yang lha ma yin gyi grangs/ 'byung po la gtogs pa rnams so// de dag bu mo 'phrul ldan pa// mang po kun kyang thal mo/ 
49a3(rgyud 'grel): sbyar zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i bu mo la sogs pa yang / rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa'o// rab tu gnas dang rgya mtsho dang zhes bya ba ni/ phyi'i rgya mtsho la gnas pa dang // 
49a4(rgyud 'grel): sa 'og dang nam mkha' la rgyu zhing // ma rungs pa'i klu dang sa bdag rnams dang / rigs bzhir gnas shing phyogs ba ru dag tu 'khod pa'o// klu yi rgyal po gzi can dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa rim pa bdun gyi 'og na 
49a5(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ste/ de'i 'khor sha za dang 'byung po rnams yod de/ mi'i dri tshor ba tsam gyis mdangs 'phrog pa'o// klu'i gnod pa'i mtshan nyid bstan pa'o// klu yi rgyal po ma gros pa dang / dga' bo nye dga' gnyis po dang zhes// / 
49a6(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du/ klu'i rgyal po de rnams kyis kyang sangs rgyas kyi drung du 'khod pa'o// rdo rje blo gros pag shu dang // gang dag dga' bo srin du mtsho zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyang mtsho ma gros pa la 
49a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing / gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas par rgyu ba'o// bya yi rgyal po 'dab bzangs dang / rgya mtsho chen po 'khrugs byed dang zhes bya ba ni/ de'i rgya mtsho gting na gnas pa rnams yin te// de rnams sangs/ 
49a8(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi drung du 'khod pa'o// stong phrag bye ba'i klu rnams dang // bye ba brgya yi klu dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyi 'khor du bcas pas bdag gru dang bcas pa rnams so// de dag bu mo skal chen 
49b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams// thal mo rab tu sbyar bar byed ces bya ba ni/ klu'i bu mo de yang grangs de dang ldan par gnas shing / sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa'o// nyi ma zla ba gnyi ga yang // skar ma'i 'khor gyis yongs su 
49b2(rgyud 'grel): bskor zhes bya ba ni/ de yang bar snang du rgyu zhing // rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'khod pa'o// gser gyi me tog yan lag na// ma ga d+ha na 'jigs byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ de yang gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams// 
49b3(rgyud 'grel): 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas shing / rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'khod pa'o// gsol ba'i tha na mi thod can// ko sa lan rab tu dkar zhes bya ba ni/ yul ma ga d+han gnas shing / stong gsum rgyu ba'o// 
49b4(rgyud 'grel): bzang po'i yul na khab spunan// gyad kyi yul na grags pa 'dzin/ ces bya ba ni/ de yang 'dzam bu'i gling gi nub phyogs su gnas shing / sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed pa'o// rje 'dzin pa 
49b5(rgyud 'grel): dang skrag byed pa/ d+ha skye ba ni mig dmar gnas zhes bya ba ni// 'byung po'i gnas de dang ldan pa ni/ sems can la gnod par byed par grags pa'o// srung byed pa na ser skya ste/ sems dpa' na ni mig ser po// 
49b6(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon gnas de na gnas shing / skad gcig mas thams cad rgyu ba'o// be'u pan na bum pa'i lto// dga' ba'i yul na ring por skyes zhes bya ba ni/ gnas de dang ldan zhing gling 
49b7(rgyud 'grel): babazhi ri rab dang bcas pa la rgyu ba'o// ba lang 'dzin na rab tu 'joms// dud yul na ni nyi ma'i grogs zhes bya ba ni/ gnas de dang ldan zhing sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa'o// ljongs chen rnams kyi gnod sbyin ni// 
49b8(rgyud 'grel): brjod pa bcu drug de dag la zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po gnas can du gnas pa// grags pa dang ldan pa// rig sngags kyi zhags pas 'drin pa'o// lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin che// chos skyong rab tu dkar ba dang zhes bya ba ni// 
50a1(rgyud 'grel): ri rab rtse mo la gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba'o// ser skya rab mdzes khyab 'jug dang // bum lto gsus pa gsum po dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de rnams yang ri rab kyi khong song lto ngos na/ 
50a2(rgyud 'grel): gnas shing // dge ba'i rtsa ba la gnod par byed pa'o// chu srin bden pa 'chang ba dang / rnga ldan rgyal ba khru mchog dang zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyang lho'i 'dzam bu'i gling na gnas shing / gling bzhi ri rab dang bcas par gyu 
50a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// gnod sbyin chen po dbang phyug che// lag pa bzhin can stobs po che zhes bya ba ni/ ti se'i gangs la gnas shing / sems can rnams la mchod par 'os pa'o// sde pa rab tu 'dul ba ni// mthu bo che la
50a4(rgyud 'grel): stobs po che zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de dang der ldan pa ni/ stong gsum rgyud de rig sngags kyi zhags pas 'dren pa'o// gshin rje gshin rje'i pho nya dang / bdud rnams sde dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs 
50a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gshin rje'i pho nya mo dang / bdud kyi lha rnams yang 'dren pa'o// gnod sbyin bye ba'i g.yog 'chang ba/ gnod sbyin de ming 'phrog po yin zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi mi rnams la gnod pa skyel zhing gzi brjid
50a6(rgyud 'grel): dang 'od 'phrog pa'o// shA ri ta ni sder b.rus dang / ri yi bu mo gnod sbyin ma zhes bya ba ni/ de yang gzi brjid che zhing sa la gnas pa'o// gzi brjid chen mo 'jigs pa'i gzugs// 'phrog mo zhes kyang grags 
50a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin srin mor grags pa dang / mi'i mngal nas bu 'phrog pa'o// gdol pa mo ni gtum mo yang // bu rnams lnga brgyas bskor ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams// 
50a8(rgyud 'grel): bu lnga brgya dang ldan pa'o// mi sdug nag po karka te// pad+ma dang ni pad+ma can zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin mo de rnams yang / rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdod par mi nus te/ sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar 'khod pa'o// 
50b1(rgyud 'grel): me dog so dang sa ga dang // srin mo bong bu'i sna can dang zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo de rnams lho phyogs na gnas shing sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o// tsan dan dang ni khyab 'jug len/ seng ge ser skya dmar ser po/ 
50b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ de dag ni gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon du gnas pa/ byis pa'i gdon bco lnga'i gtso bo rnams so// glang po klu yi so can dang // ri shes drag po'i mche ba can zhes bya ba ni/ de dang de ldan zhing sems can rnams 
50b3(rgyud 'grel): la gnod par byed pa'o// srin mo mo bzangs yod pa dang / tshangs pas len dang khyab 'jug len zhes bya ba ni/ ming der grags pa sems can la gnod pa// skad gcig mas gling bzhir rgyu ba'o// gnod sbyin ha la ha la dang / 
50b4(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin rnam pa'i mchu can dag ces bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin 'di dag yang / lung lo tsun gyi pho brang du gnas shing // rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor du gnas pa'o// mdung dang mda' gzhu kuni thogs shing // maM rta ba lang 
50b5(rgyud 'grel): ri dgas zhes bya ba ni/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs shing / sems can rnams la gnod pa byed pa'o// za zhing 'tshe ba de dag ni/ phyogs rnams kun tu rgyug cing 'dor zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la glags 
50b6(rgyud 'grel): tshol zhing srog 'phrog pa rnams so// sa 'di rab tu g.yo bar byed// nags tshal rnams kyang rab tu skems zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab 'gul bar byed cing / rgya mtsho yang skems par byed pa'o// ri rnams kun yang 
50b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yo bar byed// skye dgu 'di dag 'tshe byed cing zhes bya ba ni/ tshe'i bar chod byed sems can rnams la 'jigs skrag byed pa'o// phan tshun nas ni 'dug pa dag/ rig sngags kyis ni drangs nas lhags zhes 
50b8(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ de dang der ldan pa'i 'byung po rnams la/ rig sngags kyi bcing ba lnga dmod mo'i zhags pas bsdams pa'o// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la/ phyag 'tshal skyes bu mchog khyod la zhes bya ba ni/ 
51a1(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang / 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru/ gus pas phyag 'tshal nas bstod pa'o// thal mo sbyang nas phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen 
51a2(rgyud 'grel): po'i chos srid mdzad cing / dang pa'i chos kyis rgyal po la gus par phyag 'tshal ba'o// 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan snga ru// gus pas phyag 'tshal bskyod pa'o// zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po rnams kyi ma mo 
51a3(rgyud 'grel): rang rang gi sgo nas// chos kyi rgyal po la zhu ba phul ba'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung pos smras pa'i don de gnas so// rgyal po chen po rnam thos bus// 'jig rten mgon la 'di skad gsol// zhes bya ba ni/ yang 
51a4(rgyud 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la// rgyal po chen po rnam thos sras kyis zhus pa'o// bdag gi phyogs cha byang phyogs su// rgyal po'i gnas su sprul pa ni zhes bya ba ni/ ri rab kyi byang phyogs na mnga' 
51a5(rgyud 'grel): mdzad cing / byang phyogs skyong bar byed pa'o// lcang lo ldan pa yid du mchi/ de bas bdag gi lhung lo'i bdag ces bya ba ni/ lhan sdug cing mdzes par snang ba'o// yid du 'ong bar gnas so// rgyal po'i pho brang 
51a6(rgyud 'grel): lcang lo can// lha rnams kun gyis bsam par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ las kyis lhas byin gyis brlabs pa/ rin po che'i gzhal yas khang du snang ba'o// phyir shin tu mthon po can// rin chen kun gyis brgyan
51a7(rgyud 'grel): pa lags zhes bya ba ni/ rin po che bdun las byas pa/ rgya phibs dang ldan pa/ bdun thog yod pa'o// 'phang du dpag tshad bcu drug ste/ gser gyi rgyu las bgyis pa lags zhes bya ba ni thog re re la dpag 
51a8(rgyud 'grel): tshad bcu drug bcu drug ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyi 'phra byas pa'o// phyogs bzhi lcog na re re la'ang // gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje dag ces bya ba ni/ sgo bzhi dang ldan pa phyogs re re nas srung mar snang ba'o// 
51b1(rgyud 'grel): kun nas kun tu rnam par 'gyur/ lag na mtshon cha lags par sprul zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin po mo mang po gnas shing / mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs pa'o// rgyal po'i pho brang de yi sgo/ bzhi pa bstod pa 
51b2(rgyud 'grel): bgyis pa ni zhes bya ba ni/ ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes pa/ rgyan rnam bzhis lha na sdug pa'o// gcig ni gser las bgyis pa'i sgo// gnyis pa dngul bgyis pa lags// zhes bya ba ni/ thog re re la yang spro bzhi 
51b3(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang ldan pa'o// gsum pa shel gyi sgo mo lags// bzhi pa gser gyis rnam par spras zhes bya ba ni/ rim pa bzhin du rin po che rnams kyis byas pa'o// grong khyer de yi nang dag na// skyed mos tshal gyi 
51b4(rgyud 'grel): me tog rgyas zhes bya ba ni/ rdzing bu dang / me tog gi ra ba chu las skyes pa dang / thang las skyes pas brgyan pa'o// de yi nang na gzhal med khang // rin chen sna bdun sna tshogs mchis zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin po 
51b5(rgyud 'grel): rnams spyod pa byed pa'i gzhal yas khang snang ba'o// rin chen sna tshogs sngon shing dang / bya bran sna tshogs skad kyang 'byin ces bya ba ni/ de'i skyed mos tshal dang rdzing bur/ khrung khrung dang khru byug la sogs pa 
51b6(rgyud 'grel): bya sna tshogs kyi skad kyis mdzes pa'o// me tog sna tshogs legs par bkram// sna tshogs spos kyi byug pas legs zhes bya ba ni/ chu dang thad las skyes pa'i me tog ku mu ta dang put+tA ri ka la sogs pas 
51b7(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa// yan lag brgyad dang sbyar ba'i pog phor dang ldan pa'o// gnod sbyin mo ni 'joms ma dang // klu dang rol mos rab tu brgyan ces bya ba ni/ lta na sdug pa rgyags ma dang ldan pa sha sngags rnams kyis/ 
51b8(rgyud 'grel): rol mo sna tshogs la spyod pa'o// dpal gyi dam pa nyams su myong // der ni 'byung po'i dkyil 'khor der zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga phun sum tshogs pa de rnams la spyod pa'o// gang 
52a1(rgyud 'grel): dag 'khor zhing mchis pa dag/ rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ bzhin nor bu bzhin du 'dod pa gang yang 'byung ba'o// chos 'tshal ba dang chos spyod pa zhes bya ba ni/ 
52a2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i bka' nyan nas// mi la sogs pa sems can gang la yang gnod pa mi skyel cing sdom pa gsum la gnas pa'o// srogs chags rnams la 'tshe mi bgyid// zas dang skom gyis mi
52a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bral te zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi sems can rnams la dga' zhing / byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa'o// skye dgu mi zad gzhan dag ni/ longs spyod chen por 'tshal bgyid ring zhes bya ba ni/ mi'i tshogs/ 
52a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams la phrad par dga' zhing // phun sum tshogs par byas nas skyong bar byed pa'o// phyogs bzhi kun tu rnam par lta// grong khyer sgo gam g.yo ba dang // zhes bya ba ni/ mi'i grong khyer gyi phyogs bzhi nas 
52a5(rgyud 'grel): srung zhing / de rnams mtho bar dga' ba'o// bzang shing ra ba nags tshal na// gnod sbyin srin po 'byung po'i tshogs zhes bya ba ni/ gang dang gang du gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams la rig sngags 'di'i dmod
52a6(rgyud 'grel): mos 'khod pa'o// bye ba stong phrag brgya mchis pa// de dag thams cad mdo sde yi// zhags pas drangs te klag par bgyi zhes bya ba ni/ gang yang rung ba gnod pa rnams la// rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i 
52a7(rgyud 'grel): zhags pas 'dul bar byed pa'o// rgyal po'i pho brang dbus na ni/ chos kyi rgyal po gnas 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dbus su// dmigs pa med pa'i pho brang snang ba'o// bsil
52a8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i rdzing bus bskor ba ste/ tsan dan nags kyis 'khor ba lags// zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la bsil bar byed pa'i ye shes kyis bskor zhing / byams pa dang snying rje'i nags tshal gyis 
52b1(rgyud 'grel): bskor ba'o// kun nas dpag tshad drag ru ste/ khang pa brtsegs pa sbal pa dag ces bya ba ni/ sems gyi zhal yas khang du snang zhing yid bzhin nor bu lta bu'o// gcig ni gser las bgyis pa ste/ 
52b2(rgyud 'grel): gnyis ni dngul las bgyid pa lags// zhes bya ba ni/ phyi nang gnyis su med par// rin po che gser dngul las byas pa'o// gsum pa bai DUr+ya las bgyid// bzhi pa gtsung dang shel gyi rgya
52b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ chos mi 'gyur bar snang bas bai DUr+ya ste/ phyi nang gnyis su med par gsal ba ni shel lta bu'o// lnga pa mu tig dmar po ste/ drug pa rdo yi snying po lags zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje pha la ma 
52b4(rgyud 'grel): las byas pa'i seng ge'i khas mu tig gi dra ba'i phreng bas ste// de yang mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa'o// bdun pa spug las bgyis pas te// brgyad pa 
52b5(rgyud 'grel): rin chen bdun las bgyis zhes bya ba ni/ rin chen dra ba dang dra ba'i yon tan gyis brgyan pa'o// bud med stong phrag brgya dag dang / de dag re re kun na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ shes rab kyi rang bzhin gnyis su 
52b6(rgyud 'grel): med pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa'o// lha ba lhub sna tshogs mchog dag dang // cha byad sna tshogs mang po sa brgyan ces bya ba ni/ tshad med pa bzhi'i rgyan gyis brgyan cing mdzes pa'o// glu dang // 
52b7(rgyud 'grel): rol mo sna tshogs dang // bzo yi gnas la mkhas pa mchis zhes bya ba ni/ zag pa zad pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing / sems can rnams kyi las 'joms par byed pa la mkhas pa'o// de lta'o// 
52b8(rgyud 'grel): rab tu dga' ba yis// bde zhing tshim pa'i yad du 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag pa'i ye shes dang ldan zhing bde bar gnas pa'o// de na bdag gi rgun skyems dang // 'dod pa bdag gis rab 
53a1(rgyud 'grel): myong bas zhes bya ba ni/ de yang 'byung po la sogs pa'i 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la spyod cing / 'dod pa'i zhags pas brlings pa'o// bdag gi 'khor rnams 'phyan bgyid cing // 
53a2(rgyud 'grel): phyogs bcu dag tu 'jigs pa skyed ces bya ba ni// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i 'khor tshan cig yang / sdig la dga' bas sems can la 'jigs skrag byed pa'o// bud med dag dang skyes pa dang // 
53a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin khye'u bu mo dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid 'phrog pa she dag go/ mngal na gnas pa 'jigs par bgyid// dud 'gro'i skye gnas gtogs pa la'ang 'chi zhes bya ba ni/ mer mer po dang nur nur po rnams
53a4(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog cing // dud 'gro rnams kyi srog 'phrog pa'o// skar ma dag dang nyi zla dang // gtun pa'i gza' rnams gnod par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ zla ba nyi ma mi snang bar byas shing // bza' ba dang btung ba rnams 'phrog
53a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// lo thog sa bon 'bras bu dang / me tog sman dang skom pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang dus ma yin pa'i rlung dang ser ba gtong ba'o// mi rnams kyi ni dpal 'phrog cing // mthon po
53a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyang dma' bar bgyid ces bya ba ni/ gzi brjid phun sum tshogs pa 'phrog par byed pa/ phyug po ltogs por gtong ba dag go/ 'jig rten dag na nongs pa rnams/ dmag dang thab mo sha nyer dang 
53a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ khrag khrug la dga' bar byed pa'am/ mi'i 'jig rten gyi sems rnam par byed pa'o// tshig gam zhig gam bsad bya ba// de kun 'byung po rnam par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ khrag khrug la sman ma 
53a8(rgyud 'grel): byas shing // ma rnams kyi srog 'phrog pa'o// sred cing stor bar bgyid pa dang // bzlog par bgyid cing rgod par byed ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams bzung nas/ zas dang skom yang mi 'ju cing 
53b1(rgyud 'grel): bzlog te/ sred pa ni nad sna tshogs gtong zhing sems yang stor bar byed pa'o// res 'ga' yang sems spyong bar byed pa'o// byed pa rgod pa'o// 'jigs par byed cing lta bar bgyid// dgrar 'gyur ba 
53b2(rgyud 'grel): yang ston par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ skyes pa bud med khye'u bu mo rnams la/ rims dang yams nad kyis btab cing / 'jigs skrag byed cing sgrub 'chol smras pa'o// lta ba ni dran par stor zhing nam mkha' 
53b3(rgyud 'grel): dang sa gzhi la lta ba rnams te/ sems mi dga' bar byas nas du ba'i sgra 'byin pa'o// sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong bar bgyid/ zhal ba dag la gnod par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i rmi lam 
53b4(rgyud 'grel): dang / mi dge ba'i lhas ston te/ skyes pa la mor skur cing gnod la/ bud med la por sbyar cing gnod pa'o// sgonas se skol sgra 'byung zhing // mi dran rjed de za bar bgyid ces bya ba ni/ grong dang grong khyer 
53b5(rgyud 'grel): du rgyu zhing / se gol tsam gyis khrag khrug byed do// khrag khrug gi sman mas za ba dang 'thung bar byed pa'o// mdza' bo gnyen bshes gzugs dag tu// dga' zhing ska ma mchid smra bar bgyid ces bya ba ni/ 
53b6(rgyud 'grel): tshe 'di dang phyi ma yang / mdza' bo dang gnyen shes su skyes shing mi de la gnod par byed pa'o// bu mo sdug gu'i gzugs dag tu// 'dod la spyod pa dga' bar bgyid ces bya ba ni/ mdzes sdug bu mo'i 
53b7(rgyud 'grel): gzugs su byas nas/ byang chub sems dang tshe 'phrog ma'o// nyi ma skar ma'i gzugs dang ni/ zla bo'i gzugs su gda' bar bgyid ces bya ba ni/ rmi lam dang ltas la yang de lta bu'i rma ba'o// 
53b8(rgyud 'grel): rlung dang skar mda'i rtse gzugs su/ de la gnod par de dag gda' zhes bya ba ni/ phyugs chen por gyur cing / nam mkha' nas 'brug sgra dang glog babs te/ bar snang la 'od chen po snang ba'o// skar 
54a1(rgyud 'grel): ma'i tshogs dang 'dra ba dag/ 'jigs par bgyid pa wa dang khyi zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po dang rmi lam la yang / gcan gzan gyi gzugs su sprul nas gnod pa'o// rnam par sprul nas 
54a2(rgyud 'grel): ljon shing dang / mchod rten dag gi gnas na gda' zhes bya ba ni/ gnas de dag tu gnas shing / sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o// skyes pa gzhon nu'i gzugs mdzes pas/ 'bar
54a3(rgyud 'grel): zhing shing rta'i sgra yang 'byin ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyis khye'u dang bu mor skyes nas/ pha ma dag la gnod par byed pa'o// shing ta'i sgra ni skad sna tshogs su 'byung ba'o// gnas rnams dang ni shul dag tu// 
54a4(rgyud 'grel): rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston ces bya ba ni/ gzugs dang 'od dang rdzu 'phrul ston pa'o// grong khyer dag dang khyim rnams kyi/ sgo yang gdon de dag kyang 'byed ces bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyi phyir 'brang zhing / grong dang 
54a5(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer rnams la gnod par byed de// sgo phug dang 'phrang kar bsdad cing 'dzin pa'o// srog dang lus kyang blangs bgyid shing // lam na kun tu bskod par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ lus la na tsha drag por byas
54a6(rgyud 'grel): shing / srog 'bral bar bgyid pa'o// bskal pa bdun gyi bar du yang rjes rlag pa'o// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag tu// rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnams dang zhes b+ha ba ni gzugs sna tshogs su bsgyur zhing / kha dog sna tshogs 
54a7(rgyud 'grel): sprul pa'o// rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyi rnams// lus lan bar gnas par ston ces bya ba ni/ mdze dang ldog pa po la mig la sogs pa'i nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi ston pa dag go/ nad rnams 
54a8(rgyud 'grel): kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // phyin dri log tu brtson par byed ces bya ba ni/ rlung bad kan mkhris par ston cing / bad kan rlung dang mkhris par ston te rtsa 'khrugs par snang ba'o// ji snyed 'jig rten rang bzhin 
54b1(rgyud 'grel): dag/ thams cad log pas de dag ston ces bya ba ni/ stong gsum stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig yud tsam gyi rgyu zhing / sems can rnams la 'tshe ba phyin ci log par ston pa'o// rig sngags 
54b2(rgyud 'grel): zhags pas drangs pas na// de dag kun kyang 'dir mchis so zhes bya ba ni/ stong chen mo rab tu 'joms ma'i dmod mo'i zhags pas ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams bcings pa'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ 
54b3(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po bshad pa'i de nas so// rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu zhes bya ba ni/ byang phyogs kyi gdon gnod par byed pa rnams la chad pa gcod pa'o// langs te thal mo rab sbyar nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor
54b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi nang nas sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar langs so// zhabasngal 'khor lo'i mtshan mnga' ba/ gser gyi mchod spong dga' bar zhing zhes bya ba ni/ mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan zhing / dpe byad bzang po
54b5(rgyud 'grel): brgyad cus brgyan pa/ chos kyi phung po'i rang bzhin gyi sku'o// 'jig rten snang bar mdzad pa'o// thub pa chen po me dang 'dra zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams na chos kyi rgyal por
54b6(rgyud 'grel): snang ba bskal pa me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od do// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi ni/ gnod sbyin gsang sngags mi zad can zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis stong chen mo'i rig sngags zhal nas 
54b7(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pas/ gnod sbyin gyi gdon rnams chag par byed pa'o// byang phyogs cha yi phyogs cha gnas// byang phyogs dag tu gnod par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams so// 
54b8(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar ni/ de dag chad pa bdag gis bcad ces bya ba ni/ stong chen mo'i rig sngags kyi chad pa gnod pa'o// s+yat+k+r-i da ma zhes bya ba ni/ 'di lta ste/ gang la zhe na rig sngags
55a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di'o// byang phyogs su bdag bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ bdag nye bar mtshon pa'o// bde legs ni sems can tham ba cad phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par gyur 
55a2(rgyud 'grel): cig pa'o// de dag ni rgyal po bzhi dang phyogs skyong ba bcu'i chad pa skyes pa ste/ tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang // 'jig rten skyong ba dbang phyug che zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs pa la sogs pa gzugs
55a3(rgyud 'grel): khams kyi lha rnams dang / brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod pa khams kyi lha rnams dang / 'jig rten skyong ba bcu po dang / gnas gtsang ma dang dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang / 
55a4(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin ded dpon thams cad dang // 'phrog ma bu dang bcas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ mthu bo che sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon lnga rtsen dang 
55a5(rgyud 'grel): 'phrog ma'i bu lnga bcu'o// bdag gi me tog spos dag dang / sbyid sreg 'di ni blang bar gyis zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal chen rnam zos kyi bus/ sems can gyi don du de dag 'bul ba'o// de dag gi ni brtson 
55a6(rgyud 'grel): 'grus dang / gzi brjid dbang phyug stobs kyis kyang zhes bya ba ni/ lha de dag gi mthu'i nus pa'o// nad thams cad bcom par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ rlung khris bad kan la sogs pa nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi 
55a7(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa'o// bdag 'jigs pa dang / gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag yang 'di la gus par byed pa nad dang 'jigs pa las thar pa'o// phyag 'tshal 
55a8(rgyud 'grel): skyes bu dpa' khyod la zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus kyang / mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus sku la brgyan pa'i sprul pa'i sku la gus par phyag 'tshal lo// 
55b1(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal lo// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum stong 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi rgyal srid mdzad cing / chos kyi rang bzhin gyis khyab ste/ de la sku gsung 
55b2(rgyud 'grel): thugs kyis gus par phyag 'tshal ba'o// rgyal chen yul 'khor srung ba yang // langs te thal mo sbyar btud nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar gus pas 'dud pa'o// me tog lta bur 
55b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas gyur cig/ ka la bing ka'i sgra dbyangs can zhes bya ba ni/ zhal pad+ma rgyas pa dang 'dra ba// dbyangs gsal la phra ba'o// khu byug dang ni rma bya'i sgra// je dang 'brug gi sgra sgrogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ 
55b4(rgyud 'grel): sgra gsal ba yid du 'ong ba// rol mo'i tshogs dang ldan pa'o// thub chen gnod sbyin gyi srin po dang // dri za stong phrag drug cu bzhi zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs na 'khod pa'i 'byung po rnams so// shar gyi 
55b5(rgyud 'grel): phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas/ shar phyogs pa la gnod par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa de rnams la rig sngags kyi dmod mos chad pa gcod pa'o// 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/ de dag
55b6(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bdag gis bshad ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i spyan sngar/ rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung gis zhus pa'o// gang zhus na dri za 
55b7(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i srog snying rig sngags snying pos zhus pa'o// gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ d+ha ra NaM la sogs pa'o// shar phyogs su bdag bde legs su gyur cig swA hA zhes bya ba ni/ gang dag 'di la 
55b8(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs su gnod pa dang / 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba'o// 'di yang yul 'khor srung gis gsungs pa te/ tshangs pa dang brgya byin la sogs pa ni/ gong du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o// de dag gi 
56a1(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid dang mthu'i dbang gis/ gang zag nad dang 'jigs pa las thar pa'o// phyag 'tshal skyes zu dpa' khyod la sogs pa ni gong du bshad pa bzhin bya'o// rgyal po chen po 'phags
56a2(rgyud 'grel): skyes kyang / sbrul mo sbyar de de nas langs zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar gus pas thal mo sbyar ba'o// thams cad mkhyen pa thams cad gzigs/ smras pas thams cad rab 'jig 
56a3(rgyud 'grel): po zhes bya ba ni/ rin po che rang gi lag mthil tu snang ba dang 'dra ba 'jig rten gyi khams thugs rjes lta ba/ rnam par rtog pa'i ngo bo bdud bzhi 'joms pa'o// the tshom thams cad gcod mdzad pa/ 
56a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten thams cad rnam 'dren pa zhes bya ba ni/ ma rigs pa'i ngo bo nyid nyon mongs pa rnams 'joms pa'o// ye shes kyi 'od zer gyis 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can/ mtho ris su 'dren pa'o// 
56a5(rgyud 'grel): grul bum yi dgas srul po dag/ stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i grul bum la sogs pa/ rig sngags kyi chad pas gcod pa'o// lho phyogs cha yi phyogs na gnas// de dag 
56a6(rgyud 'grel): bu la gnod par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ lho phyogs na 'khod cing gnod par byed pa'o// 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/ de dag 'chad pa bdag gis bshad ces bya ba ni// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan 
56a7(rgyud 'grel): sngar rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos zhus pa'o// gang zhus she na/ grul bupa la sogs pa'i srog gi snying po'o// rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po'o// gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ shAn+ti shAn+ti la sogs pa'o// 
56a8(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogs su bdag bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag 'di la gus pa la lho phyogs kyi nad 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba'o// tshangs pa la sogs pas zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes 
56b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// de dag gi gzi brjid dang dbang phyug gis gang zag gi nang dang 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o// phyag 'tshal skyes bu dpa' khyod la sogs pa ni/ gong du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o// rgyal po mig mi 
56b2(rgyud 'grel): bzang ba yang // thal mo sbyar ba byas nas langs zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar gus par 'dud pa'o// spri na chen seng ge chen po la// che ba'i chen po rgya mtsho che zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa 
56b3(rgyud 'grel): med pa seng ge bzhin du spyod pa/ sems can sprin gyi char bzhin don byed pa'o// rgya mtsho bzhin du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// gsung ba chen po dpa' chen po// g.yul chen rab tu 'joms mdzad 
56b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhes bya ba ni/ smra ba'i seng ge stobs dang ldan pa/ zhon mongs pa'i g.yul chen po 'joms pa'o// klu dang 'dab bzang gsang ba'o// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi dag ces bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa 
56b5(rgyud 'grel): kwa'i gdon la sogs pa rig sngags kyi dmad mo'i chad pas gcod pa'o// nub kyi phyogs cha'i phyogs na gnas// de nas byung nas gnod par bgyid ces bya ba ni/ nub nges nas 'khod nas de dag nas byung ba'o// 
56b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten mgon gyi spyan sngar ni/ de dag chad pa dag gis bshad ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar/ rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gis nus pa'o// gang zhus she na/ klunams kyi 
56b7(rgyud 'grel): snying po'o// rig sngags kyi las kyi snying po'o// gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ ba rti ba ra tri la sogs pa'o// nub phyogs su bdag bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni/ gang dag nub phyogs kyi 
56b8(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa dang // nad la sogs pa dang bral ba'o// tshangs pa la sogs pa ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin no// de dag gi mthu dang gzi brjid kyis kyang / gang zag gi nad dang 'jigs pa dang bral ba'o// phyag 
57a1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshal tes budapa 'thod palags pani/ gang bzhin dashes par byag// denasan nagashebang byed nams// ngas pa nga ni rgyangs rkyen yang // thal ma sbyang ba bstanas 'das nas byab/ 
57a2(rgyud 'grel): mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas kyang / 'jig rten mgon po'i spyan sngar 'dud pa'o// tshangs pa bkrus pas dag pa'o// rig byed kun gyi pha rol zhes bya ba ni/ mi dge ba bcu spangs shing dge ba bcu dang dbyangs 
57a3(rgyud 'grel): de/ tshad med pa bzhi'i sgo nas sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o// skye bo dga' mdzad sman pa'i rje// 'jig rten thams cad gso mdzad pa// zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mes por mdzad cing / de'i 
57a4(rgyud 'grel): nga mdzad pas dbang du sgrus pa// gad min pa ga ga rnams// phyags dang byugs marnams gnas pa rnams nas bya ba ni/ thugs brnyan paldad pa'i 'byung ba rnams/ dgasngags kya ma ma 
57a5(rgyud 'grel): 'chad pa gcod pa'o// sa yi 'og dang sa yi steng // nam mkha' dag la gnas pa'i gdon zhes par bya ba ni/ sa bdag tu gnas pa bar snang la rgyu ba/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams so// 'jig rten mgon
57a6(rgyud 'grel): po'i spyan sngar ni/ de dag thams cad bdag gis bshad ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar/ mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas zhus pa'o// gang zhus she na/ 'byung po rnams kyi 
57a7(rgyud 'grel): gnyen po rig sngags kyi snying po'o// gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ b+h+ra me b+hU mgo she la sogs pa'o// phyogs btsu dag tu bdag bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag 'di la gus pa
57a8(rgyud 'grel): la/ phyogs thams cad kyi 'jigs pa mi 'byung ba'o// tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gong du bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o// de dag kun gyi mthu'i nus pas/ gang zag la 'jigs
57b1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / nad thams cad dang bral ba'o// rlung las gyur dang mkhris las gyur/ bad kan las gyur 'dus las gyur ces bya ba ni/ 'di'i rkyen gyis mdzend bco brgyad du 'bung ste/ de rnams kyis kyang 'jigs
57b2(rgyud 'grel): pa dang bral ba'o// nad rnams thams cad bcom par 'gyur/ bdag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig swA hA/ zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag gang yang 'di'i dus pas/ nad bzhi
