141b3(rgyud 'grel): po// rab tu stug po khro gnyer can// gsus po che dang bu sna'o// sA'i bya bo dang rna ba med// lag rings po dang rna ba ring // swA yi rtse dang lag rngu ring // lus sams lus ni ring ba dang // sra ring rab tu brgyan pa 
141b4(rgyud 'grel): dang // rkang pa med pa phra ba dang // drang ba dang bum k+ta ga// yan lag du sun 'dra ba dang // gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lo// rnam bo la rna po che// b+ha du sra ba rdzes rab tu dmar// mgo batshal gzhu 'grin po/ 
141b5(rgyud 'grel): sman po sprang po bum lto ba// ri rab rtse mo bskul nas swA// me ma dag gon char pa 'bebs// ljon shing ri ye rdob dang // sprin gyi tshogs kyi mdog 'dra ba// dung dang rnga chen rnga rnga dang // grul bum rje chen rnams kyis/ 
141b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa'i sprin rab tu 'byin// mig po chel bum bu'i sba// nag po sngon po ser po dang // dmar ser me dang dmar ser dang // khab 'dra'i spu dang ral grizla// dmar po'i khrag gis bsdus pa rnams// mi ro dag ni 
141b7(rgyud 'grel): khyer nas su// za bzhin du ni rnam par chug/ so rnon lag pa dmar ba dang // mchu ni khrag gis bslus pa dang // lus byed dag ni zos pa dang // mkhal ma snying dang nang grol gyis// snyim pa bzhin du 
141b8(rgyud 'grel): bkang ba dang // byis pa dag ni za bzhin du// mer mer po dang srog chags kyi// rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'brog/ keng rus kyi ni lus kyis su// skye bo mang po sreg par byed// khrag gis rab tu 
142a1(rgyud 'grel): bkang ba yi// mi yi pags pa thogs nas su// mi bzad dug gis kun bsdus te// phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam par chug/ grong khyer rnams kyi sgo dag dang // khyim nas khyim du rnam par 'thor// 
142a2(rgyud 'grel): rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa rnams// phyogs bzhi dag tu 'khrug par byed// de ltar de ni rgyal po yi// gdon dang 'jig pa chen po nas// lhag par de dag thams cad kyang // 'byung po de dag rnams kyis kyang // 
142a3(rgyud 'grel): klogs tshol ba yis dus su yang // mi'i 'jig rten 'di la rmi lam dang rtags bstan pa'o// phyogs bcu dag tu 'jigs pa skyed// bud med dag dang skyes pa dang // de bzhin khye'i bu mo dang // mngal na'ang gnas pa'ang // 
142a4(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa skyed// dud 'gro'i skye gnas rtogs pa'anga' che// skang ma dag dang ni zla dang // gtum pa'i gza' rnams gnod par bgyid// lo rtogs bon 'bras bu da // me tog sman dang zas skom dang / 
142a5(rgyud 'grel): mi rnams kyi na dpa' 'phrog cing // mthon po rnams kyang dma' bar bgyid// 'jig rten bdakan nongs pa rnams// dmag dang thab mo sha gnyer dang // tshig gam zhig gram gsid b+ha ba// de kun 'byung po'i// 
142a6(rgyud 'grel): rnam pas gyur// sbed cing ster bar bgyid pa dang // bzlog par bgyid cing gad par bgyid// 'jigs par bgyid cing lta bar bgyid// dgrar 'gyur ba yang ston par bgyid// sdig pa'i rmi lam mthong bar 
142a7(rgyud 'grel): bgyid// zhal ba dag la gnod pa bgyid// sgo nas se gol skra 'byung zhing // mi nyan brjod de za bar bgyid// mdza' bo gnyen bshes gzugs dag tu// gda' zhing bka' mchid smra bar bgyid// bu mo sdug/ 
142a8(rgyud 'grel): gu'i gzugs dag tu// 'dod la spyod pa gda' bar bgyid// nyi ma skar ma'i gzugs dag tu// zla ba'i gzugs su gda' bar bgyid// rlung dang skar mda' lce gzugs su// de la gnod par de dag gda'// 
142b1(rgyud 'grel): skar pa'i tshogs dang 'dra ba dag/ 'jigs par bgyid pa wa dang khyi// rnam par sprul nas ljon shing dang // mchod rten dag gi gnas na gda'// skyes pa gzhon nu'i gzugs mdzes pas// 'bar zhing shing rta'i 
142b2(rgyud 'grel): sgra yang 'byin// gnas rnams dang ni shul dag tu// rnam pa sna tshogs rjes kyang ston// grong khyer dag na khyim rnams kyi// sgo yang gdon chen de dag 'byed// srog dang lus kyang blang ba gyis shing // lam ngan 
142b3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu bskor bar bgyid// rnam pa sna tshogs gzugs dag dang // rnam pa sna tshogs sgra rnams dang // rnam pa sna tshogs nad kyi rnams// lus ni na bar gnas par sten// nad rnams kun gyi mtshan nyid kyang // 
142b4(rgyud 'grel): phyin ci log tu ston par bgyid// ji snyed 'jig rten rang bzhin dag/ thams cad log par de dag ston// yang na 'byung po de rnams mi'i 'jig rten la gnod par byas nas// klags tshol zhing grong ngam 
142b5(rgyud 'grel): grong khyer du rgyun// mtshan nyid de bzhin du yin te// grong khyer grong rdal yul 'khor dang // pho brang 'khor du rgyu ba ni// gnod sbyin ma rungs mdangs 'phrog pa// snying rje med cing khrag 'thung ba// lus chen 
142b6(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa chen po ste// stobs po che la sgra yang che// mgrin bcu po la mig stong po// gdon chen mig ni dmar po rnams// 'khor ni mang po rnams btang ste// lag na mtshon thogs rab tu 'jigs// 
142b7(rgyud 'grel): sbrul gyi pags pa thogs pa dang // lag bzhi lag na sgron ma thogs// lag na mtshon dang dbyug pa thogs// rdo rje mdung rtse dbyug pa thogs// rab tu drag pa'i dmag rgal nas// phyogs kun tu ni skrag/ 
142b8(rgyud 'grel): par byed// sdang ba'i gnas na 'khod pa yi// gsang ba po ni dad kun kyang // mi yi 'jig rten 'di dag tu// skyes pa bud med gzhan yang 'dzin// sha khrag dron por bcas pa la// rnam par 'phrul cing 
143a1(rgyud 'grel): 'dod pa'i gzugs// seng ge dang ni stag dang rta// ma he ba lang bor bu rnga// glang po che yi gzugs 'dra dang // dom dang gzig dang spang ki dang // khyi dang wa dang ra dag dang // byi la

147a4(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi lo ma'o// de zos pa'i nad ni shi ba dang / grangs pa dang / spro ba dang / brgyal ba dang / nar nus pas so// de ni bsdad pa'i dug ni nus pa'o// dbyed pa'i dug ni/ rgya tsa shing kun dang sum pa'i sha'o// de'i 
147a5(rgyud 'grel): nad kyis snying mi dga' ste/ snying la byung ba'o// bong phrug gi sha dong 'ug pa'i sha shing kun dang ngo // de yan lag la babs te/ grang shum byed cing tsha ba skye ste/ rta'i mchin pa dang chu bya'i sha dang / zar nu 
147a6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de yang byed pa'i dug go/ mkhris pa la tsha ba btang na de yang dug yin te/ rlung la grang ba btang ba yang dug go// 'jig rten pa'i dug 'di ni rang bzhin las byung ste/ mi rig pa'i rang bzhin gyis rang la rang

147b1(rgyud 'grel): las byung // 'gro dang bsdad dang sbyor ba dang // sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun gyis// phyi'i dug 'joms nus// rig sngags gzi brjid de 'joms nus// gti mug 'dod chags zhes sdang dang // rang gi sems 
147b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis bcom pa la// gzhan gyis de ni mi tshems so// bdag gis de ni bor bar bgyi// de skad ces gsungs so// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo drug gi gnyen po 'di// dug gsum gsob la yang dag par 
147b3(rgyud 'grel): nus pa'o// gsang sngags dang sman dang ting nge 'dzin gyi bye brag gis gso bar bya'o// 'gro ba'i dug gso ba ni/ nad pa la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i ting nge 'dzin la zhugs la/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags la 'jug

147b5(rgyud 'grel): babs na/ thal ka rdo rje dang / ba ku la dang / se 'brum gyi phyi sgrogs dang / bsres la btang ngo // rig sngags kyi gsang sngags zhag bdun bsgrubs par bya'o// phol mig dang lus po gas par gyur na mu zi dang 
147b6(rgyud 'grel): lnga pa rang gi sos dug dbyung ngo // rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i nga rgyal gyis byas la/ shu ba dang / g.ya' ba dang / mdze dang / phol mig dang / g.yan pa dang / med pal dang / lhog pa dang / 'bras dang / 
148a1(rgyud 'grel): par bzlas pa drag po la 'jug go/ de bzhin du 'gro ba'i dug gso ba'i bya thabs so// bsdad pa'i dug gso ba ni/ sngo ma hA ra tsa dang / chu drang mo la sbyar nas/ sngags lan bdun nam/ nyi shu rtsa 
148a2(rgyud 'grel): gcig gam/ brgya rtsa brgyad btab la 'thung du gzhug go/ 'di ni btsan dug dang bor nag po'i gnyen po'o// ra dug la 'bras bu gsum dang lcags phye btab la/ bu chung 'o ma 'thung ba'i chu 'am/ rang gi chu la btab la 'thung du 
148a3(rgyud 'grel): gzhug go/ des ni btsan dug kyang thub po// sribs shing gi 'bru gul 'bras bu gsum gyis bya'o// sgo bar gyur na krur chu tsa mo'i khu ba blud de// de ni thang phrom gyi gnyen po'o// gas par gyur na mar nag dang / gu gul dkar 
148a4(rgyud 'grel): po dang / sbyar la byug go/ spangs par gyur na zang brom gyis rtsa ba dang / ri sho ba'i rtsa ba dang / dug dang sbyar la mnan no// gzhan yang thams cad chu grang la btab la btung bar bya'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen

148a6(rgyud 'grel): la lto stong la btang ngo / de bzhin du zhag gsum bzhi btang bar gyur na/ lo gcig bar du thub pa'o// sha tshan gsum dang skyed pa dang / se rgol ma'i bar shun dang / a ru ra dang / ra dmar mo'i khrag dang / ril bu byas la 
148a7(rgyud 'grel): btang ngo // 'dis ni lo gsum gi bar du thub ste/ lo gcig the tshom mi za bar thub po// sha dug byung na rga chung dang tshal chu grong mo la btab la btung ngo // rin po che'i dug byung na cags phye dang 'bras bu gsum dang / ldum 
148a8(rgyud 'grel): bu re ral dang rgog gcig ma dang / d+ha du ras la sbyar la bya'o// 'di ni sbyor ba'i dug gso ba'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/ ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang 
148b1(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin no/ da ltar gyi shAkya thub pas gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// thabs shes rab dbyer med pa'o// kun gzhi rnam par dag pa'o// stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin ni so sor rtog pa'i ye shes te/ thabs kyi ngo bo ni rig 
148b2(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po pad+ma'i rigs so// phung po ni 'du shes kyi phung po ste/ khams ni pe'i 'ams so// skye mched ni lce'i skye ma ched do// rang bzhin ni 'dod chags kyi rang bzhin no// sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ 
148b3(rgyud 'grel): spyan gsum pa/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dmar ba/ cung zad thob/ yan lag thams cad sbal gyis brgyan pa/ dang po'i phyag g.yas g.yon na mtha' yas dang 'jog po'i ngo bor sbrul bsnams pa/ 
148b4(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi rang bzhin rma bya gser du snang ba gnyis phyag 'og ma gnyis na bsnams pa'o// zhabs g.yas bskum pa g.yon brkyang ba'i zhabs kyis pad+ma dang ka ru ra dra mnar pa'o// pad+ma'i steng na nyi ma'i gdan la
148b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhugs pa/ nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin no// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas/ thugs kyi dkyil 'khor las spros pa/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po 'di 
148b6(rgyud 'grel): dug gi gnyen po klu'i rgyal po rnams kyi bdag po'o// dug gi gnyen po'i snying po ni gang zhe na/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags 'di/ gzhan rnams kyis kyang mi thub cing / 'byung po rnams kyi yang gnyen po'i/ sngags
148b7(rgyud 'grel): kyi tshig 'di lta ste/ tsit+te tsit+ta mu le la sogs pa'o// rgyal ba rnams gzigs mya ngan tshangs la gnas/ zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs de yang 'khrungs pa'i dus su yang / 
148b8(rgyud 'grel): shing byang chub kyi shing mya ngan tshangs pa'i 'og tu'o// sems can gyi don la yul ma ga d+ha la rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa'i dus su/ byang chub kyi 'og tu'o// srod la bdud bdul te/ tho rangs sangs rgyas pa'i dus su 
149a1(rgyud 'grel): rig sngag kyi rgyal mo 'di dran par rnyed pa'o// de'i bden pas 'gro ba'i dug dang / bsdad pa'i dug dang / byed pa'i dug nges bcom mo// rgyal ba gtsug tor pad+ma dkar po'i drung zhes bya ba ni/ 
149a2(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gtsug tor can ni/ byang chub kyi shing pad+ma dkar po'i tshal gyis 'og tu 'khrungs te/ de bzhin du rdo rje gdan la bzhugs pa'i dug su/ byang chub kyi shing pad+ma dkar po'i 'og tu srod la bdud

149b8(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o// gnyis pa rdo rje gdan du byang chub kyi shing gnas kyi drung gi 'og tu/ rtsa ku sha'i gdan bting nas srod la bdud btul nas tho rangs mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so// de'i tshe de'i dus su sngon
150a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi dran pa nye bar bzhag cing chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong nye bar bzhag nas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen po 'di la rjes su yi rang ba'o// gsum pa ba ra NA ser bden pa bzhi'i chos kyis

150a6(rgyud 'grel): bstan pa la sa gzhi ni gser las byas pa'o// mi'i tshe lon lnga brgya thub po// dus gsum pa la sangs rgyas thams cad skyob pa'i bstan pa las gzhi ni dngul las byas pa ste/ mi lo ni phye dang sum 
150a7(rgyud 'grel): brgya thub pa'o// dus bzhi pa la sangs rgyas log par dad sel gyi bstan pa la/ sa gzhi ni in+d+ra nI la las byas pa'o// tshe lo brgya nyi shu rtsa lnga'o// dus lnga pa sangs rgyas gser thub kyi bstan pa la 
150a8(rgyud 'grel): smon lam stobs kyis gser gyi sa gzhi mi'i tshe lo yang stong tshe gcig go/ dus drug pa la sangs rgyas 'od srungs gi bstan pa ste/ rin po che sna bdun gyis gzhi'i rin po che sna bdun la longs spyod do// 
150b1(rgyud 'grel): mi lo lnga brgya'o// dus bdun pa ni tha ma'i dus yin te/ sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa ste/ sngon gyi dus su sangs rgyas mar me mdzad kyi bstan pa la/ sangs rgyas nyid la dang po'i smon lam btab pa'o//

150b5(rgyud 'grel): rgyas kyi zhal mthong bar gyur to// de nas bram ze'i phrug gu nyi ma'i 'od kyis sangs rgyas mar me mdzad nags gse ba na bzhugs pa la dad pa skyes nas mgo bo'i steng du bzhag go// de'i tshe de'i dus su yang dag

150b7(rgyud 'grel): yang bcos dka' ba mtshon sna lnga'i dus/ chos 'dul ba mngon pa theg pa chen po'i dus/ pha rol tu phyin pa gsang sngags kyis 'dul ba'i dus so// mi'i tshe lo yang brgya nyi shi tham pa/ gzugs kyang khru phye dang / 
150b8(rgyud 'grel): bzhi dang ldan pa'o// de'i dus su yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i bstan pa dang zhing rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di la sems can thams cad rjes su yi rang zhing gus par bya 
151a1(rgyud 'grel): ste/ de'i nus pas kyang dug thams cad bcom pa'o// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po de dag la zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang thams cad skyob 
151a2(rgyud 'grel): dang log par dad sel dang gser thub dang 'od srungs dang shAkya thub pa ste/ de'i bden pa dang stobs dang gzi brjid kyis sems can thams cad kyi don byas shing dug bcom mo// mngon par dad pa'i lha gang
151a3(rgyud 'grel): 'khod pa dag ces bya ba ni/ de dag gi nus pas kyang lha rnams la sogs pas kyang 'di la dad pa bgyis pa gang yang tshe ring zhing nad thams cad dang bral te/ dug thams cad kyi 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur/

151a8(rgyud 'grel): brgyan pa/ klu mtha' yas dang 'dzeg po mnan pa/ de bzhin du pad+ma dang pad+ma chen po phyag gis bzung ba/ nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od dang ldan pa/ cung zad khro ba'o// dug bcom pa'i rig sngags gang zhe na/ 
151b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas spros pa'o// 'di lta ste/ 'og tu blta ba'o// rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ oM li mo la~M ki l-i la sogs pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni dge slongs ri dang 
151b2(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyi don du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' ba la spras pa'o// mthu chen mo 'dir dag nim mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs pa'i tshul sogs pa gzugs khams kyis

151b4(rgyud 'grel): mtshe ma dang dga' ldan dang 'phrul dga' dang gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis kyang rjes su yi rang nang / sman chen por gsungs pa'o// rgyal po chen po bzhi dang zhes pa ni/ ro bdun gyi lha rnams

151b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yi rang ba'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyis yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o// gang pa chen po'i 'di dag gi ming 'dzin pa la dga' zhing / rab tu snang ba'i sems kyis 'odan 
151b7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i bka' las 'das pa/ gang sdug bsngal thams cad thob cing dmyal ba mnar med par skye bar 'gyur ro// de'i mgo bo ardza ka'i dog pa bzhin 
151b8(rgyud 'grel): tshal pa bdun du 'gas so zhes bya ba ni de'i bka' las 'das pa de'i tshe 'di la mgo bo 'gas te/ lus kyang dum bu dum bur zhig go/ shi nas kyang skyes ma thag tu dmyal ba mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal 
152a1(rgyud 'grel): thob cing / de'i sdug bsngal las bral nas kyang / dmyal ba pad+ma chen po ltar gas par phye'o// rig sngags ni gang zhe na yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi spyi bo'i gtsug nas 'phros
152a2(rgyud 'grel): pa/ sku'i rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes gzugs kyi phung po me'i khams/ mig gi skye mched ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin mtshon bya ni ye shes te/ de yang shes rab kyi rang bzhin no// mtshon par byed pa ni 
152a3(rgyud 'grel): zabs so de gnyis su med pa'i sku ni zhal gsum phyag drug sku mdog dmar ba/ g.yas mthing kha/ g.yon ljang gu/ spyan gsum pa rig lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ lus thams cad sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ rma bya la 
152a4(rgyud 'grel): zhon pa/ phyag g.yas dang pon rdo rje/ 'og man rma bya'i sgo bsnams pa'o// tha ma na mnga' bsdams pa'o// g.yon gyi dang po ni rin po che/ bar man zhags pa/ tham na gzhu bsnams pa'o// dug gi me 
152a5(rgyud 'grel): tog gi na bza' gsol ba/ zhi ba'i tshul du zhugs pa'o// rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni 'di lta ste/ 'og tu blta'o// bka' 'di ni ka'i rti mu le la sogs pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i dug
152a6(rgyud 'grel): bcom pa'i gnas skabs te bdun pa'o// rkang gnyis khyed cag bde lags shog ces bya ba ni 'gro ba rig drug la lha'i sdug bsngal la sogs pa de yang bde legs su 'gyur te/ de bzhin du mi'i la sogs pa'i 
152a7(rgyud 'grel): sems can rkang bzhi byed cag bde legs shog ces bya ba ni dud 'gro la sogs pa'i sems can rnams dang ste/ sdug bsngal ni gcig gis gcig za ba'i sdug bsngal rnams te/ de yang zhi bar byas shing yi 
152a8(rgyud 'grel): dgas rkang bzhi pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal yang zhi bar byas so// lam du zhugs rnams bde legs shog ces bya ba ni/ gang zag 'di la gus par byed pa gang dang phyin pa der bde zhing / slar log kyang bde ba'o// 
152b1(rgyud 'grel): phyir 'od dag kyang b.re legs shog ces bya ba ni/ rang bzhin du slobs nas kyang bde bar gyur cig/ lus thams cad kyang nang dang bral bar 'gyur ro// mtshan mo bde legs nyin bde legs// nyi ma'i gung la bde legs 
152b2(rgyud 'grel): shing / khyed cag kun tu bde legs shog/ ces bya ba ni nyal ba'i dus su yang rmi lam dge bar rmi zhing / mi dge ba rnabs mi rmi ste/ de bzhin du nyin mo yang dge ba'i sems su gnas shing / nyon mongs pa 
152b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams mi skye ba'o// de bzhin du nyi ma phyed kyang yin no// de dag sdig par ma gyur cig ces bya ba ni gang zag 'di la gnas pa ni skye ba bdun du tshe rab dran zhing / 'di'i nus pas sdig pas mgos pa'o// nyi ma thams 
152b4(rgyud 'grel): cad dge ba yin zhes bya ba ni/ reg sngags kyi nus pas mi dge ba las skyes kyang dge bar 'gyur ro// chu skar thams cad bzang ba yin zhes bya ba ni/ mi bzad pa ni skag dang bra nye'o// 'bring po ni mchu dang khrums 
152b5(rgyud 'grel): so// de la skyes pas kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ chu skar thams cad bzang po'o// sangs rgyas thams cad rdzu 'phrul che zhes bya ba ni 'das pa ma 'ongs pa da ltar yod pa'i gzi brjid kyi stobs kyi rdzu 'phrul 
152b6(rgyud 'grel): gyis sems can thams cad bde ba'o// yang na nam mkha'i bzhin du rdzu 'phrul gyis khyab pa'o// dgra bcom pa thams cad zag pa zad pa zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi bcom zhing bag chags kyi sgrib pas ma gos 
152b7(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ de bzhin du nyan thos kyi rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa'o// bden pa'i cho ga 'dis kun tu bde legs su thur ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' bden pa dang / rig sngags kyi 
152b8(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid kyi stobs kyis/ kun nas kun tu bde legs su 'gyur ba'o// de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i rig sngags kyi rma bu chen mo 'dis zhes bya ba ni rnam par gzigs dang / gtsug tor can dang / 
153a1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad skyob dang / log par dad sel dang / gser thub dang / 'od srungs la sogs pa'i sangs rgyas/ gang gA klung gi bye ma snyed bye ba brgyad khri bzhi stong rnams kyis kyang / 
153a2(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa/ de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa rnams kyang byams la sogs pa'o// da ltar shAkya thub pas gsungs shing rjes su yi rang ba'o// de rnams kyis bka' nas gsungs te/ gzi brjid// 
153a3(rgyud 'grel): che zhing 'byung po rnams kyi mnyen pa'o// bdag la bsrung bgyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang zag gus par byed pa sra ba dang / zhes bya ba ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad la 'gro 'dod pas sba ba'o// yongs su sbyang 
153a4(rgyud 'grel): ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro ba rig drug gi sdug bsngal las bskyab pa'o// yongs su bzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mi dge ba bcu bor nas/ dge ba 'dzin pa'o// yongs su bskyang ba dang / zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba'i 
153a5(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba ci byas pa rgya cher 'phel ba'o// zhi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bar chad med cing dge ba'i rtsa ba ci byas pa gang yang zhi bar 'gyur zhing bsam pa 'grub pa'o// bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ tshe ltar 
153a6(rgyud 'grel): yang bde bas te/ de bzhin du phyi ma la yang bde ba'o// chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po dang 'byung po yin te/ de la sogs pa'i chad pa thams cad spong ba yin no// mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni// 
153a7(rgyud 'grel): dper na g.yul tu zhugs pa'i dgra las rgyal bar 'gyur ro// dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni dug 'thungs pa dang dug zos pa dang / phol mig dang g.yan pa dang med pa la la sogs pa'i dug thams cad 
153a8(rgyud 'grel): 'byin pa'o// dug bsad pa zhes bya ba ni 'gro ba'i dug dang bsdad pa'i dug dang byed pa'i dug dang gsum gsal nas phyi nas dug nad mi ldang ba'o// mtshams gcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'dis// / 
153b1(rgyud 'grel): phyogs mtshams steng 'og thams cad rig sngags kyi nus pas 'byung po rnams 'ong mi nus pa'o// sa cing bgyis shig ces bya ba ni sa g.yo ba'i sdug bsngal yang mi 'byung ste/ gzhan yang ri dang khang pa la
153b2(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa yang mi rngub pa'o// lo brgya 'tshe bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ tshe thung ba ring bar byed cing nad thams cad bral nas bde bar gnas pa'o// ston brgya mthong bar shog cig ces bya ba ni/ za ba dang 'thung ba 
153b3(rgyud 'grel): phun sum tshogs shing / ma shi'i bar du g.yog dang ldan zhing tshub thams cad ldan pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/ sems can gyis don la bka' stsal pa'o// 
153b4(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gang dag rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i gnod sbyin chen po dag dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya mtsho la gnas pa'i 'byung po la sogs pa'o// gang dag ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang zhes bya ba ni dban 
153b5(rgyud 'grel): du rgyal po bani la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / mthu chen sum nu rtsa gnyis so// gang dag ri'i rgyal po gzhan rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri'i rgyal po ma la ya dang / dpal gyi ri dang / 
153b6(rgyud 'grel): rinag po la sogs pa'o// yang na stong gsum gyi stong chen po 'jig rten gyi khams kyi ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang bcas pa'i gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams so// 'brog rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de la gnas 
153b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams te/ yang steng gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams stong la gnas pa'o// 'brog chen po dang zhes bya ba ni de bas kyang che bas na chen po ste/ 'byung po rnams kyang 
153b8(rgyud 'grel): de bas kyang che ba'o// klu rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ gaM gA dang / sin d+ha dang / si ta dang / pak+Shu dang / chu bo chen po nai rany+dza ra la sogs pa de lta bu'i chu klung rnams la yod pa'i gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams so// 
154a1(rgyud 'grel): klu chen po rnams dang zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rgya mtsho chen po ste/ de la gnas pa'i klu dang gnod sbyin dang sa bdag la sogs pa'o// sman ljongs rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rdzing bu rnams yin/ 
154a2(rgyud 'grel): te de la gnas pa'i 'byung bas bdag dang sa srin la sogs pa stong gsum stong chen po la gnas pa'i rdzing bu rnams so// sman ljongs chen po rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de bas kyang che bas na chen po'o// 
154a3(rgyud 'grel): 'bab chu rnams dang zhes bya ba ni b.lang spyod dang dbyangs ldan dang / sbrang rtsi'i blo gros la sogs pa'i 'bab chul gnas pa'o// gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams so lteng ka rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ chu'i khron/ 
154a4(rgyud 'grel): pa rnams te de la sogs pa chu mig la gnas pa'i sa srin dang sa bdag 'byung po gnod sbyin rnams gnas pa'o// lu ma rnams dang zhes bya ba ni de'i lteng ka na gnas pa'i mtsho chen po ste/ de kA la 'bab/ 
154a5(rgyud 'grel): bas na lu ma'o// de la gnas pa'i 'byung po dang / klu'i rgyal po rnams so// ri'i phug rnams dang zhes bya ba ni stong bar du gnas pa'i ri rnams la chu ba'i yi dgas rnams so// yang na gdong pa la 
154a6(rgyud 'grel): bar mi nus pa'i 'byung po rnams so// dur khrod rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod ni ngang pa dang / rma bya'i sgo dang / rtsal shing dang / ro langs dang / mes bsregs pa la sogs pa'o// de la gnas pa ni gnod 
154a7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin dang 'byung po la sogs pa'o// dur khrod chen po rnams dang zhes bya ba ni bsil ba'i tshal dang / ko la ha ra dang / 'byung po ro langs la sogs pa'i dur khrod chen po rnams dang / de bas kyang che zhing 'byung // 
154a8(rgyud 'grel): po rnams che ba'o// bzhi mdo rnams dang zhes bya ba ni lam gyi rgya gram na gnas pa ste/ de la gnas pa'i 'byung po'o// grong rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de ni tshu la gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams te/ ma rungs 
154b1(rgyud 'grel): pab thams cad byed pa/ sems can la gnod cing grong la rgyu ba'o// grong khyer rnams dang zhes bya ba ni de bas kyang che ba ste/ 'byung po yang de bas che ba'o// lha rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'brog gi 'brog gas 
154b2(rgyud 'grel): te/ de la ba lang gnas pa'i gnas so// de na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams so// skyed mos tshal rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ pho dang mo rgyu ba'i gnas/ de bzhin du 'byung po yang po mo slu ba'i
154b3(rgyud 'grel): gnas gzugs su byas nas rgyu bar byed pa'o// nags rnams dang zhes bya ba ni srin po yi dgas rnams rtsub ste/ de la gnas pa'i ma rungs pa rnams so// nags tshal rnams dang zhes bya ba ni chu'i bar 
154b4(rgyud 'grel): na gnas pa ste/ de'i nang du rgyu ba'i 'byung po rnams te/ yang na rgya mtsho'i bar na gnas pa'i 'byung po rnams so// lam rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'gro 'dug byed pa la 'tshe bar byed cing ma rungs pa'i 
154b5(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po ste/ de bzhin du rtag tu rgyu ba'o// lam gol ba dag na gnas pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ sems can lam log par 'khrid cing lam log par ston pa rnams so// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni bcom 
154b6(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la yang nas yang du gsungs pa'o// gnod sbyin gang dag lcang lo can gyi 'khor na gnas pa de dag gis kyang zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon rnam thos sras kyi 'khor
154b7(rgyud 'grel): dang bcas pa de dag/ pho brang de na gnas pa'i gnod sbyin 'khor bcas rnams so// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ ces bya ba ni gang zag dad pa skyes pa 
154b8(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang / rig sngags 'di 'chang ba dang / 'chang du yod pa dang / klog pa dang / rjes su yi rang ba dang / sgom pa dang / rgya chen spel ba dang / de rnams la sogs pa yang dag par srung bar byed 
155a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// lo brgya 'tsho bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i nus pas lo brgya lon par gyur kyang / gzhon nu'i tshul du zhugs shing nad rnams thams cad bral ba'o// ston brgya 
155a2(rgyud 'grel): mthong bar shog shig ces bya ba ni/ dge ba'i dus su dge ba nus shing / de bzhin du za ba dang 'thong ba yang nus pa'o// rig sngags 'di yang sems can thams cad la thugs rje che zhing / gzugs skur 
155a3(rgyud 'grel): snang ba'o// gzugs sku de yang thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa/ zhal gsum phyag bzhi pa sku mdog mthing nag tu bzhugs pa/ g.yas dkar ba g.yon dmar ba/ khro mor dbu skra ser po sbrul 
155a4(rgyud 'grel): gyis bcings pa/ rin po che'i dbu rgyan spyan gsum pa/ yan lag sbrul gyis brgyan pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri dang rdo rje 'dzin pa/ g.yon sdigs mdzub dang zhags pa dril bu'o// g.yas brkyang ba 
155a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yon bskum pa/ zhabs kyis gnod sbyin pho mo mnan pa/ pad+ma'i stang du nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa/ nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o// rig sngags kyi gsang sngags 'di lta ste/ 'byung po rnams kyi snying

155a7(rgyud 'grel): ldog shar na yod pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sa mdog dkar po// phyag g.yas na 'khor lo bsnams pa/ g.yon pi wang bsnams pa/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// 
155a8(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams shar phyogs na gnas pa'o// 'khor dri za stong phrag tu ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor gyi mtshan ma ni gla len zhing bro brdungs te/ rgyan rnams 
155b1(rgyud 'grel): la yang dga' bar bgyid/ skam pa ma mchis mang bar smra/ rgod par bgyid cing khro bar 'gyur/ skom par 'gyur la mig dmar te/ rtag tu rims kyis 'debs par bgyid/ mig kyang 'byed par mi bgyid de/ 
155b2(rgyud 'grel): chub kyi phyogs shing nyal bar bgyid/ 'khor 'bum phrag du ma de dag kyang sems can la de bzhin du gnod pa byas shing / rang gi mtshan nyid kyang de bzhin no// dri za rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas ste/

155b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur na/ tshes bcu'amanya'am brgyad la sogs pal me tog gam spos sam mar me 'am dri 'am/ lha bshos sam mchod pa'i rdzas rang gis ci rigs pa la sogs la/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya 
155b5(rgyud 'grel): chen mo'am/ shar phyogs kyi rgyal po yul 'khor srung la sogs pa/ shar phyogs na gnas pa'i rgyal po dang gdon rnams mchod par bgyi'o// yang rol mo'i rdzas ni gdugs dang ba dan dang rgyal mtshan 
155b6(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'i rol mo'i rdzas so// gtor ma'i rdzas la ni/ bu ra ma dang bsreg pa'i zho dang / zho zan dang / 'bras kyi chan dang / 'bras las byas pa'i khur ba dang / de la sogs pa ci rigs pa 
155b7(rgyud 'grel): bsogs la dri sna tshogs zhim par mchod cing / me tog dkar ba'i phreng ba dang / dog sa la me tog dkar po bkram la/ yang dag par mchod par bgyi'o// gang shar phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyab 
155b8(rgyud 'grel): par byed pa de yang zhes bya ba ni/ sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa de lta bu'i yul 'khor srang gi rgyal po// shar phyogs kyi sems can rnams skyong ba'o// bu dang bcwa 
156a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dang 'khor rnams kyi'o// tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ ded dpon dang bcas/ mngag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang 
156a2(rgyud 'grel): bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas zhes bya ba ni/ de dag rnams kyis sems can gyi dor byas shing / rgyal po dang 'khor rnams kyi tsha bo la sogs pa'i 'bum brag du mar gnas pa'o// rig sngags kyi 
156a3(rgyud 'grel): rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis/ bdag la bsrung ba gris shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog dkar me// phyag g.yas na ral gri'o// g.yon 
156a4(rgyud 'grel): sdig mdzub dang rma bya'i sgo bsnams pa'o// sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyad can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad rin po chen brgyan pa/ lo bcu gnyis ma'i cha byad can/ zhi bar bzhugs shing pad+ma'i
156a5(rgyud 'grel): steng du zla ba'i gdan/ 'od kyang de bzhin te/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin can/ mtshan byed pa'i shes rab ste/ mtshon pa ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bdag nyid do// chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes gzugs 
156a6(rgyud 'grel): kyi phung po sa'i khams mig gi skye mched do// de lta bu'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gang zag bdag gis 'chang bar 'gyur na// yang dag par srung zhing sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'o// sbab 
156a7(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa rnams kyi glags tshol ba la sba ba'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ nad thams cad dang ma rungs pa rnams kyis bzung ba las bskyabs pa'o// yongs su
156a8(rgyud 'grel): bzung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa'i sems can rnams kyis bzung bar 'dod pa/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis gzung nas glags mi rnyed pa'o// yongs su bskyang ba dang zhes bya ba ni rig 
156b1(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis gang gis 'jigs pa dang sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing 'jigs pa thams cad bral ba ste/ rgya cher bskyang bas na yongs su bskyang ba'o// zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur/ 
156b2(rgyud 'grel): ba dang zhes bya ba ni zhi ba ni sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba ste/ de nye bar bzhag pas na bde ba'o// bde legasu 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni bde ba phun sum tshogs shing sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral// 
156b3(rgyud 'grel): nam skyes pa'i dus su yang bde ba'o// chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i gdon gyis chad pa gcod par 'dod pa la/ de'i gzi brjid kyis spang ba'o// mtshon cha spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni// 
156b4(rgyud 'grel): gzhan rnams kyis mtshon btab nas/ mi bde ba dang mi phog pa'i phyir na spang ba'o// dug gzhil ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mdze dang / phol mig dang g.yan pa dang / lba pa dang / sha kra dang / me pal 
156b5(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa mdze rigs bco brgyad sel ba'o// dug bsad pa dang zhes bya ba ni de rnams mi ldang bar bya ba'i phyir na bsad pa'o// mtshams bcad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ glags tshol ba rnams kyis 
156b6(rgyud 'grel): glags mi rnyed de/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags gar bzhag pa'i sar/ 'byung po rnams kyis 'od mi nus pa'o// sa bcing ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni rig sngags kyis sa la reg nas sa bcing

156b8(rgyud 'grel): shing bde bar gnas pa'o// tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ 'og tu blta ba'o// dri za'i snying po rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ su ru su ru su ru la sogs pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba na 
157a1(rgyud 'grel): dge slong sa ri dang sems can rnams la bka' stsal pa'o// lho phyogs na grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi lho phyogs na gnas pa 'jig rten lho phyogs 
157a2(rgyud 'grel): skyong ba/ sems can thams cad kyi don byed pa/ sa dang po thob pa/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis sku mdog mthing kha/ g.yas dbyug to// g.yon rin po che bsnams pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan/ 
157a3(rgyud 'grel): pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la zhugs pa bzhin mi sdug pa khro bor gnas pa'o// grol bum thams cad kyi bdag po grul bum stong phrag du ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum yi dgas kyi gdon rnams kyi bdag 
157a4(rgyud 'grel): po ste/ de bzhin du ma mo rnams kyang yin no// de rnams kyis btab pa'i mtshan ma ni/ shin tu skom gis 'debs par 'gyur/ g.yengs pas btab cing lta bar 'gyur/ bzhin yang dmar por lta bar 
157a5(rgyud 'grel): 'gyur/ skum nas sa la nyal bar 'gyur/ kha dog ngan cing lus kyang skem/ skra dang sen mo ring ba ste/ dri ma can la dri mi 'dag/ rdzun dang kyal pa smra bar bgyid// grul bum gyi gdon 'bum phrag du ma 
157a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa ni/ sems can rnams la gnod par bgyid cing rgyal po'i 'khor du gnas pa'o// grul bum rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa'o zhes bya ba ni grul bum gyi gdon rnams dbang du sdus cing / 
157a7(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o// de rnams kyi gnod pa'i rdzas ni gong dang mthun no// tshe grangs yang gong dang mthun no// gtor ma'i rdzas la khrag gam cha ngam/ sha'am nya'am sgog pa 
157a8(rgyud 'grel): 'am la phug gam/ san chan nam khung za ram bu ram gyi thug pa'am/ khrag gi gtor ma me tog ser po'i phreng ba dang / dog sa la me tog bkram la/ lho phyogs na gnas pa'i rgyal po rnams mchod 
157b1(rgyud 'grel): par bya'o// gang lho phyogs srung zhing yongs su skyong bar byed cing zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po ri rab kyi lho phyogs yongs su srung zhing / 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la srung bar byed 
157b2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de yang bu dang bcas/ tsha bo dang bcas/ spun dang bcas/ blon po dang bcas/ ded dpon dang bcas/ mngag pa dang bcas/ pho nya dang bcas/ g.yog dang bcas/ 'khor dang bcas pas 
157b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang / 'khor 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa de rnams kyi bu dang tsha bo la sogs pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srung ba gyis shig/ 
157b4(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ni thobs shes rab gnyis su med pa'o// ye shes mnyam pa nyid dang ldan pa tshor ba'i phung po'o// rin chen gyis rigs chu'i khams sna'i skye mched ye shes lnga'i rang
157b5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog ser po// phyag g.yas na ral gri/ g.yon rma bya'i sgo bsnams pa'o// sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ rgyan thams cad rin po ches brgyan pa'o// spyan 
157b6(rgyud 'grel): gsum pa zhabs phyed krung du bzhugs pa/ nyi ma'i gdan dang 'od dang ldan pa de'i 'og na pad+ma'i gdan la khro mor bzhugs pa'o// gang zag gang gi 'di la mos par gyur na/ rgyal po bzhi dang 'khor rnams 
157b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang de la srung zhing skyob par byed do// wa ba dang zhes bya ba la sogs pas ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o// tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ 'og tu blta ba ni gang zhe na/ grul bum gyi gdon 
157b8(rgyud 'grel): la sa gas tshogs rdzunas/ sas rna da la rgyas byas pal ba 'am // ba 
158a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyal pa mig me bzang shes byab na/ de rab kyi rtse pa'i nub phyogs kyi lug la bzhugs te/ nub phyogs kyi 'dzag rten sbyang ba/ klurnams kyi bdag pos dang pa thob pa/ byang chub kyi 
158a2(rgyud 'grel): sems dang ldan pa rnams pa// zhal gcig phug gnyis pa/ su mdog dmang ba/ g.yas na sbrul gyi nags pa/ g.yon pad+ma bsnams pa/ rin po che'i rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ pan+d+ha 
158a3(rgyud 'grel): gdanal bzhugs pa/ cung zad thabar bzhugs so// klu thams cad kyi bdag po 'khong 'bram phrag drub med pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po de'i gakhor yang klu dngas srinas bdag rnams yin te/ de rnams kyis 
158a4(rgyud 'grel): btab pa'i mtshan ma ni/ skyegs pus btab cing dbugs kyang 'byin// de bzhin dbugs kyang grang bar 'gyur// rdul zhing bcu lbu bar 'byung / phyir phyir gnyid kyis log par 'gyur// bdog ldan zhing 
158a5(rgyud 'grel): thabs te// de bzhin 'ad ning sdug par 'gyur// sen mo dag kyang ston par byed// tog tog 'tshig cing rdul bar byed// de bzhin du sems can rnams la mtshan ma btab nas/ rang gi mtshan yang 
158a6(rgyud 'grel): ngag dang 'dra ba'o// klu rnams la dbang byed du 'byung ba gnas te zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams dbang du 'dus shing 'jig rten nub phyogs skyong ba de rnams mchod pa'i rdzas gong dang mthun te/ tshe grangs kyang gos 
158a7(rgyud 'grel): dang mthun no// gtar ma'i rdzas ni mang gsum dang dkar gas pa'i thug dang gro chang dang krol khur ba'o ma las thus po'i gtor ma me tog dmar pa'i phreng ba me tog gsil mdogs la bkram la/ glu smar 
158a8(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pas mchod par bya'o// gang nub phyogs skyong zhing yongs su srung bar byed pa de yang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po spyan mi bzang des kyang ri rab kyi nub phyogs na yongs su skyong zhing sems 
158b1(rgyud 'grel): can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o// bu dang bcas pa la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po spyan mi bzang gi bul sogs pa dang / 'khod rnams kyi bral sogs pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal 
158b2(rgyud 'grel): porma bya chen mo 'dis bdag la srang bgyis shig ces bya ba ni rig sngags sde rtul mom bya chen ma ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ grwa mdog dmar mo phyag g.yas naral gri/ g.yon na ma bya'o 
158b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnabs pa'o// sangs rgyas lnga'i dburgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rin po che'i rgyun gyis brgyan pa/ so sor rtog pa'i ye shes/ pad+ma'i rigs 'du shes kyi phung po me'i khams/ lce'i 
158b4(rgyud 'grel): mchid/ ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ mtshan byed ni 'bas/ mtshan bya ni shes rab/ de gnyis su med pa'i rang bzhin na// de lta bu'i lha pa la gas par byed myur na/ gang zag de la srung bar byed cing 
158b5(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// wa ba zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o// tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ 'og tu blta'o// gang bltas shen/ bla rnams 
158b6(rgyud 'grel): slong po ga sngags kyigasang sngags ni/ 'i 'du shes byab la sogs pa'o// na dag ba zhes byab ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkar phul ba'o// byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi rgal ba rnam thos kyi bu nas byab na/ 
158b7(rgyud 'grel): byang phyogs kyi rgyal bu lus ngan pa yinate/ ri rab kyi rtsa ma'i byang phyugs kyi lcag la bzhugs te/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi mas sbyang ba'o// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sgra mdog ljang du/ 
158b8(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas na ras ze/ g.yan na na rje ma'i rgyal pa bsdams pa'i// rkyen thams cad rin pa mas brtan pa/ pad+ma gdanal bzhugs pa'o// gsus pa shing gang chung bza bar bzhugs pag/ 
159a1(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma yod pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po lus ngan po gnod sbyin thams cad ded dpon gyi 'khor rnams so// 'khor de dag gis btab pa'i mtshan ma ni/ phyir phyir

159a3(rgyud 'grel): shin tu dga' bar 'gyur// rtag tu 'dir zhing sgra yang 'byin// gnod sbyin gyi yang rang bzhin no// gnod sbyin rnams la dbang byed du 'jug pa gnas te zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma gnas pa rnams/

159a8(rgyud 'grel): ches brgyan pa nyi ma'i gdan dang nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa/ de'i 'og na pad+ma'o// zhabs phyed krung du bzhugs pa/ khro bor bzhugs pa'o// gang zag 'di la dad par gyur na/ srung bar 'gyur zhing mi shi bar bde bar 
159b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o// srab la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ sngar bshad pa bzhin no// tad+ya thA zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ gang lta bzhin 'og tu lta ba ni gnod sbyin gyi snying po ni/ rig sngags kyi gsang sngags ni/ sor sor 
159b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'o// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor srung zhes bya ba ni/ 'bum phrag du ma dri za dang bcas shing / shar phyogs skyong ba'o// lho phyogs na ni 'phags skyes po zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum gyi 'khor 
159b3(rgyud 'grel): 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas shing / lho phyogs srung ba'o// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang zhes bya ba ni klu'i 'khor rnams 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas shing / nub phyogs skyong ba'o// byang phyogs na ni lus

159b8(rgyud 'grel): dgod par bya/ rdo rje ra ba'i phyir ma la/ rgyal chen bzhi yi 'khor rnams dgod/ de bzhin 'byung po la sogs dang / mkhas pas yang dag bri bar bya// rgyal po bzhis dkyil 'khor gyi bya thabs so// 
160a1(rgyud 'grel): de nas bum pa'i bya thabs ni/ mtshan ma legs pa mgrin pa ring // nag por ri spangs pa dang / mchu 'phyang ltob che ba dang / dar ram ras sam gang yang rung / mgrin pa yang 
160a2(rgyud 'grel): par bcing bar bya// rin chen lnga dang 'bru lnga dang // sman lnga dri lnga snying po lnga// chu gtsang gis ni legs par dgang // gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan dang / lo ma lnga dang ldan pa dang / bkra shis brgyad dang

160a5(rgyud 'grel): du bsrung ba byas na/ rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang 'jig rten skyong zhing nad pa yang skyong bar 'gyur ro// 'jig rten skyong ba grags dang ldan zhes bya ba ni/ gling bzhi'i ri rab dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams// 
160a6(rgyud 'grel): na grags pa'o// phyogs bzhi dag ni skyong bar byed// ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis chos skyong ba byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po thob nas sems can rnams kyi don 
160a7(rgyud 'grel): mdzad pa'o// sde bo che la stobs po che zhes bya ba ni dri za dang / grul bum dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang / de rnams kyi ded dpon to/ de rnams la che bar mdzad cing 'jig rten la grags pa'i stobs dang ldan pa'o// 
160a8(rgyud 'grel): pha rol dgra rnams rab tu 'joms zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi yul la pha rol 'dul ba'o// gzhan gyis mi thub zul bar dka' zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan 'jig rten gyi lha rnams kyis mi thub pa stobs/ 
160b1(rgyud 'grel): che ba dang ldan pa'o// rdzu 'phrul ldan zhing 'od dang ldan zhes bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen mo'i 'jig rten gyi khams skad cig mas khyab cing sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o// de bzhin du kha dog ldan 
160b2(rgyud 'grel): zhing grags dang ldan zhes bya ba ni/ so so rang rang gi kha dog ldan zhing / de bzhin grags pa yang yin no// rdzu 'phrul che zhing lha min dang / lha yi yul yang myong bar byed ces bya ba ni/ lha dang l+h+wa ma yin gyi spyod pa la

160b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dang po 'khor lo// 'og ma na rma bya'i sgo tha ma gnyis na mnga' gzhu 'geng pa'o// zhabs rdo rje skyil grung du bzhugs pa/ sna tshogs pad+ma'i steng du zla ba'i gdan/ nyi ma bdun dang ldan pa'i 'od mnga'

162a8(rgyud 'grel): brag ces bya ba ni de ni gnas yin te/ gnod sbyin gyi sku mdog ni mthing dag/ g.yas g.yon gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o// shed kyi bu ni byang phyogs na zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi byang phyogs na sgra mi snyan na 
162b1(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa stobs dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid che ba'o// de'i kha dog ni gser dang 'dra ba/ g.yas na dbyug togayon na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// lag na rdo rje rgyal po'i khab ces bya ba ni/ rgya gar gyi yul grong khyer dbus na rgyal po'i khab kyi 
162b2(rgyud 'grel): lho phyogs na gnas pa'o// sku mdog mthing kha/ g.yas na rdo rje g.yon sdig mdzub bo// bra rgod phung po'i gnas bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin lag na rdo rje ni/ pho brang bya rgod phung por byas nas khams 
162b3(rgyud 'grel): gsum du skad cig mas rgyu ba'o// rgya mtsho'i mtha'i bar gyi sar// lan gsum bar du 'gro byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ rgya mtsho dang bya rgod phung po gnyis la/ lan gsum gsum rgyu ba'o// skad cig mas 
162b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dzam bu'i gling bar gnas rgyu ba'o// stobs che zhing ni gzi brjid che/ dpag tshad bcu ni rnam par gnon zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyi stobs dang 'gram par mi nus pa/ gzi brjid kyang de bzhin no// lus kyi 
162b5(rgyud 'grel): tshad ni dpag tshad bcur sprul pa'o// gnod sbyin mkha' ldeng rgyas pa ni zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu ba ni nam mkha' la rgyu ba ste/ gnas ni mkha'i rtse mo na'o// gzugs bya dang 'dra ba lus ser po gshog pa nag go// 
162b6(rgyud 'grel): mjug ma yang nag po// mchu sngon po ring ba/ lag pa dang rkang pa sder mo ring ba/ mig ser ba/ g.yas g.yon gnyis ni sbrul za ba'o// skad cig ma dpag tshad lnga brgya lnga brgyar 'phur nus pa'o// 
162b7(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs sbed pa gnas sgon zhes bya ba ni/ de yang 'dzam+bu gling gi lho phyogs na gnas sgo zhes bya ba'i yul na'o// gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog ni/ shin tu dmar ba/ khro ba'i tshul du yod pa/ phyag g.yas g.yon 
162b8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis na mda' gzhub snams pa'o// gnod sbyin ba ku la rgyal khab na zhes bya ba ni/ gnas ni rgyal po'i khab kyi dbus na'o// sku mdog ni ljang gu'o// bzhin mi sdug pa/ gzugs thung ba/ phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na 
163a1(rgyud 'grel): nor bu rgyal ba 'dzin pa'o// sde bo che la stobs po che zhes bya ba ni/ ba ku la ni 'khor mang po yod pa/ gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan pa'o// gnod sbyin nag po nye nag po// ser skya yi ni gnas 
163a2(rgyud 'grel): na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ chu bo gang+gA'i 'gram shar phyogs na gnas pa'o// gnod sbyin nag po nye dag po// de bas kyang dag pas nye nag po// gnod sbyin de gnyis kyang phyag gnyis gnyis/ g.yas pa na rin po che 'dzin pa'o// 
163a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon ne'u le'i rgyal ba bsnams pa'o// thub pa chen po shAkya'i rtog/ sangs rgyas thub pa gang bstan par zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi dbus chu bo gang+gA'i lho phyogs na/ der sangs rgyas gnas pa'o// phyag gnyis sku 
163a4(rgyud 'grel): mdog gser gyi mdog can rab tu byung ba'i gzugs su bzhugs pa'o// rkang bkra bo ni dgra can la zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar gyi yul gyi dbus/ lho nub kyi mtshams na'o// gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ 
163a5(rgyud 'grel): sku mdog mthig sa/ g.yas g.yon gnyis rtse gcig dang / dung rnams pa'o// rtsi tan dbang phyug che zhes bya ba ni 'dzam gling gi rub phyogs na gnas te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog sngo lha phyag g.yas pa 
163a6(rgyud 'grel): gnyis na phreng ba dang bum pa/ g.yon pa gnyis na tri shul dang a 'bras bsnams pa'o// spyan gsum ba ral pa'i thor tshugs can no// mnyan yod na ni phur bu'o// zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi dbus kyi grong khyer na/ 
163a7(rgyud 'grel): rgyal bu mgon medas bdun na'o// gnod sbyin phur bun/ sku mdog dkar po// g.yas g.yon gnyis na mda' ga'u 'dzin pa'o// gnas ni rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin rgya mtshoni nal gcig phyag 
163a8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis te/ sku mdog dkar po// sbrul gyi nags pa 'dzin pa'o// yangs pa can na rdo rje mtsho zhes bya ba ni/ rgyagar yul gyi dbus kyi grong khyer na gnas pa'o// sku bdog ser po rin po che'i phrer ba 'dzin pa'o// spre'u ltang 
163b1(rgyud 'grel): dmar ser gyad yul na zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar yul gyi byang ngos na yin te/ gnod sbyin de ni sku mdog dmar po// phyag na gtun shing 'dzin pa'o// ba ra na ser nag po che zhes bya ba ni/ de yang 'dzam+bu gling gi dbus su chu tho gang+gA'i 'gram 
163b2(rgyud 'grel): na'o// gnod sbyin nag po chen po ni zhal gsum phyag drug pa/ sku mdog mthing nag spyan gsum pa'o// g.yas pa gsum na ral gri gri gug rtse gsum mo// g.yon pa gsum na tsan dan gyi be con dang thod pa zhags pa 
163b3(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o// blta na sdug pa tsam pa na/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar yul shar phyogs na/ shin tu byed mtshar ba gnod sbyin lhan sdug gi gnas so// sku mdog dkar po phyag na pad+ma bsnams pa'o// gnod sbyin khyab 'jug 
163b4(rgyud 'grel): sgo can na zhes bya ba ni phyi'i rgya mtsho'i 'gram mo// sku mdog ldang nag phyag bzhi pa g.yas pa gnyis na/ 'khor lo dang a 'bras/ g.yon pa gnyis dbyug te dang dung bsnams pa'o// 'dzin pa po sgo drung na zhes bya ba ni/ de yang 
163b5(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho'i 'gram na yin te/ sku mdog ser po phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na/ ut+pa la'i phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// 'jigs byed zangs kyi 'dab man zhes bya ba ni/ lho nub kyi mtshams rgya mtsho'i 'gram na'o// sku mdog 
163b6(rgyud 'grel): dpar skya g.yas ral gri/ g.yon sdigs 'dzub bo// brang gi 'gron 'joms pa po zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar gyi byang ngos na'o// gnod sbyin dmar s+ya/ phyag na rtse gsum bsnams pa'o// 'brog na gnod sbyin 'brog 
163b7(rgyud 'grel): gnas so zhes bya ba ni 'dzam+bu gling gi thang stong rnams la gnas pa/ sku mdog nag po phyag g.yas na ral gri/ g.yon na zhags pa'o// ser skya ba ni 'bru mangs na zhes bya ba ni/ de yang rgya gar yul gyi dbus su/ gnod 
163b8(rgyud 'grel): sbyin padog ser skya/ phyag na dbyug to bsdams pa'o// 'phags rgyal na ni nor srung ba zhes bya ba ni 'dzam+bu gling gis dbus su'o// gnod sbyin sku mdog ser po phyag drug pa g.yas pa gsum ni phyag 'tshal 
164a1(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / nor gyi sde ma dang / mchod sbyin no// g.yon pa gsum na po ti dang 'bras kyi ske ma dang bum pa'o// sung byed na ni nor 'byor pa zhes bya ba ni/ yul de'i lho phyogs na'o// sku mdog ser po g.yas na rin po che 
164a2(rgyud 'grel): bum pa bsnams pa'o// g.yon na ser gyi bum pa bsnams pa'o// gso ba'i mtha' na gso ba zhes bya ba ni/ nub kyi phyogs na gnas te/ gnod sbyin gso ba po ni/ sku mdog ljang gu phyag na ne'u le bsnams 
164a3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// dga' ba nye dga' grang khyer gnas zhes bya ba ni/ yul dbus na'o// de gnyis kyang sku mdog ser po// sbrul gyi zhags pa bsdams pa'o// phreng ba 'dzin pa chu mchog na zhes bya ba ni/ de yang 'dzam+ba gling 
164a4(rgyud 'grel): gi dbus na gnas te/ gnod sbyin gyi kha dog ni dmar po phyag na gser gyi phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// kun dga' bo 'chi med sa bzhag ma zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam+bu'i gling gi shar phyogs na'o// sku mdog ser po phyag na rdo rje 
164a5(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o// mche ba dkar po ngos bzang na zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi shang phyogs na gnod sbyin mche ba can gnas te/ sku mdog dkar po phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// ming bstan pa ni gzi brjid can zhes bya ba ni/ 
164a6(rgyud 'grel): rgya mtsho'i bar na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin gyi kha dog ni mthing nag tu yod pa/ phrag na lcags kyu bsdams pa'o// rin chen ri ldan grong khyer na/ zhes bya ba ni/ ri bo chen po'i bar na/ grong khyer lta na sdug gi dbus 
164a7(rgyud 'grel): na/ rnam par rgyal ba'i gzhal yas khang gi srung ma'o// gnod sbyin de ni stobs dang ldan pa/ gzi brjid che ba'o// de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni sku mdog nag po// g.yas na gri gug g.yon na thod pa 
164a8(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pa'o// nor gyi bu ni phyogs mtshams rnams zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin rnam thos kyi bu yin te ri rab kyi phyogs mtshams na gnas pa'o// sku mdog ser po// g.yas na rin po che'i myu gu/ g.yon na/ 
164b1(rgyud 'grel): bum pa bsnams pa'o// smin drag bu ni gzhon nu zhes// 'jig rten grags pa skye yod na zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin de ni sku mdog dmang po'o// g.yas na rtse gcig g.yon na phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// de'i 'og ma'i gnod sbyin 
164b2(rgyud 'grel): ni thal ba'i mdog can lcags kyu 'dzin pa'o// 'og ma'i 'graman lag brgya pa zhes bya ba ni/ rdo rje gdan gyi lho phyogs nags gseb na'o// gnod sbyin shin du 'jigs pa sku mdog dmar skya/ phyag na dgra sta bsnams 
164b3(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// ka l-i ka na shing rta che zhes bya ba ni rgya gar yul gyi lho phyogs so// gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog ni dkar po phyag na rtse gsum bsdams pa'o// thul bar dka' ni 'gro 'dzams na zhes bya ba ni/ de yang dbus kyi nub phyogs 
164b4(rgyud 'grel): su// 'dog ser po phyag na bum pa bil ba bsnams pa'// srid sgrub nags ni sring grub pa zhes bya ba ni drang khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi nags na'o// gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog ni sde skya phyag na dbyug to bsnams pa'o// 
164b5(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin 'joms pa'i mdun khang na zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar yul gyi byang shar mtshams na gnas so// gnod sbyin gyi sku mdog ri ser skya ste/ gser gyi rgyal bu 'dzin pa'o// phreng ba bsrung ni ri rtsegs pa zhes bya ba ni 
164b6(rgyud 'grel): gser gyi ri rab kyi steng gi byang phyogs na gnas pa'o// gnod sbyin mdog ser po lag na phreng ba 'dzin pa'o// rta dmang na ni bzang po pa zhes bya ba ni de yang dang cig gi yul yin te/ gnod sbyin sku sku mdog dmar po phyag na 
164b7(rgyud 'grel): lcags kyu dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o// ma rdzogs pa ni thams cad bzang zhes bya ba ni yul de yang rgya nag po'i byang phyogs na mi nyag ces bya ba'o// de na gnod sbyin de gnas te/ gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog phyag mtshan 
164b8(rgyud 'grel): ni g.yas na 'bras 'dzin pa g.yon na nor gyi rkyal ba 'dzin pa'o// snyems pa can na skyong ba po zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin sde dpon ni rnam thos kyi sras yin te/ rgya nag po'i shar phyogs na gnas te/ de yang khri stan gyi 
165a1(rgyud 'grel): yul nal// de na gnas pa'i gnad sbyin gyi phyag mtshan ni/ g.yas nangal kyi 'dzin pa/ g.yan na na rje bum pa bsnams pa'o// dadud pa na nar gyi dbang thug ga nas zla ban/ 
165a2(rgyud 'grel): gnad sbyin gyi sbed pon ni rnam thos kyis sras yin te/ gnar gyi dbang gis rnam thos kyi yang ded dben no// maN+Dal rgyal na mcha ba gtsigs zhes bya ba ni/ rgyan ga pa'i yul na gnas pa ste/ don nu nag pa'i spang / 
165a3(rgyud 'grel): mar 'gyur zhing khrims rnams gnod sbyin des byas pa'o// de'i sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ g.yas dbyug togayon zhags pa'o// kha dog ni dmar nag go// gnas bcas ni na nor bzang po zhes bya ba ni/ de yang lcang 
165a4(rgyud 'grel): can gyi gnas na gnas la/ gnod sbyin de'i sgra mdog dang phyug mtshan ni/ su mdog dkar po g.yas na rin po che'i sdong // g.yon na gser gyi myu gu'o// ni bzhi pa'i grong lenan zhes bya ba ni/ don pal yul gyi gnas yin na// 
165a5(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin ni zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa sku mdog dkar po dang sngo skya dang ljang gu dang / mthing nag tu gnas pa'o// phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na phreng ba dang skyabs sbyin/ yang g.yas g.yon gnyis na rtsa gsum dang breng ba de'i 
165a6(rgyud 'grel): 'og gnas na 'khor lo dang dbyug ka'o// tha ma gnyis na rtsegasum dang thod pa'o// zhi ba bzang po 'jigs byed ni zhes bya ba ni/ mtshom dris kyi byung ngos na'o// gangs kyi rin yod pa ste// gnod sbyin de ni yab yum du bcas pa mdog ser po// g.yas/ 
165a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi phyag na tA~M shU la/ g.yon na phreng ba bsnams pa'o// yum gyi phyag na ut+pal bsnams pa'o// gnod sbyin dbang po dang grong na zhes bya ba ni ri rab kyi rtsom pazang ldan sdug pa na'o// gnod sbyin da ni rdo rje 'dzin pa/ 
165a8(rgyud 'grel): sku mad gsar ba'o// matag tag na rje song na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ dan dpal kyi na gnas te/ gnad sbyin de ni gzi brjid che dang sa pas dang ldan pa'o// phyag ga la san phreng ba 'dzin pa/ g.yonan grum 
165b1(rgyud 'grel): bsnams pal// kha dog dkar ba'o// shing pa shing gi grong khyer na zhes bya ba ni/ de yang rim la yan yod pa ste/ de ni tsan dan gyi shing gi srang ma'o// gnod sbyin de'i sku mdog dang phrag mtshan ni/ mdog spobs pa 
165b2(rgyud 'grel): su yod pa/ phyag g.yas na ral gri yod pa/ g.yon na phreng ba bsdams pa'o// kha dog can ni ser sbyar gnas zhes bya ba ni/ yul bad yul na bzhugs pa'o// bad yul dbus na'o// gnod sbyin de ni g.yas na 
165b3(rgyud 'grel): 'khor la g.yon na gshol mda' 'dzin pa'o// sku ma dog ljang gur gnas pa'o// nor bu bzang dang gang ba bzang zhes bya ba ni/ rnam thas sras kyi 'khor pa brang lung la can na gnas pa'o// de gnyis su ma dag dang phyag mtshan 
165b4(rgyud 'grel): ni kha dag ser po dang / dkar po'o// g.yas rnams na rin po che'i myu gu dang nor gyis gang ba'i bum pa'o// g.yon rnams na nor gyi rgyal pa dang 'bru sna tshogs kyis gang ba'i bum pa bsnams pa'o// spun gnyis tshangs pa 
165b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan par zhes bya ba ni nor bu bzang po dang gang ba bzang po gnyis te/ gzi brjid che zhing nor phun sum tshogs pa'o// ba lang 'dzin na 'joms pa pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnas bal yul gyi byung ngos yin te/ gnod sbyin de ni/

165b7(rgyud 'grel): la gnod pa byed pa'o// de'i kha dog ni ljang gur yod pa/ bzhin mi sdug pa/ g.yas ral gri g.yon zhags pa bsnams pa'o// gnod sbyin chen po 'od srungs sel zhes bya ba ni/ bod yul na gnas te/ 
165b8(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin de yang srung mal dga' zhing gnas pa g.yas na skra stagayon zhags pa bsnams pa'o// kha dog thal ba'i mdog can no// skyugs pa yi ni ril gnas zhes bya ba ni/ 'dzam+bu gling gi lho phyogs 
166a1(rgyud 'grel): na gnas pa/ stobs po che la gzi brjid ldan de'i kha dog phyag mtshan ni kha dog dmar po gri gug dang thod pa 'dzin pa'o// gsum sbas 'gram pa ldan dog na zhes bya ba ni/ laM ka'i

166a3(rgyud 'grel): bar na'o// gnod sbyin mdog ser po// g.yas na a so ka'i shing thogs pa/ g.yon na zhags pa thogs pa'o// dga' ba can dang 'phel byed pa zhes bya ba ni// yul ma ga d+ha'i lho nub mtshams na gnas

166a6(rgyud 'grel): par mnga' mdzad pa/ de'i sku mdog phyag mtshan ni/ phyag g.yas na dbyug to 'dzin pa/ g.yon sdigs mdzub bo// kha dog khra bor yod pa/ smad sbrul du yod pa'o// 'phyang bar gyur na 'thab dga'

166a8(rgyud 'grel): gnyis na mda' gzhu 'gongs pa'o// gnod sbyin des skad cig mas khyab nas/ rtsod pa'i sems dang ldan par byed pa'o// bcom brlag na ni bung bu ba zhes bya ba ni/ yul laM kan rgya mtsho'i 'gram na 
166b1(rgyud 'grel): yod pa/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i tshul can sems can la gnod cing sha khrag za ba/ de'i kha dog ni dmar nag go// phyag na sbrul gyi zhags pa bsnams pa'o// laM ka na ni bum pa'i lto zhes bya ba ni 'dza pU gling gi lho 
166b2(rgyud 'grel): nub mtshams yin te/ gzugs ni dpag tshad bcu yod pa/ shin tu gnag la 'jig pa laM ka'i bdag po'i nub bo// phyag brgyad yod pa g.yas na ral gri bar pa gnyis 'khor lo dang shag ti/ tha man mda'/ 
166b3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon dang po na zhags pa 'phabs mdud dgra sta rtse gsum mo// gnod sbyin de ni stobs che ba ri rab tsam bskal ba'o// gnod sbyin nyi 'od rab nyams na zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba nyi ma'i 'od bzhin du// 
166b4(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams khyab pa gzi bzid che ba/ de'i kha dog ni dmar po// phyag g.yas g.yon na dung dang pad+ma dmar po bsnams pa'o// skad cig mas 'jig rten gyi khams rgyu ba'o// ko sa la ni ri mgo bo zhes bya 
166b5(rgyud 'grel): ba ni yul ma ga d+ha'i lho phyogs na gnod sbyin stobs ldan yod de/ 'od nyi ma shar ba dang 'dra ba/ shin tu dmar ba'o// sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa srung ba'o// zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ g.yas 'khor lo zhags

166b7(rgyud 'grel): sbyin de ni spun lnga gnas te/ dpag tshad ring dang 'jigs pa dang rna ba can dang / gzugs can dang / bum sna'o// de rnams kyi kha dog ni dkar po dang / nag po dang / ser po dang / dmar po dang / ljang gu'o// 
166b8(rgyud 'grel): phyag mtshan ni 'khor lo dang / dbyug to dang / mda' gzhu dang / 'phang mdung dang / mdung ri rnams so// gnod sbyin gang ba ma la yang zhes bya ba ni/ ma ga d+ha'i lho phyogs rgya mtsho'i 'gram na ri bo ma la ya na 
167a1(rgyud 'grel): de'i mnga' bdag tu mdzad pa kha dog dkar ba// phyagan tsan dan gyi bcon 'dzin pa'o// ti se'i gangs na mi 'am ci zhes bya ba ni/ mnga' stong na gnas de gnod sbyin na mgo can gnas pa/ 
167a2(rgyud 'grel): kha dog dmar po// dbyug te 'dzin pa/ sprin gyi phreng can spo 'dran zhes bya ba de/ la yul na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin sprin gyi mag can/ phyag na nyi ma dang thab pa snams pa'o// rab tu gnas na du bu pa zhes bya ba 
167a3(rgyud 'grel): ni/ de yang skyon na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin de'i kha dog ni dkar po phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o// ba taM ka mar yang dag byed ces bya ba ni bod yul dbus su chu shar nas nu pa 
167a4(rgyud 'grel): 'bab pa'i san gnas te/ gnod sbyin de ni khe dag dmar nag/ lag pa gnyis na tsan dan gyi btson 'dzin pa'o// de'is phyogs kyi bsrung ma grags pa'o// rlabs dang ldanan pade byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin 
167a5(rgyud 'grel): de sems can rnams kyis bsgrubs par gyur na/ mthu dang ldan ning dngos grub ster ba'o// sna nas byung nas gnod sbyin mdzes zhes bya ba ni/ bod yul dbus chu shar phyogs su 'bab pa'i sa/ chu klung byung nas lhor 
167a6(rgyud 'grel): 'bab pa'o// de'i mngon gnas pa'o// skad cig mas 'jig rten khams rgyu nus pa/ dang po shar phyogs nas byung nas/ rab tu byung ba'i tshul du gnas pa/ de ni sems can rnams la gnod pa drag po byed pa ste/ 
167a7(rgyud 'grel): gnas de'i srungs mar gnas pa'o// gso ba'i mtha' nam chags pa zhes bya ba ni/ de'i byang ngos na gnod sbyin kha dog dkar po can yod de/ de yang sa bdag gi tshul du yod pa/ de bas kyang skad cig mas 'jig rten 
167a8(rgyud 'grel): khams rgyu nus pa/ kha dog dkar po sbrul zhags 'dzin pa'o// dga' byed de ni pha dga' ba zhes bya ba ni/ de ni khams kyi yul na gnas te/ de yang pha pad du yod pa/ sems can rnams la phan 'dogs pa/ 
167b1(rgyud 'grel): de grub par gyur na phyug por 'gyur ro// de gnyis kyi kha dog nag po dang ser po gnyis kas nor gyi rgyal ba bsnams pa'o// dpa' da gser gyi lag pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgya gar gyi yul lho phyogs na gnas pa'o// 
167b2(rgyud 'grel): shin tu stobs dang ldan pa/ gzhan rnams kyis mi thub/ gser gyi mdog can gser gyi bum pa gang ba bsnams pa'o// ka laM ka na lto 'phyang po zhes bya ba ni/ de yang rgya gar yul gyi dbus kyi lho phyogs na/ 
167b3(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin kha dog nag po phyag na 'khor lo bsnams pa'o/ ko sa la na nag po che zhes bya ba ni yul ma ga d+ha na yin te/ gnod sbyin nag po chen po yin te de yang zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog nag po g.yas

172b3(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas na rtse gsum g.yon na phreng ba bsnams pa'o// ka liM ka na rab 'joms pa zhes bya ba ni rgya gar dbus na gnod sbyin kha dog nag po gri gug dang thod pa bsnams pa'o// tshigs lnga ser po 'gro lding na 
172b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni rdo rje gdan gyi lho phyogs na gnod sbyin sku mdog ser po phyag na bum pa gser gyis bkang ba bsnams pa'o// saM ka li na nor gyi bdag ces bya ba ni sing+ga'i gshel mda'i yul phyi'i rgya mtsho'i tshal na gnod sbyin
172b5(rgyud 'grel): de gnas pa kha deg gur kum gyi mdog can phyag g.yas na rin po che'i snod dang / gser gyi rgyal bu bsnams pa'o// ne co bzhin ni 'brog gnas te/ zhes bya ba ni rdo rje'i gdan gyi nags tshal chen po na gnod sbyin 
172b6(rgyud 'grel): kha dog dmar nag phyag na ral gre zhags pa'o// 'gro'am cin 'og na gnas zhes bya ba ni/ gnas ni sa 'og 'gro'am ci ni ming kha dog ni sngobasangs phyag g.yas na sbrul zhags g.yon drang bsnams pa'o// 
172b7(rgyud 'grel): smad sprul la// pad+ma dkar po'i 'od gsal ba zhes bya ba ni/ de ni gzugs khams na gnas pa ste/ de'i 'dog ni dkar po// g.yas na phreng ba/ g.yon na bum pa spyi thugs bsnams pa'o// grong khyer chen/ 
172b8(rgyud 'grel): rje ba can zhes bye ba ni sum du dra gsum gyi gnasen gnod khyen chen po gnas pa'o// 'dog ser po// g.yas na skyabs sbyin g.yon rje bskams pa'o// 'jigs pa sbyin ni rab 'jigs pa/

173a4(rgyud 'grel): rtsa gsum gyi byang phyogs ni gnod sbyin 'dod pa zhes bya ba gnas te/ 'dod pa'i lha mo lnga dang ldan pa/ phyag g.yas na 'dang pa'i mda' lnga bsnams pa/ g.yon na me tig gi gzhu bsnams pa'o// 'i rgyal 
173a5(rgyud 'grel): mtshan dang chu srin gyi rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa'o// bu mo 'jug na rab bsad pa zhes bya ba ni/ ba ra NA si'i shar phyogs na seng ge lha'i yul du gnas pa'i gnod sbyin seng ge gnas pa'o// gzugs ni ser 
173a6(rgyud 'grel): ge'i gzugs su snang ba'o// ga pu sha na na la ku bar zhes bya ba ni de'i shar phyogs bal yul dang / rgya gar gyi so mtshams na/ gnod sbyin chen po khyi'i gzugs su snang ba'o// pha rol mda' med rdul chun 
173a7(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ rgya nag po'i shar phyogs gshin rje'i 'dam gseb na/ gnod sbyin kha dog dmar po phyag na me sgron dang zhags pa bsnams pa'o// nus pa'i gnas na zhi byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ yul ma ga d+hA'i

173b6(rgyud 'grel): nang zhes bya ba ni/ ma ga d+ha'i sa mtshams na 'dod chen zhes bya ba'i gnod sbyin gnas te/ sku medog zal ba'i mdog can/ phyag gnyis na mda' gzhu bsnams pa'o// sna tshogs sde ni bo ga na zhes bya

174a8(rgyud 'grel): a ri bu ra/ g.yon na ne'u le'i rkyal ba bsnams pa'o// lha las babs na rnam thos bu/ rang gi ste ni yongs su skyeng zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi khyim srung zhing gnod sbyin gyi ded pon du mar gnas pa/ de rnams
174b1(rgyud 'grel): stong zhi dbang mdzad pa'o// lung lo can na gnas pa ste/ gnod sbyin bye bas kun nas bskor zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu yang gnod sbyin thams cad kyi ded dpon bzang ljang lo can la gnod sbyin du/

177a7(rgyud 'grel): srung ba/ gzi brjid che ba sgrubs dang ldan pa// grags pa dang ldan pa/ kha dag dang ldan pa/ rje 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lA dang l+h+wa ma yin gyi g.yul myong bar byed pag/ 'di lta ste nas bu ba ni gnod sbyin 
177a8(rgyud 'grel): bzhi b.rub kyangs kyi bzhi blta pal// seng ge dang seng ge'i ral pa dang / tham dang ser spyag/ zhes bya ba / gad sbyin zin pa de dag ni dag sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba ste/ de rnams 
177b1(rgyud 'grel): mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ dmar po dang / nag po dang / dkar po dang / ljang gu'o g.yas rnams na/ pad+ma dang / rdo rje dang / 'khor lo dang / ral gri'o// g.yon pa rnams na rtse gcig dang / to mar dang / 
177b2(rgyud 'grel): 'phang mdung dang mdung rings bsnams pa'o// gnod sbyin de rnams ni mthu che zhing cung zad khro bar gnas pa'o// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo 'di bdag la bsrung bgyis shig ces
177b3(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ gang zag gang gis lus ngag yid kyi mos par byas nas bdag gi nad mdze la sogs pa med par 'gyur ro// bsgoms pa dang / kha don byed pa la sogs pa byas par gyur na/ nad de da ltar 
177b4(rgyud 'grel): yang mi 'byung ste/ tshe phyi ma yang de bzhin no// sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin bzhi po dag gis kyang bsrung ba dang / skyob par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang bshad pa ni gong nas shes 
177b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni bcom ldan 'das kyis sems can gyi don du gsungs pa'o// byang phyogs na gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po gang dag byang phyogs skyong zhing yongs su srung bar 
177b6(rgyud 'grel): byed pa bzhi gnas te/ zhes bya ba ni bzhi po de dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung bar byed pa bzhi gnas te/ zhes bya ba ni bzhi po dag gis kyang gzi brjid che ba stobs dang ldan pa/ 
177b7(rgyud 'grel): grags pa dang ldan pa/ 'od zer dang ldan pa/ kha dog ldan pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul yang myong bar byed pa'o// de dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin chen po rnams kyis 
177b8(rgyud 'grel): dge sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o// 'di lta ste zhes bya ba ni/ gnad sbyin chen po bzhi po dag zung nges nas k+ta'o// 'dzin pa dang / 'dzin dga' ba dang / brtson sbyang dang / khyab 'jug gnas 
178a1(rgyud 'grel): ba ni gnod sbyin chen po bzhi pa de dag ni/ mthu chen po dang ldan pa/ de dag gi sku mdog dang phyag mtshan ni/ ljang nag dang / nag po dang / ser po dang / dkar po'o// g.yas rnams ni 
178a2(rgyud 'grel): ral gri dang / rdo rje dang / rin po che dang / 'ab ka'// g.yan pa rnams na zhags pa dang / dgras dang / rtse gsam mo// mda' gzhu bsdams pa'o// gnad sbyid chen po de dag ni thobar gnas pa gsus pa 
178a3(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o// de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma thu chen mo 'dis bdag la bsrung bgyis shig bya ba ni gang bag gis gus par byas na sdug pasngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur te/ 
178a4(rgyud 'grel): yi ge gcig tsam klog par byed na/ gus pa dang bcas pas mtshan nas brjod par bya ste/ gnod sbyin chen po de dag gis kyang da ltar yang srung bar byed pa dang / tshe byi ma la yang srung bar byed pa'o// srab dang zhes bya 
178a5(rgyud 'grel): bal sogs pa ni sngar bshad pa bzhin du shes par bya'o kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can gyi don du bka' phul pa'o// gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po gang dag phyogs 
178a6(rgyud 'grel): mtshams na gnas te/ zhes bya ba ni shar lho dang / lho ru ba dang / nub byung dang / brang shar mtshams na gnas pa'o// gang dag phyogs mtshams bsrung zhing yongs su myong bar byed pa bzhi po 'di dag ste zhes bya ba ni/ 
178a7(rgyud 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa bsrung ba ste/ sems can rnams kyi don byed pa ste/ gnod sbyin de dag ni/ rdzu 'phrul che ba/ stobs dang ldan pa/ grags pa dang ldan pa/ kha dog dang ldan

178b2(rgyud 'grel): na pad+ma dkar po dang / ut+pal ser po dang / pad+ma dmar po dang / ut+pal sngon po'o// g.yor rnams ra 'khor lo dang / rdo rje dang / dbyug to dang / ral gri rnams so// gnod sbyin bzhi po de yang rim bzhin du zhi ba'i

178b8(rgyud 'grel): sbyin bzhi po sa la gnas pa ltar ro// sa pa dang shin tus pa dang nag po dang nye nag po dang zhes bya ba ni de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing 'og nas srung bar byed pa'o// de rnams kyi sku mdog dang phyag

179b4(rgyud 'grel): su skyong ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ mngal nas btsas ka dang / btsas ma thag tu skyes nas kyang ma shi bar du skyong ba'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po dang / nad rnams dang / sdug bsngal

179b6(rgyud 'grel): bde legs su 'gyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ lus ngag yid bde ba ste/ 'dis nus pas lus ngag yid bde bar byed pa'o// chad pa spang ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po dang 'byung po la sogs pa'i chad pa spang

179b8(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i dug gsum gzhil ba'o// dug gsum pa dang zhes bya ba ni dug gsum po de dag kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ lus la zhugs pa thams cad kyang 'joms par byed pa'o// mtshams bcad

182a4(rgyud 'grel): bdag la srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ gang nas gang du rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo la gus par byas na/ kha don byed pa dang / klog pa dang / mchod pa byed pa dang / bsnyen bgur byed pa dang / rgya cher spel ba

182a7(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / de rnams la yang / gnod sbyin de rnams kyis bsrung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro// 'tshang 'bru ba dang / 'thab mo dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyis sems mi bde zhing 'tshang 'brubs te/ de rnams 
182a8(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'tshang 'brur mi ster te/ bsrung ba dang skyob par 'gyur te/ 'thab pa la yang de bzhin du bsrung bar 'gyur ro// 'gyed pa las yongs su skyobs shig ces bya ba ni/ glo bur gyi bgegs rnams dang / bdud 
182b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi 'tshe bar byed pa la yang srung ba dang skyobs par byed pa'o// mi'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal po 'am chom rkun la sogs pa'o// mi ma yin pa'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ bdud rnams glags tshol ba'o// 
182b2(rgyud 'grel): lha'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni lha'i dbang po brgya byin la sogs pa 'dod lha ris drug gi lha rnams so// klu'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po dga' bo la sogs pa rigs brgyad kyi klu rnams so// lha ma yin gyi gdon 
182b3(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha ma yin gyi rgyal po thag bzangs ris bye ba 'bum phrag dud pUr tsam lha ma yin rnams so// rlung lha'i gdor dang zhes bya ba ni rlung lha'i rgyal po rnam par dga' byed la sogs pa rlung gi gdon 
182b4(rgyud 'grel): bdun dang / bye ba khrag khrig dung phyur tsam mo// nam mkha' lding gi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po gser mig la sogs pa bya khyung gi rigs lnga dang / de la sogs pa'i bye ba dung phyur tsam mo// 
182b5(rgyud 'grel): dri za'i gdon dang / zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po zur phud lnga pa la sogs pa de yang bye ba de dung phyung tsam mo// mi 'am ci'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ mi 'am ci'i rgyal po ljon pa la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab 
182b6(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// lto 'phye chen po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ lto 'phye'i rgyal po bzang po la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur tsam mo// gnod sbyin gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin chen po lnga rtsen la sogs pa 'phrog ma'i bu lnga
182b7(rgyud 'grel): brgya dang bcas pa'o// srin po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni srin po'i rgyal po 'jigs pa 'khor dang bcas pa bye ba dung phyur tsam gnas pa'o// yi dgas kyi gdon zhes bya ba ni yi dag 'gul 'joms la sogs 
182b8(rgyud 'grel): pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// sha za'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za ga nga la sogs pa du mar gnas pa'o// 'byung po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni 'byung po lnga ldan la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// grul bum 
183a1(rgyud 'grel): gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni grul bum 'dzin mig la sogs pa du mar gnas pa'o// srul po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ srul po rab bzang la sogs pa bye ba khrag khrig tsam gnas pa'o// 
183a2(rgyud 'grel): lus srul po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni rab bzang chen po la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// skem byed kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni skem byed mchu rings la sogs pa 'bum phrag bdun bcur gnas pa'o// 
183a3(rgyud 'grel): smyo byed kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ smyo byed nyi shu rtsa gnyis te/ sba ba sum 'gyur la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// grib gnon gyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni grib gnor 'bum la sogs pa brgyad khri bzhi stong 
183a4(rgyud 'grel): tsam mo// brjed byed kyi gdon dang zhes bya ba ni nye ba'i bum pa la sogs pa bye ba du mar gnas pa'o// gnon po'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni gnon po mig bzangs la sogs pa byed pa dung phyur tsam mo// rgyu skar gyi 
183a5(rgyud 'grel): gdon dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyu skar nyi shu rtsa brgyad de smin drug la sogs pa brjod kyis mi lang ba'o// byug pa'i gdon dang zhes bya ba ni byug pa dri la dga' ba ste/ gser thub la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab par 
183a6(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa'o// de yang mi dang mi ma yin pa dang / lha dang / klu dang / lha ma yin/ rlung dang / nam mkha' lding dang / dri za dang / mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye chen po dang / gnod sbyin dang / srin po dang / 'byung po dang / 
183a7(rgyud 'grel): sha za dang / srul po dang / lus srul po dang / rjed byed dang / smyo byed dang / grib gnon dang / skem byed dang / gnon po dang / skar ma dang / dbyug pa'i gdon dang / de rnams gtso bor gyur pa stong phrag brgyad cu 
183a8(rgyud 'grel): brgyad cur gnas te/ nam mkha' la rgyu ba'i dus su ni/ dang po'i rgyal po bzhin no// sa stengs la rgyu ba'i nyi ma'i rta bdun bzhin du/ skad cig mas gling bzhi khyab pa'o// sa 'og tu 'dzul ba ni byi ba bzhin du'o// 
183b1(rgyud 'grel): delta bu'i gdon sa bdag la sogs pa rgyu ba'i dus su sa bdag bzhin no// de bzhin du lha'i gdon la sogs pa thams cad sna tshogs kyi gzugs su bstan nas rku ba'o// yongs su spobs shig ces bya ba ni 
183b2(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo rma bya chen mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ mthu chen sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis kyang lha'i gdon la sogs pa bsrung ba dang / skyob par byed pa'o// gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gdon de rnams 
183b3(rgyud 'grel): kye gzi brjid 'phrog pa ste/ gdon gzhan yang 'od 'phrog lnga ma la sogs pa bsam gyi me khyab pa'o// zas su mngal za ba dang zhes bya ba ni yang skya bo ste yi dgas so// yang bsam gyis ma thub pa ke/ sug za ba dang nas bya / 
183b4(rgyud 'grel): mo pad ma ste/ de la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su khrag 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za mo ma he mo la sogs pa te bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su zhag za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin mo sdang mo du 
183b5(rgyud 'grel): mar gnas pa'o// zas su tshil za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ zin mo 'jigs can bye ba tsam du gnas pa'o// zas su rkang za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin me 'bar ma bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su btsas pa zab 
183b6(rgyud 'grel): dang / zhes bya ba ni sha zag tum mo bsam gyi mi khyab pa'o// srog 'phrog pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ brjed byed ma bum pa can la sogs pa bye ba dung phyur gnas pa'o// zas su gtor ma za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin dri 
183b7(rgyud 'grel): med la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su phreng ba za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ lha mo nag po bye ba dung pUr tsam mo// zas su dri za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dri za mo nag mo seng ge la sogs pa bye ba 'bum phrag du ma gnas 
183b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// zas su bdug pa za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin mo nag mo snang zhes bya ba ni la sogs pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'o// zas su me tog za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gru mo 'od zer can zhes bya ba la sogs pa 'bum phrag khri 
184a1(rgyud 'grel): tsam gnas pa'o// zas su 'bras bu za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa bdag chu mo la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su lo tog za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ srin mo stobs can mo la sogs pa/ 
184a2(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// zas su bsregs bya za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za nag mo la sogs pa 'bum phrag zir gnas pa'o// zas su nag 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin mo glang chen mo la sogs pa brgya stong tsam gnas pa'o// 
184a3(rgyud 'grel): zas su phyis za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa srin mo srab mo la sogs pas te bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su gcin 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po lag 'gro ma la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// zas su 
184a4(rgyud 'grel): mchi lam 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ ro langs mo gtang gi la sogs pa brgyad khri 'bum du gnas pa'o// zas su ngar snabs za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ r-i langs chen mo dmar ser mo la sogs pa 'bum du gnas pa'o// za su 
184a5(rgyud 'grel): snabs za ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ grul bum mo tshigs pa la sogs pa bye ba dud byar gnas pa'o// zas su skyugs pa za ba dang zhes bya ba ni gnod sbyin mo gtun mo la sogs pa brgyad khrir gnas pa'o// zas su gtor khung
184a6(rgyud 'grel): nas 'bab pa 'thung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ gnon po grul bum nag mo la sogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'o// za ba de rnams kyang stong phrag brgyad cur gnas pa/ chung ba ni yud tsam che ba ni dpag tshad lnga brgyar gzugs sprul 
184a7(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// de rnams kyang rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o// srung ba gyis shig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo ma bya chen mo la gus pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams mthu chen sum cu
184a8(rgyud 'grel): rtsa gnyis gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon rnams kyis kyang srung ba dang skyob par 'gyur ro// sba ba la sogs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gang bzhin du shes par bya'o// gshed byed dang bsgyur ba'i las dang zhes bya ba ni 'byung po
184b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi dbugs dang bral bar byed pa ste/ de gshed 'phrog pa'i 'jigs pa'o// lus ngag yid dkyi las bskur ba ste/ de las bsgyur ba'i 'jigs pa lus mi bde ga/ ngag mi bde ba/ yid mi bde'o// byad dang g.yengs/ 
184b2(rgyud 'grel): byed dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngon gyi las dang da ltar byas pa ste/ las kyi dbang gis ma rig pa'i sems kyis byas pa'i byed do// de'i dbang gis 'dar bar byed pa'i nad kyang 'byung po rnams kyis btang ba'o zhes bya ba ni ma 
184b3(rgyud 'grel): tshang ba dang / lhag pa dang / nor ba dang / 'joms pa dang / pho nya dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyi nus pas btang ba'o// 'joms pa ni de 'joms pa'o// ro langs dang sems pa sgyur ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ sngags 
184b4(rgyud 'grel): kyis nus pas ra langs par 'gyur ba ste// de mthul ba'o// rig pa'i sems ma rig pas bskur ba'o// sdod gdong dang / bza' nyes dang zhes bya ba ni/ gshin rje'am/ ma mo 'am/ 'jig rten gzhan yang brten byas/

184b6(rgyud 'grel): sgra gnyis dang / zhes bya ba ni bad kan dang mchis pa dang / rlung gi dbang gi ma zhu ba dang ma mthun pa ste/ de sdug na nyes pa'o// yang na 'byung po'i dbang gis sman mazhu zhing skrag par byed pa ste/ sdug pa mthon pa dang 
184b7(rgyud 'grel): 'gags na sdug nyes pa'o// gnod sgrib dang / zhes bya ba ni de ltar ma rig pa'i dbang gis sgrib par 'gyur te/ grib ma de gnod pas gnod sgrib po// de'i sdig mi mthong bar byed pa sgrib pa'o// gnod lta sa dang zhes 
184b8(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ ma smin pa la smin par byas nas bskab ste/ gnyen palta ba de gnod bltas so// bri nyes dang zhes bya ba ni/ dkyil 'khor la sogs pa sgram mthun pa nyes pa'o// bsgom nyes dang zhes bya ba ni/ ye shes ban 
185a1(rgyud 'grel): nas ma rig pa bsgoms te/ yang na log men du go nas ma tshang bar sgoms pa'o// smad pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan rnams kyis zhe sdang gi dbang gis smad pa'o// skrag pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ 
185a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jigs pa sems bsgyur ba ste/ de yang g.yengs pa'o// rgyal po'i 'jigs pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rang dbang med cing nor dang / zhing la sogs pa 'phrog pa'o// chom rkun gyi 'jigs pa dang / glang po che'i 'jigs pa

187a6(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du rgyu te/ chu la nya bzhin te/ sal byi ba bzhin du 'dzul ba'o// lha dang lha ma yin gyi g.yul dag kyang myong bar byed pa dag go zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang lha ma yin 'thab rtsod la sde bo cher grags nas/ rang gi ngos nas
