320b2(rgyud 'grel): myur bu thob par 'gyur ro// de nas rings bzhin sgra gcan te/ lus kyang rdul zhing skrag gyur la zhes bya ba ni sdig pa byed par 'gyur na dmyal ba'i sems ni sregs par 'gyur ro// de bas na sdig 
320b3(rgyud 'grel): po spang bar bya ste/ sdig pa'i ming yang mi bya'o// nad pa bzhin du bstad pa yin// zla ba rnam par gtong bar byed ces bya ba ni/ dper na sgra gcan zin gyis zla ba 'dzin pa bzhin du/ ma rig pa'i mun 
320b4(rgyud 'grel): pas sems can 'dzin pa'o// zla ba sgra gcan gyis gtang ba bzhin du/ rig sngags kyi chos kyi nyams myongs// ma rig pa'i mun pas kyang btang ba'o// ci'i phyir na sgra gcan khyod lus kyang rdul 
320b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing skrag gyur la zhes bya ba ni/ rnam par smin pa'i las kyis skrag par 'gyur te/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis kyang thar par byed pa'o// nad pa bzhin du brtad pa yis// rings par zla ba 
320b6(rgyud 'grel): gtod par byed ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid des/ zla ba sgra gcan zin gyis bzung ba btang ba ste/ nad pa de yang sman bzang po sa sos par byas te/ de bzhin du rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis// 
320b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can thams cad bde bar gnas pa'o// sangs rgyas tshig sa gcad 'di brjod pas// gal te zla ba ma btang na zhes bya ba ni/ sgra gcan zin gyis zla ba bzung ba bzhin du myur du ma btang na 
320b8(rgyud 'grel): gza' de yang zhes par 'gyur ro// de bzhin du ma rungs pa'i don rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das na mgo tshal ba tshal par 'gas par 'gyur ro// bdag gi mgon tshol pa bdun du 
321a1(rgyud 'grel): 'gas/ gson kyang ba dbar mi 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba ni/ lha dang / mi dang / 'byung po la sogs pa rnams kyang / rig sngags kyi dam tshig las 'das par gyur na/ nad rnams
321a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'byung zhing 'chi ba'i dus su mgo tshal bar 'gas te/ shi nas kyang dmyal ba mnar med du skye'o// rig sngags kyi dmod mo yin pas gang gis kyang / mi phan par 'gyur ro// kye ma bde ba gzigs 
321a3(rgyud 'grel): pa yi// sangs rgyas rnams ni 'byung ba rmad ces bya ba ni/ smig r+b+ha dang / sbrum dang / rmi lam dang / chu bur dang / sbu ba dang / chu shing dang / dri za'i grong khyed dang brgyad do// de bzhin du sangs rgyas rnams 
321a4(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'jig rten gyi khams kyang yin te/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa yang de bzhin no// de kun yang yod par shes sam/ med par shes pa'ang ma yin te/ med pa yang 
321a5(rgyud 'grel): ma yin/ gnyis ka yang ma yin no// sku ma tsam du gnas te/ de yang sems can gyi don la gnas pa'o// de bas na sangs rgyas kyi chos rmad du med pa ste/ skyon rnams kyis kyang mi gos pa'o// 
321a6(rgyud 'grel): de dag gis tshig ni tshigs su bcad/ brjod na sgra gcan zla ba gang zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyis ni/ sgra gcan zin gyis zla ba stong pa bzhin du/ nad kyis kyang btang ba ste/ bden pa'i
321a7(rgyud 'grel): tshig 'dis kyang sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis/ 'jig rten du sems can brjed ngas pa med pa'i chos can 'byung ba ni zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi 
321a8(rgyud 'grel): chos brgyad kyang brjed ngas pa yin te/ dang po ma rig par byung ma rig pa las 'du byed byung ste/ 'du byed kyis rnam par shes pa byung ngo // rnam par shes pas ming dang gzugs/ ming dang gzugs 
321b1(rgyud 'grel): kyi skye mched drug/ skye mched drug gis srid pa/ srid pas reg pa/ reg pas srod pa/ sred pas skye ba/ skye bas len pa/ len pas rga shi de ni 'jig rten gyi chos can brjed ngas pa ste/ de las de 'khor 
321b2(rgyud 'grel): bapar nyon mongs skye bar byed pa'o// rjed par mi 'gyur ba'i chos can ni/ ma rig pas rga shi 'gag pa'o// rga shis len pa 'gag go/ len pas skye ba 'gag go/ skye bas sred pa 'gag go/ sred pas reg pa// 
321b3(rgyud 'grel): 'gag go/ rog pas srid pa 'gag go// srid pas skye mched drug 'gag go/ skye mched drug gis ming dang gzugs 'gag go/ ming dang gzugs kyis rnam par shes pa 'gag go/ 'du byed kyis ma rig pa 
321b4(rgyud 'grel): 'gag go/ de 'gag pas na skye ba ste/ rig pa shar ba de ni brjed pas pa med pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'o zhes yang dag par smra bas smra ba ni tshig kyang mi mnga' ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mig gis yang dag pa'i 
321b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes thob cing / rig sngags 'di yang 'grub par 'gyur ro// dus su yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin no// zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rkyen med par nga mi smra ste/ sems can gyi don la rig sngags 
321b6(rgyud 'grel): 'di yang dag par bstan pa'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shA thub pas smras pa'o// gzhan yang tshangs par spyod pa la/ phan pa'i phyir zhes bya ba ni/ tshul khrims ma dag par byed pa dang // 
321b7(rgyud 'grel): sdom pa med par sdom pa la 'jug pa dang / bden pa'i tshig 'di dag gis sdom pa la gnas par 'gyur ro// yang na rig sngags 'dis sdom pa srung bar byed pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshig gsung ba gang yin pa de dag 
321b8(rgyud 'grel): dang / zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'o// bden pa'i tshig bden pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis yang dag par gsungs pa'i// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ yang
322a1(rgyud 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas yang dang yang du bka' stsal pa'o// gzhan yang tshig de dag gis bya ba byed pa'i don dang zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i tshig 'dis gang yang 'grub ste// 
322a2(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub kyang 'grub pa'o// phan pa dang / bde ba yang 'dis byed par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'dis kyang / gang yang gang gi sdug bsngal yang 'dis 
322a3(rgyud 'grel): 'joms par 'gyur ste/ sems can thams cad mtho ris 'dren pa la mthu che bar rig pa'i dam pa'o// pad+ma'i rigs kyi rdo rje'i rigs ni/ mtshan ma ni me lon lta bu'i ye shes te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal/ 
322a4(rgyud 'grel): mo bdag nyid do// phung po rnam par shes pa'i phung po ste/ khams ni nam mkha'i khams so// skye mched ni yid kyi skye mched do// de yang ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal gsum pa 
322a5(rgyud 'grel): phyag drug pa/ sku mdog mthing ka/ zhal g.yas dkar ba/ g.yon dmar ba/ rgyan thams cad kyis rgyan pa/ phyag g.yas pa gsum na/ rdo rje dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo'o// g.yon pa gsum na/ pad+ma dang / zhags/ 
322a6(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / dgra sta zhabs g.yas brkyang ba/ g.yon bskum pa/ pad+ma'i steng na/ zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od zer dang ldan pa/ khro bo'i tshul du bzhags pa'o// rig sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sa ti ma til 
322a7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i bden pa'i tshigs su bcad pa'i gnas skabs te drug pa'o// // kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis kun dga' bo la yang / bka' 
322a8(rgyud 'grel): stsal pa'o// sa bon gyi rtsa ba bcu dang zhes bya ba ni/ sa bon gyi rtsa ba bcu ne/ sbyin pa dang / tshul khrims dang / bzod pa dang / brtson 'grus dang / bsam gtan dang / shes rab dang / thabs dang / stobs dang / smon lam dang / ye shes kyis 
322b1(rgyud 'grel): rol tu phyin pa dang bcu'o// de ni sa bon bcu zhes bya'o// sa bon gyi rtsa ba'i tshig bcu de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa yod do zhes bya ba ni/ rim pa bzhin dus bcu'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/ de yang rab tu dga' ba 
322b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / dri ma med pa dang 'od byed pa dang / 'od 'gro ba dang / shin tu sbyang dka' ba dang / mngon du gyur pa dang / ring du song ba dang / mi g.yo ba dang / legs pa'i blo gros dang / chos kyi sprin dang bcu'o// de bas nas bon gyi 
322b3(rgyud 'grel): rtsa ba'i tshig bcu zhes bya'o// kun dga' bo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis spras pa yi// tshig de dag de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs par 'gyur ba dang / zhes bya ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa bcu'i 'bras bu dang / sa du 
322b4(rgyud 'grel): byang chub sems pa'i lam rnams ni/ reg sngags kyi rgyal mogasang grags rjes su 'dzin mal brten cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa'o// rtun par 'gyur ba yang yod de zhes bya ba ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa/ 
322b5(rgyud 'grel): bcu thob ci/ sa bcu dang / de'i lam gyis bcu gcig thob pa'o// de dag bstan pa 'di lazhugs pa'i mi rnams kyi khar brjod na zhes bya ba ni/ bstan pa'i rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bstan pa ste/ de la zhugs par gyur na gang 
322b6(rgyud 'grel): yang 'dzub par 'gyur // gnod sbyi dang / phrin pa rnam sa byung ban pa byu ma byed pa byung sa n+te/ 'd-i lam nas kyang chub ste/ khams sa sub rtsigs par 'gyur zhing / de rnams cad dbang 
322b7(rgyud 'grel): par 'gyur ro// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig gang gis phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i tshig bden pa rnams la 'jig rten gyi ming gis mchog dang zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub kyi sems kyang gzhan na med de/ sa'i 'bras bu thob pa yang 
322b8(rgyud 'grel): rang bzhin du gnas shing / rig sngags nyid kyang logs na med do// de bzhin du phyir mi ldog pa'i 'bras bu yang yin te/ 'jig rten pa dang / sangs rgyas gnyis su med cing / gnyis su yang byar med do// de bas bden 
323a1(rgyud 'grel): pa'i tshig dge sbyong rnams kyi nang dge sbyong skyed de ba zhes bya ba dang / zhes bya ba ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di la gtogs na bde ba chen po thob ste/ bde ba'i nang na yang dag par rdzogs pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa 
323a2(rgyud 'grel): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni 'jigs pa mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i lam spyod zhing / de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i 'bras bu thob ste/ bdud bzhi rnams kyi mi thub cing dri ma 
323a3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang bral ba'o// bag tsha ba mi mnga' ba ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ mnyam pa nyid bsgom zhing / nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang 'bral zhing / yang dag pa'i ye shes thob pa'o// mi skrag mi 'bros pa'i 'jigs pa med cing 
323a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ dngos po yang med cing / ngo bo yang gang na gnas pa med do// de yang 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mi gnas pa la mi gnas te/ de bzhin du 'jigs pa yang spangs shing / sdig pa dang dge ba la yang 
323a5(rgyud 'grel): mi gnas pa'o// 'jig pa dang 'jigs par byed pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa ni sems yin te/ 'jigs par byed pa ni/ rnam par rtog pa'o// 'jigs pa spangs pa ni rang gi sems kyi rtogs pa yang dag pa'i ye 
323a6(rgyud 'grel): shes yin te/ de yang sems kyi rang bzhin no// yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung ba bsam te bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab bsgom byas na/ bsam pa'i 'bras bu de thob cing / sems nyid kyis ni gang 
323a7(rgyud 'grel): yang 'grub// 'jigs pa dang 'jigs par spangs par byed pa zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin no// 'jigs par byed pa ni ma rig pa'i rang bzhin nyon mongs pa yin te/ spangs pa ni sems kyi rang bzhin 
323a8(rgyud 'grel): rtogs shing / gzhug ma'i rang bzhin shes pa'o// spyi bung zhes byed pa med pa'o// zhes yang dag par smra bar smra ba'o// zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor ba la 'jigs pa'i bdud bzhi'i rang bzhin nyon mongs pa shas che zhing / re 
323b1(rgyud 'grel): la zhal lta byed par 'gyur ba ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yin te/ de rnams 'joms shing yang nas yang du 'joms par byed pa'o// dus su yang dag par smra bas smra ba yin te zhes bya ba ni/ de yang bdud rnams ni dge ba byed pa'i dus
323b2(rgyud 'grel): su bar du gcod de/ de'i dus su ya mi nga bar byed pa ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba la bde legs su gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
323b3(rgyud 'grel): shAkya thub pa'i bka' dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i chos kyang ldan pa sa/ gang zag dang / sems can thams cad 'jigs pa med cing bde ba ste/ yang dag pa'i byang chub thob pa'o// bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig 
323b4(rgyud 'grel): gang gis/ tshul khrims dang brtul zhugs dang zhes bya ba ni/ bde bar gshegs pa shAkya thub pa'i bka' dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin ma'i chos kyi bden pas/ tshul khrims bsrung 
323b5(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / tshul khrims med pa rnams tshul khrims thob ste/ sku sa 'dul gsung gis 'dul te/ de 'dul ba'i phyir na brtul zhugs zhes bya'o// dka' thub dang / tshangs par spyod pa la gang ci yang rung ba de dag 
323b6(rgyud 'grel): gis nang na ni zhes bya ba ni/ bka' des kyang tshangs par mi spyod pa tshangs par spyod de/ sems can nyon mongs pa rnams la sdom par mi gnas pa sdom par gnas shing / rig sngags kyi bden pa 'dis kyang sems
323b7(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad bde bar gnas shing / sdig pa thams cad kyang spong bar byed pa'o// 'phags pa dgyes pa'i tshul khrims mchog ces bya ba ni/ de bzhin du rig sngags kyi bden pa 'dis kyang 'phags pa'i tshul khrims
323b8(rgyud 'grel): mi thob pa thob par byas te/ sdig pa thams cad kyis mi tshugs shing tshul khrims la gnas te/ sems can thams cad la 'phags pas na 'phags pa zhes bya'o// bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba ni bde legs su 
324a1(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ bde bar gshegs pa'i bka' dang / rig sngags kyi bden pas/ gang zag dad pa can dang / sems can thams cad la tshe 'di la bkra shis shing phun sum tshogs 
324a2(rgyud 'grel): shing / phyi ma la yang de bzhin te/ phyin ci ma log pa'i rig sngags kyi phyag rgya thob cing / yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi lam la 'jug pa'o// gnas brtan rgyal po'i bu thu bo dang / 'dra bar rab tu byung nas ring du lon pa 
324a3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ gnas la dbang byas shing gzhan dge slong rnams la dbang med do// de bzhin du byas pa'i phyir na thu bo zhes bya'o// tshangs par spyod pa/ mngon par spyad pa rnams kyi mchog/ 'di lta ste zhes bya ba 
324a4(rgyud 'grel): ni/ zag pa zad pa/ tshul khrims la gnas nas sems can gyi don byed pa/ skad cig mas kyang mngon par shes pa/ rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa sha stag go// dge slong kun shes kau di n+ya dang zhes bya ba ni/ ston 
324a5(rgyud 'grel): pas kyang nas sa dpa tshum med/ da rje da / dgadus su yang ma kyang / thabs nas sa dpe byang chub sams dpa' dus yangs chung gnyis pa nas 
324a6(rgyud 'grel): n+ya lnga la byin nas 'thung ngu bcug ste/ da ltar yang bcom ldan 'das kyi chos kyi nyams myong gis khams gsum tsam yang kun tu shes nas dge slong dgra bcom thob pa'o// 'dod pa nyung ba sbyangs pa'i 
324a7(rgyud 'grel): yon tan la gnas pa dang / chos shes pa rnams kyi mchog 'od srungs chen po dang zhes bya ba ni/ sems can gyi don byas zhing / snying rje chen po dang / byams pa la sogs pa dang ldan pa ste/ theg pa 
324a8(rgyud 'grel): chung ngun gyi sgra nas 'od srungs chen pa yin te/ 'dir dgra bcom pa thob cing / sems can gyi dan byed pa'o// shes rab chab dang / spobs pa che ba rnams kyi mchog shAr dra'i bu da nga shes bya ba ni/ 
324b1(rgyud 'grel): phyi'i rigs pa spangs shing / blo dang ldan te nyon mongs pa bcom zhing nyan thos kyi gtso bor gyur cing / sems can gyi don byas pa'o// mi'i ming nas kyang bos pa'i phyir na shA ra dwa ti'i bu zhes bya'o// rdzu 'phrul che ba
324b2(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi mchog/ shA ri'i bu dang / rdzu 'phrul che ba dang / mthu che ba rnams kyi mchog/ maud+gal gyi bu chen po dang zhes bya ba ni/ ri ra ba re re la rkang pa bzhag cing / bdun bdun la 'gong nus te de bzhin du yang 
324b3(rgyud 'grel): mthu dang ldan pa/ bram ze'i rigs su skyes nas/ chos kyi nga rgyal dang ldan pa'o// de yang ma'i ming nas btags pa'o// lha'i mig dang ldan pa rnams kyi ma 'gags pa dang / zhes bya ba ni/ mthong ba la ni ma 'gags 
324b4(rgyud 'grel): pa yin te/ khams gsum gyi bya ba thams cad dus gcig tu mthong ba'o// mthong ba la 'gags pa med pa'i phyir na ma 'gags pa'o// mang du thos pa rnams kyi mchog kun dga' bo dang zhes bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas bcom 
324b5(rgyud 'grel): ldan 'das kyi chos ma lus par thos te/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos la sogs pa ni/ kun dga' bo la gtad pa'o// sems can thams cad dga' ba'i phyir ni kun dga' bo zhes bya'o// 'dul ba 'dzin pa rnams kyi 
324b6(rgyud 'grel): mchog nye ba 'khor dang zhes bya ba ni/ sku dang gsungs dang / thugs thul bas 'dul ba 'dzin pa ste/ de 'dul ba'i phyir na nye bar 'khor zhes bya'o// chos smra ba rnams kyi mchog byams pa'i bu gang po 
324b7(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la mi 'dzin ngag nas smra ba thogs pa med de/ ma'i ming nas bos pa'i phyir na byams pa'i bu gang po zhes pa'o// bslab pa la gus pa rnams kyi mchog sgra gcan zin/ 
324b8(rgyud 'grel): dang / zhes bya ba ni/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa bcom pa thob ste/ nyi ma gzas zin pa'i dus su skyes pa'i phyir sgra gcan zin zhes bya'o// mal ca dang stan slo ba rnams kyi mchog gyad nor bu 
325a1(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das dang dgra bcom pa rnams la gus par byas na tshogs gsog par bya'o// seng ge sgra sgrogs pa rnams kyi mchog ba ra d+h+wa dza ba sod snyoms len dang 
325a2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs med cing khams gsum tsam la yang sgra sgrogs te/ sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bsod snyoms bslangs pas 'phel ba'i phyir na/ bsod snyoms len zhes bya'o// khyim pa dang 
325a3(rgyud 'grel): pa skyem pa rnams kyi mchog/ nag po 'char ka dang zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig rnams rig par 'jug ste/ khams gsum gyi sems can rnams ma lus par/ ma dad pa dad pa'i phyir na nag po 'char ka zhes 
325a4(rgyud 'grel): bya'o// lha dang mis mchod pa rnams kyi mchog legs mthong bden pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ rdzu 'phrul gyis kyang khams gsum tsam yang dad par bya ste/ dad pa des kyang yang dag par mchod par 'os pa 
325a5(rgyud 'grel): de rnams kyi mchod pa'i phyir na legs mthong gi bden pa zhes bya'o// bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba la bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i/ 
325a6(rgyud 'grel): bka' dang / rig sngags kyi bden pa dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa rnams kyi yon tan gyings tshig dang / gang zag dang / sems can thams cad bde bar gnas shing / nad thams cad dang 'bral 
325a7(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// yongs su bskyabs pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ de rnams kyi bden pa dang / sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing / rig sngags kyi phyag rgyas btab pa'o// rgyal po 'am zhes bya 
325b1(rgyud 'grel): can zhes bya ba ni yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya seng ge thugs rje can gyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin pa'i bden pa dang / chos kyi bden pa dang 
325b2(rgyud 'grel): nyan thos rnams kyi rdzu 'phrul rnams kyis bde legs su 'gyur ro// rkang pa med pa'am zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can rigs mi 
325b3(rgyud 'grel): gcig rnams la bden pa des bde bar byas shing / sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral te/ sems can de rnams kyang byang chub kyi lam la dgod pa'o// de bzhin gshegs pa mchog ces bya ste/ 
325b4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ bye ba khrag khrig phyag brgya gaM gA klung gi bye ma snyed kyi 'jig rten pa 'od srungs nas 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rab sa bdun la sogs pa dang / ma 'ongs pa'i sangs rgyas 
325b5(rgyud 'grel): byams pa la sogs pa yang de bzhin no// da ltar yod pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas kyang rig sngags kyi phyag rgyas btab cing bden pa bka' stsal pa'o// bden pa dang 
325b6(rgyud 'grel): bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes bya ba spang bar bya'o// sangs kyus de rnams kyi bden pa dang / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i chos kyi bden pa dang / bden pa de dag gis kyang sems can rnams la bde bar 
325b7(rgyud 'grel): byas te/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral zhing / yang dag pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sems can thams cad kyang bde ba la bkod de/ 
325b8(rgyud 'grel): nam skye ba'i dus su phun sum tshogs par skye chos 'di dang yang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro// bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig gang gis shes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo gsang sngags rjes su 'dzin 
326a1(rgyud 'grel): pa thugs rje che zhing sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa ste/ de rnams kyi yang gang dang gang 'dod pa 'grub pa'o// 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos ji snyed yod pa de 
326a2(rgyud 'grel): dag gang gi nang na/ 'dod chags dang bral ba mchog ces bya ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'du byed kyi ma rig pa bkag ste ma rig pas rga shi la sogs pa bkag nas/ 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la sogs 
326a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i ming yang med de/ des na nyon mongs pa la sogs pa dang bral zhing / shes bya'i sgrib pa dang / bag chags kyi sgrib pas ma gos pa'o// bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig des ming 'di zhes 
326a4(rgyud 'grel): bya ba srung bar bya'o// zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i rig sngags dang / yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams yin te/ bden pa ni sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' 'o// bden pa'i tshig ni rig 
326a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi rgyal mo nyid do// gang zag dang sems can rnams la rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bden pa'i tshigs gis yang dag par bsrung bar byas pa'o// yongs su bskyab pa dang zhes bya ba la
326a6(rgyud 'grel): sngags pa ni// bde ba la gnas shing na du m+b+ha dang / tshe bye ma rnams snang sdug bsngal dang bul 'di/ yang dag pa'i byang chubazab pa'o// bden pa dang / bden pa'i tshig klung gis saH8/ 
326a7(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i bden pa'i tshig gis gang yang 'grub cing / rig sngags kyi ngo bo thob pa'o// tshogs sam/ 'dus pa'am/ mang po'am/ 'khor ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gi nang na ni/ 
326a8(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun mchog ces bya ste zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' dang / nyan thos dgra bcom pa dang / lha dang bram ze dang / rgyal po la sogs pa'i mi 
326b1(rgyud 'grel): rnams/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshogs pa'i bden pas kyang bde bar gnas pa'o// bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i tshig smras pa dang / yang dag par 
326b2(rgyud 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi bka' tshogs 'dus pa dang / de'i bden pas bde legs kyi bkra shis ste/ dgra'i tshogs rnams kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// rgyal khams dang / yul 'khor ram 
326b3(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ bden pa'i tshig de dag gis kyang yul 'khor rnams la srung ste/ mi nad dang / brug nad dang / nad du ma rung ba 'dre gdon zhugs pa dang / de la sogs pa nad thams 
326b4(rgyud 'grel): cad 'byung ba de med cing brlag par 'gyur te/ de bzhin du zhing la gnod pa dang sad dang ser ba dang / 'bru dang / 'bum bu dang / btsa' dang / ne tso dang / ri bong dang / ri dgas dang / byi ba la 
326b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa zhing la gnod pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang mi tshugs shing sems can rnams la bde bar byas pa'o// nad pa 'di la bsrung bar bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ cho ga dang / bsrung ba gnyis kyi srung 
326b6(rgyud 'grel): ste/ srung ba ni gang zhe na/ srung ba'i 'khor lo dang / dal gyi tshogs bsrung ba'o// bdag gis 'dir bshad pa'o// dkyil 'khor bzang po sa gzhi la/ ba yi rnam lnga byugs pa ste/ chu dang lcib/ 
326b7(rgyud 'grel): sang bsres pa/ lci ba dang ni sa yi sngags chu dang ri mo'i sngags kyis ni/ maN+Da la legs par byug par bya// tshon ni sna tshogs legs bris la// dkyil 'khor mnyam pa nyid du bri// gru 
326b8(rgyud 'grel): bzhi sgo bzhi tra ra bzhi// dra ba byed kyis mdzes pa la/ mu tig phreng bcas rnam par brgyan// rin chen lnga yi zhal yas khang // mdzes pa de ni mkhas pas bri// dang po nam mkha' rlung 
327a1(rgyud 'grel): chags pa// me dang chu dang sa chags ste// de bzhin ri rab rtse mo la// pad+ma'i steng du rgya gram ste// 'og dang steng dang logs rnams su// sna tshogs rdo rje'i gu ru du 
327a2(rgyud 'grel): bsam// de'i phyir rdo rje'i dra ba la// rlung dang me sa'i yul du 'khyam// phyi rgyu kho ra khor yug dang // de rtsar mda'i dra ba 'bar// de phyir 'og dang steng dang ni// phyogs bzhi mtshams su me yis 
327a3(rgyud 'grel): bskor// 'og ni rdo rje sa gzhi ste// de steng rdo rje bla res brgyan// de 'og rdo rje sa gzhi la// gzhal yas khang gis dbus su shes// dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma ste// phyir ni 'khor lo rtsibs 
327a4(rgyud 'grel): brgyad do// de phyir lha rnams zlum bu ste// gza' dang nu kar gnas pa'o// phyi rol lha rnams gru bzhi la// phyogs skyong yang ni der gnas so// shar dang lho dang nub dang ni// byang gi sgo bzhi 
327a5(rgyud 'grel): dang po la// rgyal po bzhi yang der bzhugs so// dbus su sna tshogs pad+ma la// ye shes lha mo lnga yang bzhugs// mtshams bzhi pad+ma stong pa la// mchod pa'i lha mo bzhi gnas lo// 
327a6(rgyud 'grel): dbus su lte ba zla ba'i gdan// gsang sngags 'dzin ma der bzhugs so// dkyil 'khor gyi bya thabs so// rig sngags bum pa lnga po ste// mtshams ma ldan zhing nag po med// rtsa ba yangs pa
327a7(rgyud 'grel): mchu 'phyang ba// dbyibs ni legs shing lto ba che// de lta bu'i mtshan ldan la// a ka ru'am gu gul bdug par bya// rin chen lnga dang 'bru lnga dang // dri lnga sman lnga de bzhin te// 'bras bu can gyi shing 
327a8(rgyud 'grel): lnga yi// lo mas kha la rnam par brgyan// bdud rtsi lnga dang snying po lnga// de bzhin mgul chings gdugs kyis brgyan// rim bzhin dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// yan lag dang ni gtor ma dang // bdag gis 'dir 
327b1(rgyud 'grel): nim bshad de// gzhan la ltos la shes par gyis// rdo rje slob dpon dge slong gis// kha zas dkar po brten nas su// cho ga yang dag bsam par gyis// khengs pa med cing ngargyal spang / nyon mongs shes 
327b2(rgyud 'grel): ni mi che zhing // byams pa snying rje dga' ba dang // btang snyoms la ni yang dag 'jug/ yi ge bzhi pa'i sngags kyis ni// dbug pa gzhug pa bcing ba dang // ye shes lha ni dgyes par 'gyur// srom mkhan 
327b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs bsangs gtor bya// bsnyen pa cho ga yang dag gzung // mchod stod la sogs byas nas su/ thun gtor la sogs gtang bar bya// phyogs skyong bcu dang rgyal po dang // gza' dang skar ma 'byung po//

327b8(rgyud 'grel): rdo rje yang dag bri// bde bar gsang sngags yi ge dgod par bya// de nang gsum po mu khyud la// sngar bshad sngags kyis bskor ba byas// de nang mu khyud gcig pu la// 'khor lo'i rim pa de bzhin shes// 
328a1(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'i nang du mu khyud de// sngar bshad sngags ni bri bar bya// de yi nang na 'khor lo la// pad+ma'i rab shes pa'o// 'khor lo ste bar mu khyud dang // snying po yi ni sngags bzhin no//

331a1(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa dang thabs gcig tu thos pa'o// su la thos na/ bcom ldan 'das la'o// gang thos na bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo 'di thos pa'o// sus thos na kun dga' bos

336a7(rgyud 'grel): pa// rnam pa sna tshogs sgra 'byin na// gzhanan de babam par byed// rta rnga dag ni brdungs nas su// la las rba zlum dag ni brdungs// pi wang gling bu 'khar dza dang // lto 'a lce rnams ni glu 'byin te/ 
336a8(rgyud 'grel): mo'i dbyangs sgra sna tshogs dang // glu dang gar rnams byas nas su// gzhon nu del 'tshe bar byed// lha 'phye'i gdon rnams dang dri za'i gdon rnams kyis kyang // gzhon nu sgra can zin la sgra sna tshogs kyi skad kyis 
336b1(rgyud 'grel): 'tshe bar byed pa'o// mi ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ de yi mdun na 'jug pa yi// mi ma yin dang rlung lha'i gdon// lag pa bzhi pa ma rungs pa// rkang mangs dang ni rkang
336b2(rgyud 'grel): gcig pa// rkang pa bzhi dang rkang pa gnyis// rkang pa bsgreng la spyi gtsugs dang // lus mangs mgo bo gcig pa dang // lus gcig pa la mgo bzhi dang // mig mangs po la lus byed dang // mi gcig lto ba bcu 
336b3(rgyud 'grel): gnyis dang // bong bu rngam glang chen mgo/ lag pa gleng la mgo btung dang // mtshon cha ba so dang mtshan cha'i lag/ mtshon cha'i rkang pa mi ma yin// zangs kyi sra dang zangs kyis so// zangs kyi mig dang zangs 
336b4(rgyud 'grel): kyi lag/ zangs kyi sna dang lcags kyi kha// rkang lag kun tu 'bar ba dang // mi yi lus su gnas pa rnams// skur nar lag pa gsum yod pa// mig mi sdug la kha kral ba// chu sin dag gi gzugs dang ni/ 
336b5(rgyud 'grel): gzugs mi sdug la kha ral po// 'chu 'changs po dang mo yin po// rab tu sdug pa khro gnyer can// gsus po che dang bum snga pa// rna babyangs pa dang rna ba med// lag rings dang ni rna ba ring // snga yi rtse dang lag

336b7(rgyud 'grel): ngan bstan// sems can thams cad 'tshe byed pa// gzhon nu'i lus la 'tshe bar byed// mi ma yin gyi gdon dang rlung lha'i gdon rnams kyis kyang // sna tshogs kyi gzugs bstan cing gzhon nu'i lus la 'a 
336b8(rgyud 'grel): bar byas so// yi dgas kyi gdon rnams dang 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni// yi dgas 'byung po'i gdon rnams kyis// phyogs bzhi la ni gdon byed pa// mig sdug gzugs ni bstan nas su// 
337a1(rgyud 'grel): drag po'i tshul gyis sgra yang 'byin// shin tu 'jigs pa'i tshul bstan nas// gtun shing tho ba 'dra ba'i lho// rnam lte ba la rna ba che// gyen du brdzes sla rab tu dmar// mgo ba 
337a2(rgyud 'grel): chel mjug rings po// sem po sgur po bum lto ba// ri rab rtse mo 'gul nas su// me bdag gi ni char pa 'bebs// ljon shing rir brdo ba dang // sprin gyi tshogs kyi mdag 'dra ba// dung dang rnga chen rdza 
337a3(rgyud 'grel): dang // 'byung po yi dgas rnams kyi rdung // shin tu mi sran thal mdag 'dra// mags ba rdul bcug pa'i mdag/ khrag sa dga' ning shal dga'// bzhin mi sdug cing gzugs che ba// keng dus gzugs 
337a4(rgyud 'grel): niskra rings po// mig yo kha yo mgo gnyis pa// skyes pa bud med gnod byas nas/ gzi brjid 'phrog cing srog kyang 'phrog/ phyogs bzhi dag nas gnod pa po// gzhon nu sgra zin 'tshe bar byas// yi dgas kyi/ 
337a5(rgyud 'grel): gangan dang 'byung po'i gdon rnams kyis gzhon nu sgra zin la phyogs bzhi nas byas so// sha za'i gdon rnams dang grul bum gyi gdon rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ sha za grul bum gdon rnams ni// stobs dang ldan zhing

337a7(rgyud 'grel): bache la sgra yang 'byin// la la mi lpags thogs nas su// sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed// mi yi gzugs la zhugs nas su// mdze yi nad rnams gtong ba'i bdag/ de bzhin phran tshegs nad gtong ba/

337b1(rgyud 'grel): bran rnams kyi sgra// 'jigs pa'i sgra ni rab tu 'byin// ming po che la bung bu'i sgra// nag po sngon po ser po dang // dmar ser me ltar dmar ser dang // khab 'dra'i spu dang ral gri'i 
337b2(rgyud 'grel): skra// dmar po khrag gi bskus pa rnams// mi ro dag ni khyer nas su// za bzhin du ni rnam par rgyug/ so gnon lag pa dmar po dang // mchu ni khrag gis bskus pa dang // lus phyed dag ni 
337b3(rgyud 'grel): zos pa dang // mkhal ma snying dang nang grol gyis// snyim pa shin tu gang ba dang / byin pa dag na za bzhin du// mer mer po dang srog chags kyis/ rkang lag rnams kyi stobs kyang 'phrog/ 
337b4(rgyud 'grel): rkeng rus kyi ni lus kyis su// skye bo mang po skrag par byed// khrag gi rab tu gang ba yis// mi yi lpags pa thogs nas su// mi zad drug gis kun bsdus te// phyogs phyogs dag tu rnam 
337b5(rgyud 'grel): par rgyug/ grong khyer rnams kyi sgo dag dang // khyim nas khyim du rnam par 'thor// rlung dang bad kan mkhris pa rnams// phyogs bzhi dag du 'khrug par byed// sha za grul bum gdon rnams ni//

341b2(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams kyis/ bdag shin tu gtses pa lags mod kyi zhes bya ba ni/ mi rgod mtshon sna tshogs thogs pa dang / gzhan yang bgegs ma rungs pa rnams kyis kyang / gzhon nu sgra gcan zin la sdug bsngal 
341b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad myong zhing 'tshe bar byas so zhes pa'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni sgra gcan zin gyis smras pa'i de nas so// bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zin la bka' stsal pa zhes bya ba ni/ sems 
341b4(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad kyi don dmigs la 'khor phun sum tshogs pa'i nang du khyu mchog drang seng ge'i sgra sgrogs pa'o// sgra gcan zin khyod kyis zhes bya ba ni/ gti mug gi rang bzhin gyis nga rgyal dang / phrag dog byas 
341b5(rgyud 'grel): teted yang khyod kyis ma byed cig ces rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal btson chen po zhes bya ba na/ rig sngag/ ni chos su ste/ bsol ba'i tshal ni lung sku'o// tshal ni sbrul sku ste/ be con ni chad pa thams 
341b6(rgyud 'grel): cad dang 'bral bar byed pa'o// de bzhin ci'i phyir zhe na/ rig pa stong pa ste/ ngo bo nyid dang bral zhing brjod du med pa'o// sngags ni ma man+da ste skyob pa dang bsrung ba'o// de yang stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// bsil
341b7(rgyud 'grel): ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin te/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku'i rang bzhin/ yod pa yang min pa yang min/ gnyis ka yang ma yin no// tshal ni sprul sku ste/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
341b8(rgyud 'grel): la dus cig du nam mkha' khyab pa bzhin du khyab pa'o// be con gyi lha'i gdon rnams kyi chad pa dang 'jig rten 'di'i rgyal po dang / rkun mo dang chu dang me la sogs pa'i chad pa dang / gzhan yang gshin rje dang 'khor 
342a1(rgyud 'grel): ba nas 'bral te/ de sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bas na be con zhes bya ba'o// yang na bsil ba'i tshal ni lus ngag yid zhi bar byas te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral bar 
342a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'o// gzungs kyi rig sngags zhes bya ba ni/ gzungs ni lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gzungs te/ de yang dag par bzung zhing / stong pa nyid la sems bzhag nas/ sems can thams cad la byams pa dang snying rjes 
342a3(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa'o// 'khor bzhi po zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das gar gshegs pa'i sar 'khor ba'o// dge slong rnams dang zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' dang / dgra bcom pa la sogs pa'o// dge slong ma rnams 
342a4(rgyud 'grel): dang zhes bya ba ni/ dgra gcan zin gyi ma dang / dge slong ma lnga brgya la sogs pa'o// dge bsnyen rnams dang dge bsnyen ma rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po men po ma skyes sgra dang / btsun mo la sogs pa'o// bsrung ba 
342a5(rgyud 'grel): dang / bskyab pa dang / sba ba dang / yun ring po'i don dang phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur bzung zhig ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di 'chang bar gyur na/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral zhing bde ba thob pa'o// lha 
342a6(rgyud 'grel): dang mis kyang de bzhin zung zhig ces bya ba ni/ gzugs khams kyi lha dang 'dod khams kyi lha dang sangs rgyas dang tshes dang dge 'dun la gus par byed pa'i mi rnams kyis/ rig sngags 'di zung zhig ces pa'o// rig sngags 
342a7(rgyud 'grel): kyi ngo bo nyid gang zhe na/ shes rab dang thabs yin te/ 'dir ni shes rab kyi ngo bo las/ thabs kyi ngo bor mi snang ngo zhes pa'o// slob dpon las kyi rdo rjes gsungs pa ni/ mtshon pa dag ni ye shes te/ mtshon byed rig 
342a8(rgyud 'grel): sngags rgyal mo la// phyag mtshan sku mdog bstan pa de// thabs kyi ngo bo de bzhin no// de bzhin du bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes mtshon pa ni shes rab bo// rig sngags nyid bsgom pa ni/ thabs kyi ngo bo nyid yin te/ de 
342b1(rgyud 'grel): yang mtshon par byed pa'o// de'i phyir na thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa'o// de'i phyag mtshan dang sku mdog ni gang zhe na/ zhal gsum pa phyag drug pa sku mdog ljang gu sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu brgyan can/ spyan gsum
342b2(rgyud 'grel): pazhal g.yas dkar po// g.yon dmar ba lo bcu drug pa'i gzugs su bzhugs pa phrag g.yas pa'i gsum na/ ral gri dang / skyabs sbyin dang rin po che steng na rdo rje'o// g.yon pa gsum na/ bum pa'i steng na rdo rje 
342b3(rgyud 'grel): dang / zhags pa dang lcags kyu'o// zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs pa/ pad+ma'i steng na zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o// rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid las kyi rigs rlung gi 
342b4(rgyud 'grel): khams/ lus kyi skye mched tri gi yig 'bru las ye shes lnga 'phros sems can thams cad kyi don byas so// rig sngags kyi ngo bo nyid sems can gyi don byed pa'i tshig ni las kyi snying po ste/ 'di lta ste/ e thA ba waM bA ga la 
342b5(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa'o// rgyal po dbang po dang zhes bya ba ni/ brgya byin yin te/ zhal gcig pa phyag bzhi pa sku mdog ser po// spyan gsum pa la dpral ba'i mig phred las yod pa/ lha'i dbu rgyan la sogs pas brgyan pa/ 
342b6(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rdo rje dang mda'o// g.yon pa gnyis na gdugs dang gzhu bsnams pa'o// glang po che la zhon pa'o// rgyal po gshing rje dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog nag po khro bo'i tshul 
342b7(rgyud 'grel): rudu bstan pa dbul sra thor tshugs can g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang be con 'dzin pa/ g.yon gnyis na zhags pa dang lcags kub sdams pa'o// ma he la zhor pa zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa ste/ sku mdog dkar po go cha 
342b8(rgyud 'grel): gyon pa/ g.yas g.yon gnyis na pad+ma dkar po bsnams pa/ g.yas pa na ral gri g.yon pa na ri bong gi rgyal mtshan bsnams pa'o// rnga mo dkar po'i shing rta la zhon pa'o// rgyal po chu lha dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal 
343a1(rgyud 'grel): gcig khyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dkar po sbrul gyi gdengs ka dang bcas pa/ phyag g.yas pa'i dang po na pad+ma dmar po ste/ 'og ma rin po che'o// g.yon pa dang po na sbrul gyi zhags pa/ 
343a2(rgyud 'grel): 'og ma na bum pa bsnams pa ste/ chu srin la zhon pa'o// rgyal po dang nyi ma dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig sku mdog dmar po phyag bzhi pa g.yas g.yon gnyis na pad+ma dmar po 'dzin pa/ g.yas na ral gri 
343a3(rgyud 'grel): g.yon pa na lcags kyu bsnams pa'o// shing rta dang bcas shing nam mkha' la rgyu ba'o// rgyal po rlung lha dang btsos pa zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog sde skya phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ba dan 
343a4(rgyud 'grel): dang lcags kyu bsnams pa g.yon pa gnyis na rlung 'khyil ba dang bum pa bsnams shing sha bal zhen pa'o// rgyal po gzi can dang zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa ste/ sku mdog ser po phyag 
343a5(rgyud 'grel): g.yas na sbrul zhags 'dzin cing / g.yon na a 'bras 'dzin cing ku be ra la zhon pa'o// rgyal po sems shing bya ba ni/ dpa' ba sangs yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po/ 
343a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag g.yas na bum pa spyi blugs g.yon pa phreng ba bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// rgyal po gshin rje'i dbyug to can zhes bya ba ni/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog dmar nag phyag 
343a7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa gnyis na/ rol gri dang thob bsnams pa/ g.yon pa gnyis na/ zhags pa dang sdig mdzub mdzad cing / ro langs la zhon pa'o// rgyal po me'i dbyug tho can zhes bya ba ni/ me lha'i 
343a8(rgyud 'grel): dbang po yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog dmar po/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na rtse gcig dang bum pa spyi blugs bsnams pa'o// g.yon pa me 'bar ba dang phreng ba bsnams pa skyes pa zhon 
343b1(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// rgyal po dbyug tho can dang zhes bya ba ni mig dmar yin te/ zhal gcig b+ha ga gnyis pa sku mdog dmar po khro bo// g.yas na dbyug to mig can 'dzin pa'o// g.yon pa na mig go sdigs 
343b2(rgyud 'grel): mdzub bsdams pa'o// ra dmar po la zhon pa'o// rgyal po rgyal ba zhes bya ba ni spen pa yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yas na po te bsnams pa/ g.yon bum pa

343b4(rgyud 'grel): mda' gzhu bsdams shing glang po la zhon pa'o// rgyal po 'jigs pa dang shes b+hA ba ni/ lag pa yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ sku mdog ljang nag phyag g.yas na ral gri g.yon na sdig

343b6(rgyud 'grel): nyi ma bsnams pa/ sprin gyi gdan la bzhugs pa'o// rgyal po 'byung po zhes bya ba ni/ dbang ldan yin te/ zhal gcig phyag gnyis pa/ thal ba'i mdog can spyan gsum pa phyag 
343b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa gnyis na rtse gsum dang bum pa spyi blugs bsdams pa/ g.yon pa gnyis na phreng ba dang / a 'bras bsdams baglang la zhon pa'o// rgyal po yul 'khor srung bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po 
343b8(rgyud 'grel): yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa/ sku mdog dkar po phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis na 'khor lo'i dang mchod rten bsnams pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang zhes 
344a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ grul bum gyi rgyal po yin te/ zhal gcig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog mthing ka/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na/ dbyug ze dang tho ba bsnams pa'o// g.yon pa gnyis na rin po che dang

344a4(rgyud 'grel): g.yas kyi dang po ni ral gri/ 'og ma na dbyug to// g.yon pa na ne le/ 'og ma na bum pa/ pad+ma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'o// rgyal po mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa zhes bya ba ni/ zhal bzhi pa phyag bzhi parga

344b8(rgyud 'grel): las thang bar byed pa'o// zhal nag po dang dkar po dang dmar po dang ser po bstan pa ni/ mngon spyod dang zhi ba dang dbang dang rgyas pa'i las bzhi bstan pa'o// khro bo dang / zhi khro ba dang / zhi ba dang / skegs 
345a1(rgyud 'grel): pa dang / rgod pa ni sems can mi gcig pa'i theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa'o// sku mdog nag po ni byams pa chen po ldan pa'i rnam par dag pa'o// rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa ni

345b2(rgyud 'grel): rigs la sogs pa'i bu mo lo brgyad nas ba cu gnyis lon pa'i bar gyis gos gtsang mgon ning khrus legs par byas te/ kha zas dkar po la brten tsang kha lho phyogs su bstan la bkal bar bya'o// rig sngags re

345b4(rgyud 'grel): lus sam lag pa la brtag na zhes bya ba ni/ gro ga 'am/ shing shun nam/ ras sam/ dar la sogs pa la bris nas mgul du btags te/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo 'am/ mchod rten gyi rtse mo'am/ rdal

345b6(rgyud 'grel): yul gyi srung ba byas pas kyang bsrung bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin du rig sngags 'di mthu che zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/ thugs rje che zhing sems can rnams kyi don mdzad pa'o// dri'am me tog rnams dang zhes

346a1(rgyud 'grel): byang chub thob pa'o// de la zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di 'chang ba ste/ bla na med pa'i byang chub thob cing / da ltar yang chad pa la sogs pa thams cad dang bral ba'o// mi dang mi ma 
346a2(rgyud 'grel): yin pa rnams kyis mi tshugs par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba ni/ mi ni rgyal po dang / rkun po dang / mi rgod dang gnyen bshes la sogs pas lto phye ba'i chad pa dang gzhan yang 'jigs pa thams cad dang 'bral ba'o// / 
346a3(rgyud 'grel): mi ma yin pa rnams ni/ lha'i gdon la sogs pa ma rungs pa rnams yin te/ chu dang me'i 'jigs pa la sogs pa dang bral ba'o// mtshon dang dug dang zhes bya ba ni/ g.yul 'gyed pa dang glo bur du 'thab 
346a4(rgyud 'grel): pa ste/ des mi tshugs shing dug rnam pa gsum gyis kyang mi tshugs so// nad dang rims rnams dang zhes bya ba ni/ mdze las gyur pa la sogs pa dang / bad kan dang mkhris pa dang rlung dang ldan pa dang / 'dus 
346a5(rgyud 'grel): pa la sogs pa'i nad do// rims drag po dang / zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi 'dus pa yin te/ de bzhin du rlung shas che zhing gzhu bzhin du gug ste/ mda' btang ba bzhin du rengs nas 'chi bar 'gyur ro//

346a7(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang mi tshugs pa'o// ro langs dang / khro dug dang zhes bya ba ni/ rigs pa mkhan pos ro langs bsgrubs nas btad de/ de yang de'i khro dug gis kyang mi tshugs so// me dang chus 'chi ba'i dus byed 
346a8(rgyud 'grel): par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni/ dus ma yin par 'chi ba rnams yin te/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis de'i 'jigs pas kyang mi tshugs so// rig sngags dang gsang sngags dang / sbyor bas legs par 
346b1(rgyud 'grel): sbyor ba thams cad kyi ma grub pa rnams grub par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ bri nyes dang smra nyes dang / bsgo mnyes pa dang gtam nyes pa dang tshul nyes pa dang de la sogs pa nyes pa thams cad ni/ rig sngags 'di'i 
346b2(rgyud 'grel): gsang sngags kyis nyes pa thams cad kyang gso bar byas pa'o// rig sngags 'di'i gsang sngags kyi tshig tsam gyis bar chod byed pa'o// gdon rnams kyis mi tshugs pa'o// ma grub pa rnams grub par byed/ 
346b3(rgyud 'grel): grub pa rnams chud mi za bar byed do// gzhan yang dngos grub nyams par gyur na/ rig sngags 'dis 'grub par 'gyur te/ thob pa rnams gzhan lam gtad de/ glo bur gyi bar chod kyis mi tshugs pa'o// pha rol 
346b4(rgyud 'grel): gyi sbyor ba 'ching ba'o zhes bya ba ni/ sngags dang 'jig rten gyi skyon rnams yin te/ de'i 'jigs pas kyang mi tshugs pa'o// pha rol gyis bcings pa las grol bar byed pa'o// zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis sbyor ba'i 
346b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags btang te/ des kyang mi tshugs shing bar chod dang 'bral ba'o// nad dang mya ngan dang bgegs rnams 'jigs par byed pa'o// zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi brgya brgyad cu'i nad rnams dang mya ngan gyis mi phog cing / bgegs kyi 
346b6(rgyud 'grel): 'og gi sdug bsngal dang bral ba'o// gdon thams cad bzlog par byed pa'o zhes bya ba ni/ sgom pa la sgom du mi ster ba dge ba dang dge ba byed pa de rnams kyang bgegs rigs te/ de rnams kyis mi tshugs shing / rigs 
346b7(rgyud 'grel): pa'i gzi brjid kyis mi tshugs pa'o// gdon gang gis mi gtong ba de'i mgo a dza ka'i dog pa bzhin du mgo tshal ba bdun du 'gas pa'o// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyis srung ba dang 'chang ba dang sgom pa dang / kha don 
347a1(rgyud 'grel): byed pa la sogs pa la gnod par byed na/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos/ mgo tshal pa tshal bar 'gyur ro// srog dang bral zhing dmyal ba mnar med du skye'o// gnod sbyin gyi ded dpon chen po 
347a2(rgyud 'grel): lag na rdo rje yang rdo rje 'bar ba kun tu 'bar/ kun tu rab tu 'bar ba me lce gcig tu gyur pa/ de'i mgo a dza ka'i dog pa bzhin du tshal ba bdun du 'gas so// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa dang / rig 
347a3(rgyud 'grel): sngags 'di 'chang ba la bar chod byed pa dang / gzhan yang 'di'i sgo nas dge ba las bar chod byed na/ phyag na rdo rje gzi brjid kyis dum bur byas shing / dngos po mi snang bar byed pa'o// rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang lcags 
347a4(rgyud 'grel): kyi 'khor lo sa spu gri'i so lta bu'i mtshon gyis phung bar byed do// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dam las 'das shing / gdon rnams kyis sems can la 'tshe bar byas te/ de'i reg sngags kyi dmod mos rgyal po bzhi rnams 
347a5(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang lcags kyi 'khor lo mi lce 'bar bas dum bu dum bur byas shing / chad pa gcod par 'gyur ro// gnod sbyin gyi 'jig rten de nas shi 'phos nas/ lcang lo can gyi pho zang 'khor du gnas pa mi thob bo zhes bya ba ni/ 
347a6(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'i gdon de shi ba ni rgyal po bzhi'i chad pas shi ste/ gal te 'byung po'i tshogs su skyes na lcang lo can gyi pho brang du mi chud do// sgra gcan zin zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gzhon nu 
347a7(rgyud 'grel): la bka' stsal pa'o// rgyal po dang mi rgod dang me dang chu dang mtshon dang 'brog dang dgon pa dang / mya ngan du song ba zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'dis chad pa thams cad gcod par byed pa ste/ 
347a8(rgyud 'grel): gzhon nu sgra ga can zin gyis kyang bsgoms shig yid la zung zhig mchod par gyis shig kha ton du bya shing sems can thams cad la phan par gyis shig ces bya'o// de bzhin du byas na de dang de'i 'jigs pa dang 'bral ba'o// 
347b1(rgyud 'grel): yang na bdud bzhis mi tshugs te/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad 'joms pa'o// gang gis be con chen po'i gzungs kyi rig pa 'di lan gcig brjod na/ sdig pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba ni da
347b2(rgyud 'grel): ltar byas pa ni yang 'dag ste/ sngon du byas pa yang 'dag pa'o// de bzhin du mthu che zhing gzi brjid dang ldan pa/ ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal dang 'bral bar byed pa'o// sgra gcan zin zhes bya ba ni sgra gcan zin gyi 
347b3(rgyud 'grel): rkyen gyi sems can gyi don la/ bcom ldan 'das kyis yang nas yang du bka' stsal pa'o// be con chen po'i gzugs kyi rig sngags 'di/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang+gA'i klung dgu bcu rtsa gcig gi bye ma snyed kyis 
347b4(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan gyis mi thub pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'dis/ chad pa thams cad 'joms pa/ byang chub kyi lam yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams khams bsam gyis mi 
347b5(rgyud 'grel): khyab cing ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'o// gsung ba gsungs par 'gyur ba zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa rnams kyis kyang gsungs pa'o// ma 'ongs pa rnams kyis kyang gsung ste/ de bzhin du da ltar bzhugs pa rnams kyis kyang 
347b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes sa / ga/ kyis mi pa zlab / blun pa shi ma byung ma sa 
347b7(rgyud 'grel): thun mong ma yin pa yang de bzhin no// thun mong gi dngos grub ni/ 'jig rten 'di'i sa la spyod pa dang / nam mkha' la skyed pa dang / sa'i 'og nas spyod pa'o// de la sogs pa phra mo'i dngos grub kyang yod de/ de yang 
347b8(rgyud 'grel): zhi ba dang rgyas pa dang dbang dang mngon spyod la sogs pa'o// thun mong ma yin pa'i dngos grub ni/ sa la spyod pa la sogs pa ni mgo mnyam ste/ nam mkha' 'jig rten gyi khams la khyab pa bzhin du 'khor ba bor zhing
348a1(rgyud 'grel): srid pa ma yin 'das pa yang ma yin te/ da ltar yod pa yang ma yin no// de'i dngos grub thob pa'i phyir na mchog tu grub pa'o// gzhan gyis mi thub pa ni/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyis mi thub ste/ de bzhin 
348a2(rgyud 'grel): du gdon la sogs pas kyang mi thub pa'o// lha dang klu dang dri za dang / gnod sbyin dang lha ma yin dang nam mkha' sding dang mi 'am ci dang / lto 'phye la sogs pas bstod pas zhes bya ba ni// rig sngags 'di la rtag tu rjes su yi/

348a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi srung ba yod par myur nas/ gzhan yang de'i rtswa ra bsdad nas/ de rnams kyang srung bar 'gyur ro// rtag tu 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal zhing rjes su yi rang ba'o// bdag dang sems can thams cad

348a8(rgyud 'grel): gdon rnams dang / srin po'i gdon rnams dang / mi 'am ci'i gdon rnams dang / lto 'phye chen po'i gdon rnams dang / dri za'i gdon rnams dang / mi ma yin gyi gdon rnams dang / rlung lha'i gdon rnams dang / yi 
348b1(rgyud 'grel): rags kyi gdon rnams dang / 'byung po'i gdon rnams dang / sha za'i gdon rnams dang / grul bum gyi gdor rnams dang / gzig rnams dang bya rog rnams dang 'ug pa rnams dang / grog sbur rnams dang / sdig sbrul rnams 
348b2(rgyud 'grel): dang / gzhan yang mi dang mi ma yin gyi sems can rnams kyis kyang / tshe dang ldan pa sgra gcan zi la gus par byas te/ phyag 'tshal lo// mchod par byas so// tshe dang ldan pa gzhon nu sgra ga can zin yang dgra bcom pa yang 
348b3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa thob cing / zag pa zang brdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ cho 'phrul skyon nus pa'o// bkra shis te/ sems can thams cad byang chub kyi lam du 'jug pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo/ bsil ba'i tshal gyi/ gzhon nus 
348b4(rgyud 'grel): gcan zin gyis gdon 'dul ba'i/ gnas skabs te/ gsum pa'o// / rig sngags kyi snying pa rtag pa dang ba rdzogs so// / de nas rgyal ba chen po las ngan po dang / yul 'khor krung dang mig mi bzang ngo/ 
348b5(rgyud 'grel): 'phags skyes po bu dang bcas pa zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang / dri za'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dngadagrul bum gyi rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang klu'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi

348b8(rgyud 'grel): pa dag nam phyed na lhags nas/ gros mthun par dur khrod chen po bsil ba'i tshal du dong ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri nas/ sems can gyi don la 'khor bzhi po dag dang

349a7(rgyud 'grel): kyang dbyings cig skad cig tu byas nas bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas pa'o// 'jig rten mkhas pa rdzogs sangs rgyas/ dpa' chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi rang bzhin 
349b1(rgyud 'grel): dbyer med pa/ ngo bo nyid dang bral ba'i chos sku dang sgyu ma lta bu'i rang bzhin me long gi gzugs brnyan bzhin du snang ba/ longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang ldan pa dang ngo // mtshan bzang po sum cu rtsa gnyis dang / dpe byad 
349b2(rgyud 'grel): bzang po brgyad cu dang ldan zhing / sems can gyi don la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sprul pa'i skus khyab pa'o// sprul pa'i sku de yang dpa' ba dang zhing bdud bzhi bcom pa la stobs dang ldan te/

352a1(rgyud 'grel): 'di dag na zhes bya ba ni/ 'jigs su rung ba dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal na ro langs dang ro dang lce spyar la sogs pa dang / bya'i tshogs mang po 'dus pa'i sa 
352a2(rgyud 'grel): khyi dang lce spyang 'thab pa'i sgras 'jigs su rung ste/ de bzhin du ro langs dang yi dgas kyang skad 'don zhing 'jigs su rung ste/ de bas na mtha'i gnas mal zhes btags pa'o// shin tu sdang ba'i
352a3(rgyud 'grel): 1gnod sbyin dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sa bzhi der gnas pa'i gdon rnams ni shin tu mi srun zhing rol dga' ste/ gson pa'i sha zag la dga' zhing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byed de/ gzugs
352a4(rgyud 'grel): sna tshogs ston cing gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang skad sna tshogs 'don zhing skyes pa dang bud med kyi tshogs la 'jigs par byed pa dang / gdon rigs mi gcig pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa gnas shing 'jig
352a5(rgyud 'grel): rten gyi khams na sems can la gdon pa'o// rims dang zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ nad bzhi brgya rtsa bzhi de rims de dag la 'dus ste/ nad de rnams kyang ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis btang zhing 
352a6(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la/ gnod pa skyel ba'o// mi dang mi ma lags pa zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ sa gzhi der mi rgod la sogs pa rgyu ba ste/ gzhan yang rgyal po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang mi dang mi 
352a7(rgyud 'grel): ma yin pa ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis ma nus pa'o zhes bya ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag
352a8(rgyud 'grel): kyang de la gnas lags te zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal la sbyor zhing de la gnas pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos de dag ni 
352b1(rgyud 'grel): srod dang tho rangs la mi nal bar sbyor ba la btson par gnas so// zhes bya ba ni de ltar bar chod kyi rkyen bzlog pa dang / tshe phyi ma'i don la byang chub kyi lam bsgom pa dang / de ltar mi rtag pa'i rang bzhin 
352b2(rgyud 'grel): bsgom ste/ nyan thos de rnams kyang rig sngags yid la byed pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyi bstan pa 'di la dang 
352b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'i sems dang ldan zhing cung zad cig mchis par bas so zhes bya ba ni gzhan yang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal mthong ma thag tu dge ba'i sems la brtson zhing / 
352b4(rgyud 'grel): sems can gzhan rnams la yang sdang ba dang sdig pa'i sems dang mi ldan zhing byams pa dang snying rje la brtson zhing chos kyi sems dang ldan ste/ sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o// de'i yon/ 
352b5(rgyud 'grel): tan gyis ni chung zad cig mchis pas so zhes bya ba'o// gang dag bcom ldan 'das kyis bstan 'di la pha ma dad pa'i sems dang ldan pa ni/ ches mang lags te zhes bya ba ni/ gang dang gang dag sems 
352b6(rgyud 'grel): can rnams ni dge ba las mi brtson zhing sdig la brtson par 'gyur ro// sdig pa'i sems dang sdang ba'i sems dang gcig gis gcig la 'tshe bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// byams pa dang snying rje'i 
352b7(rgyud 'grel): sems dang ldan zhing chos la rtsom pa zhung ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis nyon mongs pa phal tu skye ste/ phal cher sems can de rnams ni mtho ris su 'gro ba zhung zhing ngan song gsum du 
352b8(rgyud 'grel): skye ba'o// de bas na 'byung po yi dgas kyi lus thob nas kyang gzhan la gnod par byed pa'i sems dang ldan par skye ba'o// de dag ni zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa'i gdon dang 'byung po rnams glags 
353a1(rgyud 'grel): btsal zhing / dge ba dang bsgom pa la sogs pa la bar chod byas nas mtho ris thob tu mi ster ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyi nyan thos sod dang tho rangs la 
353a2(rgyud 'grel): mi nyal zhing sbyor ba la brtson par gnas pa/ rnams la gnod par byed par sems lags te zhes bya ba ni/ phung po la gnod par byas nas rlung drang mkhris pa dang / bad kan dang 'dus pa'i nad 
353a3(rgyud 'grel): btang zhir dge ba'i sbyor ba de yang mi nus par byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa mang po 'dus pa'o// sems la gnod par byed cing mi dga' bar byed pa ste/ bsgom snying mi 'dod cing logs par byed pa'i 
353a4(rgyud 'grel): sems can dang ldan pa mang po yod pa'o// bsgom pa'i dus su srog la zhugs shing 'chi bar byed pa'i sems dang ldan pa mang po sha stag yod pa'o// bsgom pa'i dus su ltas ngan pa dang rmyi lam ngan 
353a5(rgyud 'grel): bapa bstan cing dpal cher dngos por 'byung zhing bsgom du mi ster ba ste/ bsgom pa'i gang zag la 'jigs par byas shing / nam sgom pa'i dus su bar chod byed cing sgom du me ster ba'o// de bas na 
353a6(rgyud 'grel): gdon de dag gis gnod par bgyid pa lags te zhes bya ba'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi po la/ gdon gyis glags btsal ba'i gnas skabs te 
353a7(rgyud 'grel): bzhi pa'o// // de dgag pa'i skad du zhes bya ba ni gdon ma rungs pa rnams dang sdig can bdud kyi rigs dang sa dang bar snang dang sa 'og la rgyu ba'i 'byung po rnams stong phrag brgyad cu ste/ de phrag nyid shu/ 
353a8(rgyud 'grel): rtsa drug go// de bzhin du g.yog dang chung ma dang bu dang bu mo la yang yin no// gnod sbyin ma rungs pa rnams dad par bgyi ba dang zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams mi dad de sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 
353a9(rgyud 'grel): sa ma pa mamams sam mas ma mams sapa mamasasam mam mas mas samam ma mas ma mas ma ma ma mthams mam pamam mtha tham ma chomamatsham ma mthamasams tha samasam sa mas mam samapas ma mas par sems mam sa pas 
353b1(rgyud 'grel): 'dun gyis byin gyi brlabs kyis dad par byed pa'o// dad pa rnams slar zhing dad par bgyi ba dang / zhes bya ba ni/ phyi bzhin nas yod pa'i sems ni yang nas yang du dad pa skyes pa ste/ de 'ong bar mi 
353b2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa'i sems ni brtan par mi byed pa'o// 'khor bzhi po rnams bde legs dang zhes bya ba ni sngar gnod par byed 'dod pa'i sems dang sdang bar 'dod pa'i sems de rnams ni dad pa'i sems dang ldan 
353b3(rgyud 'grel): par gyur na/ 'khor bzhi po de dag dang sems can thams cad bde bar gnas par 'gyur ro// bde bar gnas par bgyi ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ bsgom pa dang nyan pa la yang bar chod med 
353b4(rgyud 'grel): cing de bzhin du spyod pa dang / dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ba la bar chod med cing de rnams la bde bar bgyi bas na bde ba'o// ma lus par shin tu mnyam par bzhag par 'gyur ba'i slad du zhes bya 
353b5(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ rnam par rtog pa ma lus par 'joms ste/ de 'joms na/ de bar du gcod pa'i bgegs kyang smos ci dgos te/ shes bya dang bag chags kyi dri mas mi gos pa'o// bsil ba'i 
353b6(rgyud 'grel): tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di bshad par tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar yod pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa thabs shes rab gnyis su med de/ de'i chos 
353b7(rgyud 'grel): kyis nyams myong gis/ zla ba sems can rnams la bsil bar byed pa bzhin du des kyang sems can rnams la bde bar byas pa'o// rig sngags des kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la 
353b8(rgyud 'grel): nam mkhas khyab pa bzhin du khyab pa'o// mi ma yin pa sdang sems can/ rgyal ba'i bstan la ma dad pa zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas sems can rnams la 
354a1(rgyud 'grel): phan par bgyid pas mi ma yin gyi gdon dang / lha'i gdon la sogs pa rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyis byin gyis brlabs kyis sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa 
354a2(rgyud 'grel): yang sdig pa'i sems med cing srog gcod pa'i sems dang ldan pa rnams kyang srog mi gcod cing / bstan pa yang bsrung bar byed pa'o// de dag bdag gis bzlog par bya/ rgyal chen rnams ni bdag 
354a3(rgyud 'grel): la nyon// zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bkas rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis ma dad pa dad par byas pa ste/ dad pa rnams kyang spong bar mi byed pa'o// rgyal chen bzhi 'khor dang 
354a4(rgyud 'grel): bcas pa rnams kyis kyang sems la zur zhig ces bya'o// mdo chen 'di ni thos nas kyang / mi rnams la ni gnod ma byed// ces bya ba ni/ sdig pa thams cad rlag par byed pas na mdo ste/ dge ba'i rtsa/ 
354a5(rgyud 'grel): pa 'dod pas na mdo'o// yang na sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan dang chos kyi nges tshig dang / dge ba dang mi dge ba thams cad de nas byung zhing bshad de de gsal bar bshad pas mdo zhes bya'o// 
354a6(rgyud 'grel): chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/ de lta bu'i ye shes kyi don thob pas na thob pa ste/ de lta bu'i rang bzhin gyis don gyis 'jigs pa med cing gnod 
354a7(rgyud 'grel): pa yang mi mnga' ste/ sems can rnams la phan par byed pa'o// gnod sbyin srin po klu rnams dang / nam mkha' lding dang gsang ba pa/ zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa thams cad de rnams kyis 
354a8(rgyud 'grel): byed de/ sdig pa yang de rnams kyis byed pa/ sems can la gnod par byed cing za ba dang 'thung ba tshol ba'o// phan par mi 'dod gang yang rung // de dag thams cad bzlog par bya/ zhes bya ba ni// 
354b1(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang rig sngags kyi dmod mos/ ma lus pa thams cad brlag par byed cing thal bar btang ste/ ma dad pa rnams kyang snang bar mi byed do// lha dang lha min rlung lha dang / ma mo'i tshogs kyis
354b2(rgyud 'grel): gang ba yis/ zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs kyi khams kyi lha dang / 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha rnams dang / phyogs skyong ba la sogs pa dang / dam tshig la gnas pa'i lha mo rnams yin te/ de yang ye shes pa dang // 
354b3(rgyud 'grel): 'jig rten gyi lha mo rnams so// gzhal med khang mdzes de dag ni/ me dang 'dra bar 'od gsal zhing / zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten pa ni 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal yas khang la gnas ste/ ye shes pa yang 
354b4(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin yin te/ so so rang rang gi 'od zer gyi snang bas nam mkha' la mdzes par snang ba'o// nyi ma zla ba'i tshul 'dra bar/ rin chen las byas shin tu snang / zhes bya ba ni/ mun pa mun nag gi nang na/ 
354b5(rgyud 'grel): yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po ches mi snang ste/ de bzhin du nyi ma zla bas gsal bar byas shing rin po che mthong ngo // de bzhin du glo bur gyi skyon nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bkag cing bla ma dam pa rnams kyi 
354b6(rgyud 'grel): gdam ngag bstan pas ye shes de snang ba'o// bsod nams byas pa dag gis gang / rab sngang gdon rnams rnams par spangs// zhes bya ba ni de bzhin de'i dge ba byas pa'i bsod rnams bsam 
354b7(rgyud 'grel): gyis mi khyab pa'o// gnod par byed pa dang / sdig pa bsags pa thams cad des de'i 'joms par byed pa'o// mi la gnod byed gang yin pa'i/ 'byung po grul bum srin po dang // zhes bya ba ni 
354b8(rgyud 'grel): khams gsum tsam yang skad cig gis bya ba ste/ la la bza' rgyu yod cing mchod par 'os te/ la la sems can rnams kyis kyang sdang zhing mod mos dmed pa'o// de 'byung po rnams kyis kyang mi'i sems 
355a1(rgyud 'grel): can la gnod par byed pa'o// yi dgas srul po de dag gis/ rmad byung de dag mi mthong ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig thags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi ye shes sdig can de dag gis 
355a2(rgyud 'grel): mi mthong ste/ zhing de dag rnams kyang bde bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro// gzi brjid ldan pa'i gdon lha rnams kyis// grong khyer du yang mi 'gro'o// zhes bya ba ni 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das 
355a3(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lnga rnams ste/ sems can la gnod par mi byed cing / byams pa dang snying rjes 'chi ba'o// de rnams kyi gzi brjid kyis ma rungs pa'i gdon rnams kyang rtsar 'gro bar mi nus shing / gnas kyang thob 
355a4(rgyud 'grel): par mi 'gyur ro// 'byung po chen po 'du ba na/ der yang de dag 'drar mi 'bang / zhes bya ba ni/ sems can la gnod par byed par 'byung po de kun yang lcang lo can gyi pho brang ci smos te/ de'i ra ba'i phyi rol 
355a5(rgyud 'grel): yang mi thob cing / rig sngags kyi dmad mos bde bar mi gnas pa'o// stan nam yang na chu yang rung // zas dang skom yang mi dbang ngo // zhes bya ba ni/ de bzhin de la dmalas 'das pa rnams 'thung ba 
355a6(rgyud 'grel): dang za ba ci smos te/ 'thung ba'i sgom yang zangs kyi chur mthong ngo // bza' ba'i zas kyang lcags kyi tho lum 'bar bar mthong / lus ngan gyi ni pho brang du// nam yang de dag 'gro mi 'gyur// zhes bya ba ni 
355a7(rgyud 'grel): gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon lcang lo can gyi pho brang du sdig can 'byung po gnod byed rnams dang / gzhan yang gnod sbyin rnams kyis srung zhing pho brang nang du gtam yang thob par mi 'gyur ro// rgyal po chen po 
355a8(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyi tshig/ 'byung po gang zhig mi nyan pa// zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis smras pa ste/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po ni/ yul 'khor bsrung dang / 'phags skyes po dang / spyan mi bzang 
355b1(rgyud 'grel): dang / lus ngan po rnams yin te/ de'i rig sngags kyi dmod mo dang rgyal po bzhi'i chad pas/ 'byung po de rnams bde bar mi 'gyur ro// de'i kha nas khrag dron dag/ myur du rab tu 'bab par 'gyur// zhes bya/ 
355b2(rgyud 'grel): ba ni/ ma rungs pa'i 'byung po de rnams rgyal po chen po bzhi'i chad pas myur du nad kyi thebs te/ kha nas khrag dron phyug cing srog gi dus la bab te/ mda' 'phangs pa bzhin du myur du dmyal bar skyes so// 
355b3(rgyud 'grel): de yi brla yi g.yas rol nas/ phol mig dag kyang 'byung 'gyur te/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyi brla g.yas rol nas ma rungs pa'i nad 'byung po// de ci'i phyir 'byung zhe ni/ rig sngags kyi 
355b4(rgyud 'grel): bka' las 'das pa dang / sems can la gnod par byas pa'i phyir ro// de ni nad kyi 'chi 'gyur zhing / gnod sbyin gzugs kyang ston par 'gyur// zhes bya ba ni/ nad de rnams kyis btab na 'chi ste/ 
355b5(rgyud 'grel): tshe phyi ma ngan song gsum du skye zhing / 'byung po'i lus blangs par gyur kyang / gzhan rnams kyis bsnyen du me btub cing de bas kyang sdug bsngal thob par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten skyong gis bshad

355b8(rgyud 'grel): can la snying rje che ba/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams so// de rnams kyis kyang bden pa'i bka' gsungs pa'o// 'jigs pa thams cad de la'o// mgo bo tshal pa bdun du 'gas zhes 
356a1(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sa g.yo ba'i 'jigs pa dang / me'i char 'bab pa dang / gnod sbyin 'byung po la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa dang / za ba dang / skom med cing rig sngags kyang dpyod

356a3(rgyud 'grel): sdugs ga / na pa dU / rnams kyis grags ma chen pa mas pa / byung ba pa pa ga ya ba/ don zung lda pa'i byung

356a8(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa la ni/ de dag dang 'khod par byas nas/ mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs nas phyogs phyogs su bsdad pa'o// shar phyogs na ni yul 'khor
356b1(rgyud 'grel): bsrung // lho phyogs na ni 'phags kyis so// zhes bya ba ni/ bri ba'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa ste/ de bzhin du grul bum gyi rgyal po 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa'o// nub phyogs na ni mig mi bzang / 
356b2(rgyud 'grel): byang phyogs na ni lus ngan po// zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad 'khor g.yog dang bcas pa ste/ de bzhin du gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnams kyang yin no// go cha gon zhing mtshon sna tshogs pa stobs dang 
356b3(rgyud 'grel): ldan pa sha stag go/ de dag de na 'khod pa yi// gnyen bskor gnod sbyin 'di rnams gnas/ zhes bya ba ni/ phyogs bzhi nas bu dang 'khor g.yog dang chung ma la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang phyogs gyogs nas srung 
356b4(rgyud 'grel): zhing gnas pa'o// seng+ge'i gzug sa dang sngags gi gzugs/ mi sdig pa dang 'gro zhing rmA/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung ba de rnams kyang 'dul bar byed pa'i rgyal po rnams ni seng+ge dang stag gi mgo can du gnas pa'o// 
356b5(rgyud 'grel): skad cig mas stong rgyu zhing 'khor bar gnas pa'o// glang chen gzugs dang rta'i gzugs/ kha cig ma he'i gzugs can te/ zhes bya ba ni/ stobs dang ldan zhing gzi brjid che ste/ skad cig mas ri rab rtse mo dang / bar snang 
356b6(rgyud 'grel): dang sa steng dang sa 'og tu dus gcig tu rgyu ba'o// dred mo dang ni ba yi gzugs// lugs dang spyang ku phag rgod rnams// zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po de rnams kyang sna tshogs gzugs su sprul zhing sems can rnams la bstan 
356b7(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// snab 'phyang dang rna bo che/ rna ba gcig pa tha dad pa// zhes bya ba ni/ glang po che bzhin du rnab 'phyang ba ste/ rna ba gcig pus gos byas shing / lus pa thams cad khebs pa ste// de bzhin du gzugs bstan zhing 
356b8(rgyud 'grel): sems can rnams la gnod par byed pa'o// skad cher 'byin cing 'jigs byed pa// sa gzhi rab tu g.yo bar byed// ces bya ba ni/ bum pa'i nang du skad smras pa bzhin du sems can rnams la 'tshe bar byas shing 'jigs
357a1(rgyud 'grel): par byed de/ bar chod byed pa dang / gnod par byed pa'i dus sa g.yo zhing skad sna tshogs 'dod par byed pa'o// bong bu dang ni rnga mo che/ cha lugs gzhan yang nye 'khor 'khod// ces bya ba ni/ mi'i 
357a2(rgyud 'grel): lus la rnga mo bong bu'i mgo bo dang / gzhan yang sems can gyi gzugs su sprul nas gzugs dngos su bstan pa dang / rmi lam du bstan pa'o// rgyal po chen po stobs po che// de dag phan tshun 'du ba ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ 
357a3(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du stobs dang ldan pas 'byung po ma rungs pa rnams kyang / rgyal po chen po rnams kyis 'dul zhing / sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'o// lha'i shing rta bcas pa yis// nam mkha' las ni 'gro bar byed/ 
357a4(rgyud 'grel): ces bya ba ni/ sna tshogs pa'i mtshan mthogs shing srung dang bcas shing 'gro ba ste/ de bzhin du bar snang dang sa 'og dang sa steng la gru ba'o// gnod sbyin dag gi bdag po yang // mi rnams la ni ba de legs byed// ces 
357a5(rgyud 'grel): bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang / rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing / gnod sbyin 'khor g.yog stong phrag nyi shu rtsa brgyad kyi bdag po ste/ rnam thos kyi bu de yang sems can la gnod par mi byed cing / snying 
357a6(rgyud 'grel): rje la gnas pa'o// de bzhin du rig sngags la mchod par byed cing / gus par byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs las/ las kyi rigs ma yin te/ mtshon pa ni bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes/ 
357a7(rgyud 'grel): mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o// ye shes lnga'i bdag nyid can/ sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum zhal gsum phyag drug pa sku mdog ljang gu'o// zhal mthing ka/ g.yon dmar ba 
357a8(rgyud 'grel): ste/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na/ ral gri dang rdo rje rgya gram mo// g.yon pa gnyis na/ skyabs sbyin dang 'khor lo bsdams pa'o// phyag 'og me'i g.yas g.yon gyi mda' gzhu bgengs pa ste/ rgyan 
357b1(rgyud 'grel): thams cad dang ldan pa'o// zhabs g.yas bsku ma/ g.yon bskyang ba/ pa h+la dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing / nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan zhing bzhad pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// rig sngags kyi gsang 
357b2(rgyud 'grel): sags ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ b+ha ga tu mu li b+ha ga tu mu le zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu// mi la zhon pa sde bcas pa// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i

357b5(rgyud 'grel): par snang ngo // rgyal po chen po rnam thos bu'i// rin chen shing rta bcas pa na zhes bya ba ste/ byang ngos kyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu de yang gzugs sna tshogs bstan cing / rin po che'i gdan la zhugs nas

357b8(rgyud 'grel): kyang / ma rungs pa'i srin po 'byung po rnams kyang dngos po rnams ni skrag par 'gyur ro// de'i mdun na chug par bgyid// mi ma yin pa'i gzugs rnams kyis/ zhes bya ba ni/ gzi brjid de mthong zhing 'jigs

358a2(rgyud 'grel): byed cing / rmi lam nyams pa la yang gzugs bstan cing / 'jigs pa'i sgra sgrogs te rtag tu sems can la gnod par byed pa'o// drag cing mthon na mi bsngag la// spu yang ring la sen mo ring // zhes bya
