362a8(rgyud 'grel): gal ba der 'khod de/ gus par bskyed nas thabs gcig tu'o// gnod sbyin byeb stong zag rnams// de dag phyag 'tshal skad du mchis// zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor g.yog bdag cag sangs rgyas dang / 
362a9(rgyud 'grel): chos dang dge 'dun la skyabs su mchos te/ gus par byas nas rag sngags la phyag 'tshal ba'o// gau tam dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// zhes bya ba ni/ bdud bzhi 
362b1(rgyud 'grel): bcom pa la dpa' bo ste/ de bzhin du mun pa mun nag bsal te/ 'jig rten las 'das nas sems can rnams kyi don byed pa ste/ bdag cag gis sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed de/ rig sngags/ 
362b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag gis gzung bar bya// sa ga wA rtsin zla ba dang / seng+ge sde dang rab gnon dang / zhes bya ba ni/ de yang gnod sbyin sde dpon nyi shu rtsa gnyis yin te/ de rnams kyi ming grangs rigasang sngagasal ba chen dang 
362b3(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa'o// rig pa stobs chen nor bu dang / zhes bya ba ni/ gsang sngags chen po dang / ba la la sogs pa'i bar ras 'di dag yin te/ gnod sbyin gyi sde dpo na nyi shu rtsa gnyis de yang stobs 
362b4(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan zhing gzi brjid che ste/ kha dog dang ldan zhing rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi rjod pa las rtsod par nus te/ gnod sbyin de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsang zhing / rig 
362b5(rgyud 'grel): sngags la rjes su yi rang ba'o// 'jog po rig po chen po dang // la ba can dang rje'u gnyis// zhes bya ba ni/ klu'i rgyal po klu rigs bzhi yin te/ de dag kyang sa dang tshul gnas shing bstan pa bsrung 
362b6(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// klu'i rgyal po sa srung bya// yan lag chen po rdzu 'phrul che// zhes bya ba ni/ stobs dang ldan zhing 'dog dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing 'jigs pa med cing / gnod par 
362b7(rgyud 'grel): me byed pa'o// nam mkha' ldi do ni shugs chen ldan// 'dab chags kun gyi mchog gyur pa/ zhes b+ha ba ni/ nam mkha'a'i lding gi rgyal po gser mig can yin te/ 'dab chags bya la gzugs che 
362b8(rgyud 'grel): zhing / stobs dang ldan pa'o// bu yi shugs kyis mchi bgyid cing // rgya mtsho kun tu 'khrug par bgyid// ces bya ba ni/ sems can des klu'i sems can rnams la 'jigs par byed de/ de yang de dag 
363a1(rgyud 'grel): rnams kyis kyang / 'tshe bar byed pa'i rgyu la gnas pa'o// lha dang lha min dri za rnams 'jigs bgyid pa dang dge ba'ang rung // zhes bya ba ni/ phan byed dang gnod byed gnyis 
363a2(rgyud 'grel): nus te/ de rnams kyis kyang / phan par byed pa dang / gnod par byed pa la gnas pa'o// ma dang pha dang dad pa rnams// de dag thams cad 'dir mchis te/ zhes bya ba ni/ chos la gnas pa dang mi 
363a3(rgyud 'grel): gnas pa gnyis// sdig la 'dzem pa dang mi 'dzem pa gnyis yin te/ de dag rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis so// gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing
363a4(rgyud 'grel): mchis// zhes bya ba ni/ ma rig pa la sogs pa bcom pa la dpa' ba/ nyon mongs pas mi tshugs shing thugs rje dang ldan pa ste/ gdon de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi mthus chos dang ldan par gnas/ 
363a5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// 'phrog ma zhes bya ba gnod sbyin no// 'jigs par bgyid pa stobs chen mo// zhes bya ba ni/ rang gi bu tsha ni snying du sdug te/ gzhan gyi bu tsha rnams 'jigs par byed cing / gnod byed nus pa ste/ des kyang 
363a6(rgyud 'grel): byis pa rnams la 'jigs par byed cing srog 'phrog pa'o// de yi bu ni lnga brgya rnams// 'jigs bgyid gnod sbyin mthu tsal can// zhes bya ba ni 'thog ma'i bu ste/ de rnams kyis kyang sems can la gnod par byed/ 
363a7(rgyud 'grel): cing mngal nas rlag par byed de/ ma dang bu rnams kyang srog 'phrog pa'o// bdag nyid kyi ni g.yog lags ste/ de dag phyag 'tshal slad du mchis// zhes bya ba ni/ 'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya dang / 'phrog ma dang bcas
363a8(rgyud 'grel): pa 'khor g.yog du ma gnas te/ de dag kyang sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal zhing skyabs su gsol te/ de ltar bcom ldan 'das gal ba der phyogs gcig tu gnas pa'o// gau ta ma dpa' bo 
363b1(rgyud 'grel): khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa rnams bcom zhing / de bzhin du de bcom pa la dpa' bo zhes bya te/ sdig dang / dge ba dang 'bral zhing sangs rgyas pa'o// 
363b2(rgyud 'grel): bdag cag gis kyang chos dang mthun par dge ba la gnas te/ sems can la snying rje ba zhing spyan sngar mchis pa'o// ma ga d+han thams cad mthong // ka shin ni pad+ma 'chang // zhes bya ba ni/ mngon sum du 'jig 
363b3(rgyud 'grel): rten gsum la rdzu 'phrul gyis mthong ste/ stobs de dang ldan pa'i gnod sbyin ni rgya gar gyis dbus su'o// yul go shi ka nas pad+ma 'chang nas te/ pad+ma bzhin du spyan yod pa'i phyir na pad+ma 'chang ba'o// yangs 
363b4(rgyud 'grel): pan+dan na rgyal mchog gnas// gyad yul na ni zags 'dzin gnas// zhes bya ba ni/ mag d+ha na gnod sbyin rgyal mchog gnas te/ de bzhin du gyad yul na yang de dang 'dra bar gnas pa ste/ stobs che zhi 
363b5(rgyud 'grel): gzi brjid dang ldan pa'o// rgyal po'i khab na kun b+hi ra// ser skya'i gnas na drag po ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ ri bo rgyal po'i khab kyi ded dpon ni gnod sbyin chen po kuM b+hi ra la sogs pa'o// de bzhin du ser 
363b6(rgyud 'grel): kye'i yul na zags pa dang ldan pa grags pa'o// ta ma la ni 'byor pa gnas// mi thil dang kun tu rgyal// zhes bya ba ni/ mi zi la dang ta mal gnyis ni ma ga d+ha'i lho phyogs yin te/ gnod sbyin chen po dang kun/ 
363b7(rgyud 'grel): tu rgyal gnas pa'o// ma mo chen mo 'di brgyad ni/ gnod sbyin rnams kyi sde dpon mchog/ ces bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi ma mo brgyad yin te/ de yang 'di dag gis ming ni 'joms pa'i dngos grub dang / keng rus can
363b8(rgyud 'grel): dang / tshangs chen ma dang / nag mo chen mo dang / gzhon nu mo dang / rnam rgyal mo dang / drag mo dang / khyab 'jug mo dang brgyad do// de rnams ni 'jig rten gyi mar gyur cing mi srun gnod sbyin rnams kyi bdag mo'o// rdzu 'phrul chen 
364a1(rgyud 'grel): mo skal ba che// stobs chen de dag thams cad ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig mas 'jig rten khams la 'gyu ste/ kha dog ldan zhing gtor ma rnams len par byed pa'o// gzhan rnams kyis kyang mchod par// 
364a2(rgyud 'grel): 'os shing gtor ma len du gtad pa'o// yi dge dad pa'i sems dang ldan// rdzogs sangs rgyas la skyabs mchis pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ glo bur gyi dad pa ma yin pa lnga nas kyang dad pa dang ldan te/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa 
364a3(rgyud 'grel): bsrung zhing rig sngags kyi chos la gus par byas te/ sangs rgyas dang chos dang / dge 'dun la rjes su yi rang zhing skyabs su 'gro ba'o// de dag dang ni 'dus nas kyang / rgyal po chen po stobs chen gyis// zhes bya ba ni
364a4(rgyud 'grel): rgyal ba chen po rnams thos kyi bu yang stobs dang ldan te/ de dag kyang dbang du 'du zhing / sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o// yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas bstan la// mi rnams la ni snying brtse skad ces bya ba ni 
364a5(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis gzi brjid la brten nas/ rig sngags kyi dmod mo'i 'jigs pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi rnams la 'jigs par mi byed cing / snying rje skye ba'o// gnod sbyin 'byung po yi dwags dang // sdang 
364a6(rgyud 'grel): ba'i gdon rnams bzlog pa dang // zhes bya ba ni/ sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa thams cad sangs chus kyi bka' dang rig sngags kyig zi brjid kyis gnod sbyid 'byung ba'i gdan rnams bzlog par byed cing / de rnams kyis 
364a7(rgyud 'grel): kyang mi tshugs pa'o// mi ma yin rnams bzlog pa yi// srung ba 'di ni legs par bgyid// zhes bya ba ni/ srung ba'i dam pa rjod gter dang / rig pa dang sngags dang / de rnams bzlog pa ste/ de bzhin du 'byung po dang / yi dgas 
364a8(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa bzlog par byed pa'o// de nas rgyal po rnam thos bu// thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni// zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der rgyal po chen po rnam thos bus/ bus mo g.yas pa'i lha sel btsugs te 
364b1(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar nas zhus pa'o// khon dang 'jigs kun 'das pa// rnam grol zag pa mi mnga' ba// zhes bya ba ni/ shes bya'i dri ma dang / bag chags kyi dri ma mi gnas shing / 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams/ 
364b2(rgyud 'grel): cad btsam ste/ 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral bar byed pa dam pa'i dam pa'o// gau ta ma dpa' bo byad la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams la dbang mdzad cing / bgegs 
364b3(rgyud 'grel): thams cad bcom pa ste/ de bcom pas na/ dpa' bo zhes bya ba'o// gau ta ma la phyag 'tshal skyabs su 'gro ba'o// khyod la sgra dang / grul bum dang / bram ze thams cad phyag 'tshal te/ zhes bya ba ni/ mi mjed kyi bdag po/ 
364b4(rgyud 'grel): tshangs pas phyag 'tshal te/ 'jig rten pa'i stong spyi bud dgye bdag po yin te/ yang na bram ze phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ tshangs par spyod pa'i dbang po de la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi zhes bya ba'o// gnod sbyin bye ba 
364b5(rgyud 'grel): drug khre dang // bzhi stong dag kyang lhags nas ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ gzugs sna tshogs bstan pa/ sna tshogs kyi lta ba yod pa// gnod byed dang phan byed gnyis yod pa/ sdig pa dang / dge ba byed pa sha stag bcom ldan 
364b6(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyi spyan sngar mang por 'dus pa'o// khor khor yug yongs bskor nas/ thal mo sbyar te 'khod krung lags// zhes bya ba ni/ dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal gyi sa gzhi la/ gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams pus mo 
364b7(rgyud 'grel): g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyogs phyogs nas bskor zhing thal mo sbyar ba'o// bdag ni rgyal po rnam thos bu// byang phyogs sbyong bar bgyid pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni rgyal po 
364b8(rgyud 'grel): rnam thos kyi bus kyang gnod sbyin chen po 'khor g.yog dang bcas shing byang phyogs na bsrung bar bgyid pa'o// 'jig rten mgon po'i nye bskor du// gnod sbyin chub spro byed dang // zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das 
365a1(rgyud 'grel): ga la ba der gza' dang / rdzu skar dang / bcas shing bzhin sdug pa dang / mi sdug pa rnams kyis bskor te/ 'byung po mang po spyan sngar 'dus pa'o// brjed byed dang ni mi'am ci// skems 
365a2(rgyud 'grel): byed pa ni rims drag dang // zhes bya ba ni/ glo bur du nad gtong ba dang / glo bur du bar chod byed pa 'di rnams yin te/ gzi brjid 'phrog pa 'di rnams kyang / bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar gnas pa'o// de 
365a3(rgyud 'grel): bzhin rims rnams zhag bzhi pa/ de dag bdag gi bzlog par bgyi/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi gzi brjid kyis/ rims nad la sogs pa nad rigs 
365a4(rgyud 'grel): mi cig pa bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi bzlog par byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi/ 'byung po mang po rigs brtag pa'i gnas skabs te/ drug pa'o// // bsil ba'i tshal gyi rig sngags zhes bya ba 
365a5(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni/ gang zhe na/ las kyi rigs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs ni/ mtshon pa ni chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so// mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal lo// gzugs kyi phung po ste/ 
365a6(rgyud 'grel): khams ni sa'i khams so// skye mched ni mig ste/ rang bzhin ni ye shes lnga'o// sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/ zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ sku mdog 
365a7(rgyud 'grel): dkar mo// zhal g.yas mthong ka/ g.yon dmar ba/ phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang 'khor lo// g.yon pa gnyis na dgra sta dang rtse gsum// 'og ma'i g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs pa 
365a8(rgyud 'grel): zhabs g.yas bkram pa/ g.yon basbyang ba/ pad+ma dang / bla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing nyi ma'i 'od dang bcas pa ste/ zhi ba'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
365b1(rgyud 'grel): u ha haM zhes bya ba la sogs pa'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu lus ngan lung lo can gyi bdag po phyogs skyong bar gyur cig ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi rig sngags kyi byin brlabs kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi bstan pa 
365b2(rgyud 'grel): bsrung te/ byang phyogs skyor zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o// lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems can rnams la don byed cing // rnam thos kyi bu la phyag 'tshal te/ de bzhin du 'byung po rnams 
365b3(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang skyabs su mchi zhes bya'o// de la bdag kyang phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba ni/ gnod sbyin 'byung po rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o// de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te/ zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten dbang 
365b4(rgyud 'grel): phyag sems can gyi don la sprul pa'i skus khyab pa de la bdag gis phyag 'tshal zhes bya ba'o// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud/ ces bya ba ni/ shes bya dang bag 
365b5(rgyud 'grel): tshogs kyi sgrib pa'ajoms shing 'jig rten gyi rnam par rtogs pa grol zhing / rgyal ba rnam par rgyal nas sangs rgyas so// 'jig rten kun gyi 'jigs skyob pa khyod la 'dud do// zhes bya'o// yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud 
365b6(rgyud 'grel): chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis/ zhes bya ba ni/ phyin ci ma log cing nges par bdud bzhi bcom pa ste/ yang dag pa'i ye shes thob cing / sems can gyi don mdzad pa'o// de lta bu'i gzi brjid kyis bdag kyang 
365b7(rgyud 'grel): sems can la snying rje byas shing spyan sngar mchis so// zhes bya ba'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ rnam thos kyi bu'i tshig gi de nas so// rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srungs// thal sbyar 'dug ste smras pa ni/ zhes bya ba ni/ 
365b8(rgyud 'grel): shar phyogs kyi rgyal po dri za thams cad la dbang mdzad pa/ pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar thal mo sbyar nas zhus pa'o// chos kyi rgyal po 'od mdzad pa// sangs 
366a1(rgyud 'grel): rgyas dpal la bdag phyag 'tshal// zhes bya ba ni/ chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong 'jig rten la bshad nas sku mya ngan las 'das te/ chos de'i 'od zer 'jig rten gyi khams rnams la khyab ste/ 
366a2(rgyud 'grel): de bzhin du de sangs rgyas shing snying rje che la bdag gis phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'o// gau ta ma dpa' bo khyod la ni/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// zhes bya ba ni/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad blangs shing bdud 
366a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams btul ba ste/ de bzhin du 'khor ba'i mun nag sel zhing sangs rgyas pa'o// de lta bu'i chos kyi gzi brjid kyis bdag cag dri za rnams ni sems can rnams la snying rje byas shing spyan sngar mchis so// gau ta ma khyod kyis kyang 
366a4(rgyud 'grel): mkhyen pa// de ni lha rnams phyag 'tshal lo// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsal ba'i tshal gyi ye shes de ni bdag cag rnams kyis mi shes te/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ rang bzhin dang bral ba/ skye ba med pa'i rang 
366a5(rgyud 'grel): bzhin no// srin po mthong na rab 'jigs pa// stong phrag drug cu rtsa bzhi rnams// zhes bya ba ni/ bzhin mi sdug pa dang / sdug pa rnams dri za srin po mang po 'dus pa'o// khor khor yug yongs bskor nas/ thal ma 
366a6(rgyud 'grel): byu g+h+ra// 'a shA / ba dag/ rnaM ga nag kyi rgyags thas gams na 
366a7(rgyud 'grel): thal mo sbyar nas 'jig rten mgon po la'o// bdag ni rgyal po yul 'khor srung // shar phyogs myong bar bgyid pa ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing / rig sngags kyi 
366a8(rgyud 'grel): bka' las mi 'da' ste/ rig sngags 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag la shar phyogs myong bar bgyid cing sems can gyi don byed pa'o// 'jig rten mgon po'i nye 'khor du// srin po rnams dang sha za dang / zhes bya ba ni/ de 
366b1(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis sangs rgyas kyi bka' las mi 'da' zhing de rnams kyis kyang skyong bar byed pa'o// dri za dang ni rlung lha rnams// de dag pa dag gis bzlog par bgyi// zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal 
366b2(rgyud 'grel): po yul 'khor srung gis kyang / zod gtong dang rig pa dang / sngags dang ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams bzlog cing rig sngags la gus par byed pa ste/ rig sngags kyi ngo bo ni gang zhe na las kyi rigs kyi rin chen 
366b3(rgyud 'grel): rigs// mtshan pa de mnyam pa sher kye ye shes te/ mtshan byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal le// ye shes lnga'i rang bzhin sangs rgyas 'i dbu rgyan can/ spyanagasum brgyan thams cad kyis brgyan 
366b4(rgyud 'grel): zhal gsum pa/ phyag drug pa/ sku mdog ser mo// phyag g.yas pa gnyis na ral gri dang rin po che/ g.yon pa gnyis na pad+ma dang / 'khor lo bsnams pa'o// de'i 'og ma g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mda' gzhu 'gengs 
366b5(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// zhabs g.yas bskum pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la bzhugs shing / nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan zhing / sgeg pa'i tshul du bzhugs pa'o// rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig ni gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ 
366b6(rgyud 'grel): i Te mi Te la sogs rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung phyogs skyong bar gyur cig/ ces bya ba ni/ shar phyogs su skyong ba ste/ rig sngags 'di la bka' stsal cing / sems can don la skyong ba'o// srin po dang zhes bya ba la
366b7(rgyud 'grel): sogs pa ni/ shar phyogs na gnod par byed pa ste rnams ni/ rgyal po yul 'khor srung rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis de rnams shar phyogs nas byung ba bzlogs pa'o// lha'i nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba 
366b8(rgyud 'grel): mchis te/ zhes bya ba ni/ dri za'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung la skyabs su mchis te/ shar phyogs kyi mnga' bdag la phyag 'tshal ba'o// de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ shar phyogs na yod pa'i 'byung po rnams kyis 
367a1(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal ba'o// de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal ba ste/ zhes bya ba ni/ bzhi bcom drug ldan/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas la bdag cag rnams kyis phyag 'tshal lo zhes pa'o// rdzogs pa'i/ 
367a2(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas dpa' bo ste/ kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'dud// ces bya ba ni/ rnam par rtog pa thams cad dang bral zhing 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga bcom ste/ de lnga dang bral nas mya ngan las 'das pa'o// de lta bu'i// 
367a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas kyis kun nas kun tu 'jigs pa bcom ste/ de yang 'khor ba'i 'jigs pa bcom pa'o// yang dag dpa' bo khyod la 'dud/ chos bzhin mthun par lta zhing mchis// zhes bya ba ni/ phyin ci ma log cing rig 
367a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi ngo bo nyid bstan te/ de'i ye shes kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom ste/ de lta bu'i sangs rgyas chos la mthun pa byas shing sems can rnams la 'tshe bar mi byed pa'o// de nas zhes bya ba ni/ yul 'khor srung 
367a5(rgyud 'grel): gi tshig gi de nas so// rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po// thal sbyar 'dug te smras pa ni// zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes pos kyang stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus mo g.yas 
367a6(rgyud 'grel): pa'i lha ba sa la btsugs nas thal mo sbyar te zhes bya ba'o// 'jig rten mgon po rgyabs mdzad pa/ 'jig rten kun la phan par mdzad// ces bya ba ni/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams la sprul 
367a7(rgyud 'grel): nyon mongs pa rnams bcom zhing dpa' ba ste/ sku gsung thugs thams cad ma lus par sangs rgyas pa de'i chos bzhin grul bum bdag cag gis mchis te/ sems can la 'tsho bar mi byed cing snying rje'i sems dang //

372b2(rgyud 'grel): gyis brgyan pa/ phyag dang po'i gAyas g.yon gyis rdo rje snying khar 'dzin cing / g.yon gyi dril bu dkur brten cing gnas pa'o// de'i 'og ma g.yas g.yon gnyis kyi chos kyi dbyings kyi phyag rgya dbu steng du mdzad 
372b3(rgyud 'grel): ba'o// g.yas pa ga sum na rdo rje/ bzhi pa na la we/ wa panas la// g.yon pa gsum ni na pa ni/ bzhi pan zhags pa/ lnga pan lpags kyu/ de'i blag pa g.yas g.yin gyis mda' gzhu 'gangs pa'o// 
372b4(rgyud 'grel): thabs shes rab ngo bo nyid du bzhugs pa rdo rje sems dpa'i rang bzhin mi bskyod pas rgyas btab pa/ chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes te/ de yang sgyu ma lta bu me long lta bu'i ye shes kyis brgyan pa'o// de gnyis kyi rang bzhin gyi 
372b5(rgyud 'grel): ye shes lnga rgyas btab pa'o// mtshon pa ni ye shes lnga yin te/ mtshon byed ni rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'o// phung po ni rnam par shes pa'i phung po'o// khams ni nam mkha'i khams/ skye mched ni yid kyi skye mched/ zhabs 
372b6(rgyud 'grel): phyed skyil du bzhugs shing / klu bo mo dang / gnod sbyin po mo mnan pa/ pad+ma dang zla ba nyi ma'i gdan la bzhugs shing / bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar ba'i 'od dang ldan zhing / ma rig pa'i mun pa thams cad sreg pa'o// 
372b7(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi rdo rje'i snying po ni gling zhe na/ 'dir bsten pa ste/ gang bstan cen/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas bstan pa'o// de yang rdo rje'i steng ba'o// hi la~M hi le b+hi sa ni la sogs 
372b8(rgyud 'grel): pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di bka' stsal ba na/ zhes bya ba ni dag sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di'i gzi brjid dang / skabs dang / dpa' bas 'da'i sngags bshad mthag tus gal ba dang / chen po 
373a1(rgyud 'grel): byung ba'o// sa ni kun tu g.yos zhes b+ha ba ni/ rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ ji bzhin tu g.yos she nas chen pa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos/ rab tu g.yos/ kun tu rab tu g.yos so// 'gul rab tu 
373a2(rgyud 'grel): 'phrul/ kun tu rab tu 'phrul/ bldags rab tu ldegs/ kun tu rab tu ldeg/ che mtsham/ rab tu chem chem/ kun tu rab tu che mchem/ 'ur 'ur rab tu'u ra 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur/ shig shig rab tu shig shig/ 
373a3(rgyud 'grel): kun tu rab tu shig shig ste/ ltas chen po bco brgyad byung ba'o// des nas ni kun tu g.yos zhes bya ba'o// rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis/ sa des kyang mi theg cing g.yos pa'o// 'byung po thams cad ni rab 
373a4(rgyud 'grel): shwa 'dar nas zhes bya ba ni/ skad cig smra bar mi nus shing / lus kyang 'thams nas pa spu yang gyen du log ste/ 'jigs par byas nas 'bros pa'i tshul du bstan to// kye mgyi hud kyi ma sdug bsngal sgra chen 
373a5(rgyud 'grel): po byung ngo // zhes bya ba ni 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyang rab tu 'jigs nas 'byung po rnams rlag par byed do// skam nas skad chen po gton to// yang nas yang du skad ngan chen po gton to// srin po rnams 
373a6(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang 'di skad ces smras te/ zhes bya ba ni 'byung ba dang bcas shing / bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o// 'di ltar yang dag rdzogs sangs rgyas// sems can kun la thugs rtse ba// zhes bya ba 
373a7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i lam nas kyang sangs rgyas te/ de bzhin du bskal pa grangs med pa'i sngon du tshogs bsags te/ tshogs bsags pa de yang / sems can thams cad kyi don du bsngo ste/ mnyam
373a8(rgyud 'grel): pa nyid kyi sems can bye den mdzad pa'o// 'byung po kun 'jigs zhen pa yi// rig sngags 'di 'dra gsung bar mdzad// ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos ma rungs pa'i 'byung po rnams kyang bcom nang 
373b1(rgyud 'grel): thal bar rlog pa ste/ de lta bu'i gzi brjid che ba'i rig sngags ni sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i zhal nas gsung ba'o// de nas kun mkhyen ston pa po// sems can kun la thugs rtse ba shes bya ba ni/ de nas ni / 
373b2(rgyud 'grel): mtshams sbyor ba'i de nas so// chos kyi phung po brgyad khri bzhi stong bstan te/ de yang sems can rigs mi cig pas theg pa sna tshogs bstan pa ste/ 'khor ba'i sems can rnams la/ byams pa dang snying rjes 
373b3(rgyud 'grel): khyab pa'o// gnod sbyin srin bu dri za dang / klu dang mkha' lding gsang ba pa/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems can las kyi 'bras bu mi gcig pas/ 'byung po'i lus su gzhan la gnod pa'i sems dang ldan par skyes 
373b4(rgyud 'grel): te/ de yang yi dgaso dang / byol song gi lus su skyes pa'o// 'byung po rgyu ba gzi brjid 'phrog/ grul bu ma yi dgas srul po dang / zhes bya ba ni/ de rgyu ba dang sems can phrad par gyur na/ gti mug dang zhe 
373b5(rgyud 'grel): sdang yod pas/ sems can rnams la gzi brjid 'ophrog ste/ snying rje'i sems dang mi ldan pa'o// lha min gshed bye dar langs dang / brjed byed dang ni mi 'am ci/ zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams la bza' ba med cing 
373b6(rgyud 'grel): sgom pa'i sbyin pa ma btang zhing khro ba ste/ la la yang mchod rdzas la sogs pa za bar yod pa ni/ sbyin pa gtong zhing khro bar byas pa'o// skem byed dang ni rims drag dang / de bzhin bram ze srin po dang / zhes bya ba 
373b7(rgyud 'grel): ni/ gzhan la grags pa 'dod pas/ sems can gyi srog gcad cing / sbyin pa zad pa med po btang te/ de'i 'bras bus kyang srin po la sogs par skye zhing snying rje med pa'o// smyo byed rims nad zhag gsum 
373b8(rgyud 'grel): pa// de bzhin zhag ni bzhi pa rnams// zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po dang / 'byung po ma yin pa/ rims de dag kyang rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'joms pa ste/ gzhan yang nad rlung dang / bad kan dang / mkhris pa las gyur pa 
374a1(rgyud 'grel): bzhi brgya brgyad cu rtsa bzhi yang 'joms pa'o// skrag cing rab tu 'dar gyur te/ phyogs bcur rgyug pa gzigs nas kyang // zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po'i tshogs rnams kyang rig sngags kyi gzi brjid 
374a2(rgyud 'grel): mthong bas 'jigs shing skrag pa ste/ phyogs bzhi nas kyang 'bros par 'gyur ro// de dag la ni thugs rje'i phyir// rig sngags 'di ni brjod par mdzad/ ces bya ba ni/ de dag kyang las kyi 'bras bus skyes ste/ de yang 
374a3(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas thugs rje'i sebs kyis sems can la 'thos par 'gyur ro// de dag kyang las kyi 'bras byas skyes te/ de yang sangs rgya ba thugs rje'i sems kyis sems can la mnyam shing du sgrub to// de yang rig 
374a4(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyi ngo bo ni/ thabs dang shes rab gnyis su med pa ste/ ye shes kyi rang bzhin chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes so// thabs kyi ngo bo nyid ni rig sngags so// de'i rigs ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs te/ phung po

374a6(rgyud 'grel): brten cing / g.yon dril bu dkul brten pa'o// de'i 'og ma g.yas pa gsum na ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / dgra lta'o// de bzhin du g.yon pa gsum na/ zhag pa dang / rtse gsum dang / dung rnams pa'o// 
374a7(rgyud 'grel): zhabs rdo rje'i skyil krung du bzhugs shing / pad+ma dang zla ba'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od dang ldan pa'o// rig sngags bsil ba'i tshal de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ngo bo yin no// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ni gang zhe na/ 
374b1(rgyud 'grel): 'di lta ste/ rig sngags dang gsang sngags kyi tshigaH/ hi ri ma hA/ ti ta Sha khA k+Sha T+Ta ma Ti la sogs pa'o// grwa sang sngags chen mo'i rig sngags chen ma 'di las 'gal bar ma byed cig ces bya ba ni/ 'byung ba/ 
374b2(rgyud 'grel): la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang rig sngags las 'gal bar byed par gyur na/ tshe 'di la yang sdug bsngal drag po thob cing / phyi ma la yang dmyal bar skye bar 'gyur ro// bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gi cho sa la

374b4(rgyud 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' las 'das shing / rig sngags la smra bar gyur na/ mgo bo dang lus tshal pa brgyar 'gas shing / ar dza ga'i many+dzar bzhin du 'gas te/ tshe 'di la yang nad kyis sdug

375a1(rgyud 'grel): 'phags pa 'di thos pa'o// skrag cing sngangs te/ mi dga' la spyi bung zhes byed nas/ thal mo sbyar te zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos rgyal po chen po bzhi yang mdog 
375a2(rgyud 'grel): shor zhing ba spu rnams kyang gyen du log ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar dad pa skyes nas thal mo sbyar ba'o// bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing gros mthun pa dang tshig mthun pa dang zhes bya ba ni rgyal

375a5(rgyud 'grel): sngags kyid med mas rlag par byed pa'o// dngos po med cing yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed pa'o// mi yi 'jig rten bden 
375a6(rgyud 'grel): babyed pa'i// rig sngags bdag cag brjod par 'tshal// zhes byung ni rig sngags 'di 'chang ba rnams bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / skyob pa dang / zhi ba dang / ba de legs su 'acu ba zhing / sdug bsngal

375a8(rgyud 'grel): shing / ngo bo nyid dang bral zhing mi dmigs pa'o// 'jig rten dbang phyug gis kyang / rig sngags legs par gsungs shing legs par nyon cig ces gsungs pa'o// yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas

376b8(rgyud 'grel): 'byung po bdud kyi rigs de rnams ni/ sa la 'dzul ma nus shing phyogs phyogs su bros te hag zad do// de nas zhes bya ba ni 'byung po rnams bros pa'i de nas so// rgyal po chen po bzhis phyogs bzhir me lce'i phung po mngon 
377a1(rgyud 'grel): par sprul to// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo'i gzi brjid kyis/ rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang / phyogs mtshams thams cad du me sna tshogs sprul zhing /

377b4(rgyud 'grel): ma bcom par gnyug ma ste/ phyogs dang bral zhing rang bzhin med pa de lta bu'i ye shes brjod pa'o// de yang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo las kyi rigs ni las thams cad rdzogs par byed pa/ las kyi gdon thams 
377b5(rgyud 'grel): cad 'joms pa las thams cad grub/ sna tshogs kyi rigs su snang ba'o// de yang rig sngags kyi mtshon pa ni/ bya ba nan tan gyi ye shes so// mtshon byed ni rig sngags bdag nyid do// phung po ni 'du shes kyi 
377b6(rgyud 'grel): phung po'o// khams ni rlung gi khams so// skye mched ni lus kyi skye mched do// ye shes lnga'i ngo bo nyid sangs rgyas lnga'i dbu rgyan can/ spyan gsum pa/ zhal bzhi pa/ phyag brgyad pa/ sku mdog ldang nag 
377b7(rgyud 'grel): zhal g.yas dkar po// g.yon dmar po// rgyab ser po// phyag g.yas dang po na rdo rje gdengs pa/ gnyis pa na ral gri/ gsum pa na rdo rje rgya gram mo// g.yon dang po ni dril bu/ gnyis pa zhags pa/ gsum pa 
377b8(rgyud 'grel): 'khor lo'o// 'og ma'i phyag g.yas g.yon gnyis kyis mnga' gzhu 'gengs shing / zhabs g.yas pa pus mo btsugs pa/ g.yon brkyang ba/ bdud bzhi'i rang bzhin 'byung po rnams mnan pa'o// pad+ma'i 
378a1(rgyud 'grel): steng na nyi ma'i gdan la nyi ma'i 'od ldan pa'o// yan lag thams cad sprul gyis brgyan pa/ khro bo 'jigs su rung ba'i gzugs so// rig sngags kyi gsang sngags las kyi snying pos ni/ las
378a2(rgyud 'grel): thams cad 'grub cing bdud thams cad 'dul ste/ sems can thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed pa'o// gsang sngags kyi tshig ni 'di lta ste/ gi ma gi ma la sogs pa'o// rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu phyogs skyong bar 
378a3(rgyud 'grel): gyur cig/ ces bya ba ni/ sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / rig sngags kyi byin brlabs kyi gang zag rig sngags la gus pa dang / sems can thams cad dang / de la bsrung ba dang / skyong bar byed cing / rig sngags kyi 
378a4(rgyud 'grel): chos kyi bstan pa bsrung ba'o// lha rnams kyi nang na lha'i rgyal po nor lha'i bu zhes bgyi ba mchis te/ zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa'o// nor thams cad gzhan gyi don du byin pa/ sems 
378a5(rgyud 'grel): can thams cad kyi don byed pa ste/ de lta bu'i sems dang ldan pa/ nor lha lta bu byung ba'o// de la bdag phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba ni/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' la rgyal po rnams dang / 'byung po rnams kyis 
378a6(rgyud 'grel): phyag 'tshal ba'o// de yang bcom ldan 'das nyid la phyag 'tshal te zhes bya ba ni/ bdud rnams las rnam par rgyal zhing dgra rnams kyang ma lus te/ phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan zhing / sangs rgyas pa te/ de lta bu'i 
378a7(rgyud 'grel): bcom ldan 'das la/ bdag cag rnams kyis phyag 'tshal ba'o// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyal dpa' bo nye/ kun mkhyen kun gzigs khyod la 'du// ces bya ba ni/ nyon mongs pa thams cad bcom zhing / dpa' 
378a8(rgyud 'grel): bste/ gla gsung thugs rdzogs par byas pas na rdzogs pa te/ drag gsum dang bral nang / sangs rgyas pa'o// deg bu'i sangs rgyas rkang gnyis mchog/ shes rab chen po rtsod la 'dud// ces bya ba ni/ ldan 
378b1(rgyud 'grel): bskal pa grangs med pa'i dus su tshogs rdzogs te/ de ltar ma lus par sems can thams cad rdzogs par 'dod nas/ zag pa sna tshogs dang / thabs sna tshogs bstan pa ste/ rkang gnyis kyi tshogs kyi dam pa/ 
378b2(rgyud 'grel): phyi nang gi tshogs la mkhas pa/ thams cad mkhyen zhing thams cad la byams pas khyab pa'o// de lta bu'i thub pa chen po la 'dud pa'o// gau ta ma khyod kyis gang mkhyen pa de ni lha rnams ma 'tshal to// zhes bya ba ni/ yang 
378b3(rgyud 'grel): dag pa'i ye shes ni rgya tsho lta bu ste/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan yang de bzhin no// de lta bu'i ye shes zhes pa ni/ lta ci smos te/ rang nyid kyis rang gi rig pa yang mi shes pa'o// rang gi rig pa'i ci'i phyir ma shes na/ rang la 
378b4(rgyud 'grel): skyes pa'i ma rig pas ma shes pa'o// yang dag dpa' ba khyod la 'dud// chos bzhin mthun par // zhing mchis// zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par bdung bzhi btsam ste/ de 'dul bas na dpa' bo ste/ dag bu'i ye shes 
378b5(rgyud 'grel): dang ldan pa la yang dag par 'dud de/ bdag cag kyang snying rje dang ldan zhing mchis pa'o// zhes bya ba'o// gnod sbyin dang / srin bu dang / dri za nas gnod par byed pa'i bar rnams mi 'di zhes bya ba'i lus la babs pa las
378b6(rgyud 'grel): gud du dengs shig ces bya ba ni/ ma rung ba'i sdig can 'byung po rnams ni/ gang zag rig sngags 'chang ba dang / sems can rnams la gnod pa byas nas/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos mgo bo a tsa kar mdza ri'i rdog pa 
378b7(rgyud 'grel): bzhin du tshal par 'gas pa'o// gal te ming 'di zhes bya ba'i lus las myur du ma dong na/ zhes bya ba ni/ rig pa mi 'chang ba'i gong du/ sdig can ma rungs pa rnams kyis bzung bar gyur na/ de nas sangs rgyas rnams
378b8(rgyud 'grel): kyis gsungs pa bzhin du rig pa 'chang ste/ de'i chos bzhin du gang zag dang sems can la bsrung bar byas te/ myur du mthun na nyes pa chen por 'gyur ro// de dag la myur du 'jigs pa chen po dang / nad drag pos 
379a1(rgyud 'grel): 'debs par 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa sdig can gtum po'i rigs 'byung po rnams ni nad drag po mdze dang / phol mig dang / 'bras dang ldog pa dang / shakra dang me 
379a2(rgyud 'grel): sbal dang chu bur dang / 'brum bu dang / lus thams cad rul zhing g.yan pa la sogs pa'i nad kyi thebs shing srog dang 'bral te/ shi 'bos nas kyang mnar med du skye ba'o// de'i rkyen gyis mgo dang skar tshal brgyar 
379a3(rgyud 'grel): 'gas par 'gyur te zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag ji bzhin du gnod par byed bzhin te sdig can de yang sdug bsngal drag po thob ste/ nad chen pos btab pa'o// de'i mos la sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang brlag pa dang 
379a4(rgyud 'grel): mtha' med par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi dmod mos sdug bsngal drag po 'byung ste/ gar yang 'gro sa med cing lcang lo can gyi pho brang yang mi thob ste/ de'i lus kyang zhig cing rul par 'gyur ro// 'brum 
379a5(rgyud 'grel): bu'i gdon gang yin pa dang / skya reng 'char ka'i gdon gang yin pa dang / grib gnon gyi gdon gang yin pa de dag kyang bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di thos nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'di gdon pa dang sgom pa dang yid la byed pa dang // 
379a6(rgyud 'grel): gdam ngag byin pa dang / bshad pa dang / rjes su yi rang zhing 'chang ba ste/ de dag la gnod par 'gyur na/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das pa'o// yang na rig sngags 'di mnyan nas sems can la 'tshe bar mi bya'o// 
379a7(rgyud 'grel): myur du thob po zhes bya ba'o// gal te myur du ma dongs na 'jigs pa chen po dang / nad drag pos 'debs par 'gyur la zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi bka' las 'das shing ma btang bar gyur na/ rgyal po chen pos zhi'i// 
379b1(rgyud 'grel): chad pa'i 'jigs pa dang / g.yan pa'i nad la sogs pas myur du thebs par 'gyur ro// de'i rkyen gyi mgo bo dang snying tshal ba rgyar 'gas par 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bka' dang / 
379b2(rgyud 'grel): rig sngags kyi dmod mos a dza ri'i gdogs pa bzhin du 'gas pa'o// de'i mod la sdug bsngal du ma 'byung ba dang / brlag pa dang mtha' med par 'gyur ro// zhes bya ba ni de bzhin du rig sngags kyi dmod mos 'gro sa mi
379b3(rgyud 'grel): rnyed cing / de'i rnam par smin pas sdug bsngal drag po thob ste/ shi nas kyang mnar med kyi mes sregs cing / dmyal ba nas dmyal bar 'khor ro// gzi byin dang ni khrag za ba/ nyin mtshan rgyu ba gang yin pa/ zhes bya ba ni// 
379b4(rgyud 'grel): zas su khrag za dang sha za dang la sogs pa rnams kyis kyang gzi brjid 'phrog pa dang / sems can la 'tshe bar byed pa dang / nyin mo dang mtshan mo la sogs pa rgyu zhing ma byed cig ces bya'o// de dag gis kyang legs
379b5(rgyud 'grel): gsungs pa'i// mdo bshad thos nas spang bar gyis/ zhes bya ba ni/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis// rig sngags 'di yang yang dag par gsungs te/ de bzhin du rgyal po chen po bzhi po rnams kyis kyang 
379b6(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yi rang zhing srung ba ste/ de bzhin du khyad par du 'phags pa'i mdo 'di thob par gyur na/ sems can la gnod par byed pas sdug bsngal dpag tu med pa thob pa'o// de bas na spang bar gyis zhes bya ba'o/ 
379b7(rgyud 'grel): nalus 'phags gam byed dang // 'byung ba 'jigs byed bral po rnams// zhes bya ba ni/ 'thung ba derna pas kyis kyang sems can la gan par byas te/ yang dpal btags nas gnod par byed pa srungs par// 
379b8(rgyud 'grel): de dag gis kyang legs gsungs pa'i// mdo 'di bshad pa thos nas thong // zhes bya ba ni 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang // da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang gsungs te/ de bzhin rgyal po bzhi po rnams 
380a1(rgyud 'grel): rdzas kyang dmachog srung ste/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjid kyis ldog can 'byung po de rnams kyis kyang gzhan la 'tshe ba spangs pa'o// lha dang lha min rlung lha dang / dri za dang ni gdon gyi ma/ zhes bya ba ni/ 
380a2(rgyud 'grel): zhe sdang dang gti mug gis sems can thams cad la gnod par byas te/ rwa yang rig sngags sdi ga zi brjid dam pa thob pa'o// 'byung po dang ni sha za dang / de bzhin gnod sbyin srin po rnams/ zhes bya ba ni/ ser sna dang / 
380a3(rgyud 'grel): gi sdeng dang / 'dod chags kyi sems can rnams pa 'tsha bar byas te/ de yang rig thugs kyi dmod mo'i 'jigs pas gnod mi nus pa'o// kun tu zhugs shing kun tu g.yos// skrag cing kun tu rabatu 'phrul/ 
380a4(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di'i gzi brjid dang / spobs kyis sa lan drug drug yos te/ de bzhin du lhas chen po bco brgyad blang ba'o// kun tu zhugs shing kun tu g.yos pa n-i sha dma' ste/ nub mtho ba'o// 
380a5(rgyud 'grel): da ga mas// phyogs phyogs sa bzh-i // k+ko gas shi phyogs rnams gta pa'o// debs kyang wAg cang ku du 'dul ba ste/ yun shud drug pas+ho// gad dang gad par byed 
380a6(rgyud 'grel): rnams// ldang zhing rab tuphas par 'gyur// zhes bya ba ni/ sdig can bdud kyi rigs kyi 'byung po rnams ni/ sems can la gnod par byed pas rang pham ste/ sdug bsngal chen po thob cing rig sngags kyi dmad mos 
380a7(rgyud 'grel): 'joms pa'o// sa bzhi dgakyang rab tu g.yos// skye bo che yang sgrogs par byed/ ces bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi gzi brjod kyis/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa g.yo zhing 'byung po 
380a8(rgyud 'grel): rnams grag par byad/ si de yang nga ba'i dang pa la dang rjem bu'i mad 'gyu ro// sa rab tu 'byung zhes bya'o// yi dgas dang nabral bu la rnams// snang ba'i gdan ne brtag byed pa'o// zhes bya ba ni/ 'bru 
380b1(rgyud 'grel): po de rnams kyang sems can drag por gnod par byas te/ gzhan gang gis kyang mi thub cing de'i gnyen po lta bu rig sngags kyi rgyal mo yin te/ mdo 'di dag ni thos gyur na/ 'jigs pa drag po 'bebs par 'gyur// 
380b2(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ gnod byed sdang ba'i sems dang ldan pa dang sdig pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang / sems can gyi srog 'dod pa rnams// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'dis brlag par byed pa'o// sangs 
380b3(rgyud 'grel): rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/ dad pa'i gnod sbyin gang yin pa// zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po byang chub sems dpa'i rigs yod de/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dang / chos dang dge 
380b4(rgyud 'grel): 'dun la dga' zhing 'jig rten gyi khams rnams skyong bar byed de/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa bsrung zhing sems can rnams kyi don byed pa'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di la rjes su yi rang 
380b5(rgyud 'grel): zhing rig sngags kyi bka' las mi 'da' ba'o// de dag mgu zhing yid dga' nas// legs par rjes su yi rang ngo // zhes bya ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i rigs 'byur de rnams kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal
380b6(rgyud 'grel): lo bsil ba'i tshal gyi cho sel dga' zhing snga nas kyang chos la dad pa yod de/ de ltar dad pa kun tu rab tu skyes nas dga' bas rab tu dga' ste/ chos la mchod pa legs par mchod nas/ de rnams kyi rjes su 
380b7(rgyud 'grel): yi rang ngo // zhes bya ba'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi 'byung po dam la btags pa'i gnas skabs te brgyad pa'o// // de nas zhes bya ba ni/ 'byung po dam la btags pa'i de nas
380b8(rgyud 'grel): so// rgyal po chen po bzhi par snang las babs nas zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po de yang chos la rab tu dga' ste/ bcom ldan 'das la snga nas kyang dad pa skyes te/ de ltar yang rab tu skyes nas bcom ldan 
381a1(rgyud 'grel): 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin pa'o// bcom ldan 'das gal ba der dang sde/ lpags nas zhes bya ba ni/ so so rang gi 'od zer yang 'phags te/ bsil ba tshal gyi chos 'di la dad pa yang / 
381a2(rgyud 'grel): nas yang du skyes te/ de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das la yang de bzhin no// de bas na rgyal po chen po bzhis kyang legs lhags pa zhes bya ba'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ zhes bya ba ni rgyal
381a3(rgyud 'grel): po chen po bzhi rab tu dga' nas zhabs kyi pad+ma la gus pas phyag 'tshal ba'o// thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal zhing zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar pus 
381a4(rgyud 'grel): mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/ de nas bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyar ba'o// gros mthun pa dang tshigs mthun pa dang skad mthun par/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// zhes bya ba ni/ 
381a5(rgyud 'grel): dbyangs gcig tu byas shing rgyal po chen po rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi chos la gus pa'i sems kyis bcom ldan 'das la zhu ba 'bul ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bsil ba tshal gyi mdo chen po 
381a6(rgyud 'grel): 'di ni zhes bya ba ni/ bsrung ba dang / skyob pa dang / sred pa dang sems can thams cad la rig sngags kyi gsang sngags kyis khyab ste/ sdang ba'i sems zhi bar byed pa 'khor ba rnams bcom zhing yang dag pa'i 
381a7(rgyud 'grel): ye shes kyi lam bstan pa'o// rgyal po chen po bzhis zhabs la phyag bgyi ba dang / zhes bgyi ba ni gus par bya ba phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po chen po bzhis rang yang srung zhing ngag gis 'don pa dang / yid kyis bzazung
381a8(rgyud 'grel): ba dang / lus kyi bcang bar byas te/ rig sngags 'di yang btags nas kyang / ngan song gsum du mi 'gro zhing byang chub kyi lam bstan pa'o// 'khor bzhi po rnams la srung ba dang zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong ngam dani rma 
381b1(rgyud 'grel): ma'am/ dge snyen nam dge snyen ma la sogs pa'i sems can rnams yang bsrung ba'i dam pa'o// yongs su slob pa dang zhes bya ba ni/ gzhan las kyang khyad par du 'phags te/ zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur zhing 
381b2(rgyud 'grel): sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba'o// gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams 'joms pa lags so// zhes bya ba ni ma rungs pa bdud kyi rigs rnams kyi 'byung po de yang 'joms shing rig 
381b3(rgyud 'grel): sngags dang gsang sngags kyi dmod mos rlag par byed pa'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po chen po bzhi dag gis kyang bcom ldan 'das la rig sngags kyi 'dra bar byed pa ste/ de yang 'jo 
381b4(rgyud 'grel): bzhi la rtag tu srung bar byed pa'o// dge slong dang dge slong ma dang / dge snyen nam dge snyen pa de dag gis kyang zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das la rtag tu 'khor ba'i 'khor bzhi yin te/ rig sngags kyis kyang de dag 
381b5(rgyud 'grel): srung zhing bar chod bsal te rtag tu bde ba thob pa'o// bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di bzung bar bgyi brjod par rab kyi kun chub par bgyi'o// zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'di 
381b6(rgyud 'grel): dur khrod chen po yi dgas dang 'thung po rnams kyi gnyen po// mi'i sems can rnams kyi ston pa/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams skyong bar byed pa ste/ 'khor bzhi po dag gis kyang 'chang ba 
381b7(rgyud 'grel): dang / bzung nas kyang sems can thams cad la bstan nas/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral bar byed pa ste/ 'khor bzhi po dag gi kyang lus ngag yid bzung ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das zhes bya ba ni/ 
381b8(rgyud 'grel): rgyal po bzhis kyang bcom ldan 'das la yang zhu ba 'bul ba'o// dge slong ngam dge slong ma'am/ dge snyen nam dge snyen ma gang la la zhes bya ba ni/ 'khor bzhi po dag dang sems can thams cad la bsrung zhing sdug/ 
382a1(rgyud 'grel): bsngal thams cad dang 'bral bar byed de/ 'di'i lam nas kyang byang chub kyi tshogs bstan pa'o// bdag srung ba dang bdag sra ba dang / gzhan sra ba'i slad du zhes bya ba ni/ gang zag rig sngags 
382a2(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba dang / nyon mongs pa'i sems can rnams srung ba ste/ byams pa dang snying rje'i lam nas bdag gis kyang sems can gyi don la bson par bya zhes bya ba'o// bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di 'dzin pa 
382a3(rgyud 'grel): dang / 'chang ba dang brjod pa dang / kun chub par bgyid pa de la ni/ zhes bya ba ni stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin/ thabs shes rab gnyis su med pa ste/ chos dang longs spyod dang sprul pa'i sras thub pa ste/ de bzhin du 
382a4(rgyud 'grel): 'di la gus pa byas pa'i gang zag ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang 'bral ba'o// gnod sbyin dang sri bu nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams nyen 'khor yang gnas par mi 'gyur na/ gnod par bgyid pa lta ga la 
382a5(rgyud 'grel): sems lags zhes bya ba ni/ mthu che zhing gzi brjed che ba ste/ dpa' ba stobs che zhing gzi brjid che ba ste/ dpa' ba stobs che zhing sems can rnams la byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa ste/ gang zag 'di 
382a6(rgyud 'grel): 'chang ba la da lta'i rkyen lta ci smos te/ tshe phyi ma la yang de bzhin no// de gang du mtshan gcig tsam gnas pa deng yang shes bya ba ni rig sngags kyis rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 'di yang grong ngam gro khyer ram grong rdal 
382a7(rgyud 'grel): lam/ ljongs la sogs pa la yi ge gcig tsam yang dag par gyur na/ de bzhin du 'thung po 'am/ yi dwags la sogs pa gnod par mi 'gyur ste/ grong de na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la yang zag thug/ 
382a8(rgyud 'grel): dang rtsod pa dang rims drag po'i nad mi 'byung ste/ gzhan gyi dang rgyal po'i chad pa yang mi 'byung ngo // gnod sbyin dang srin po nas gnod par bgyid pa'i bar rnams nyen 'khor du yang gnod par mi 'gyur zhes bya ba ni/ 
382a9(rgyud 'grel): sa yang sa sa ma mas ma sa sa pas ma mams samasas bya ba la mal 'apag pa ma sa mob ma tsha po 'i ga pa ma pa pa lam sa masams sa pam pa sa sa sas ma sa ma mam mas pa yas sam mas ma sa las 
382b1(rgyud 'grel): mtshad de yang lus la btags pa'am/ yid kyis 'dzin pa'am ngag dragadon pa 'am/ rgyal mtshan gyi rtse ma'am/ mchadang rten gyi rje mo la btags nas/ de thos pa dang de mthong ba tsam gyis de'i 'od zer gyi gzi brjid 
382b2(rgyud 'grel): kyis kyang grags kyi bar tshun chad du yang nye bar mi nus so// de gang du rtag tu gnas pa de lha spos kyang ci 'tshal lags zhes bya ba ni/ rig sngags 'di yang 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnams kyis
382b3(rgyud 'grel): rjes su yi rang zhing gsungs pa'o// de bzhin du ma 'ongs pa rnams kyis kyang gsung bar 'jar ba'o// da ltar yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs kyis shAkya thub pas/ sems can gyi don la gsungs pa ste/ gnyis pa'i 
382b4(rgyud 'grel): sems med cing / nges par the tshom med do zhes bya ba'o// btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang mi ma lags pa'i gnod pas thebs pa'i mdun du bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di brjod na zhes bya ba ni/ yul 'khor 
382b5(rgyud 'grel): bsrung ba dang byad dang ro langs kyi nad kyis btab pa dang bsgoms nyes dang thazhis la sogs pa gso ba dang / bkra mi shis pa ba kra shis par byed pa dang / gzhan yang de la sogs pa thams cad la sngags te/ gzhan 
382b6(rgyud 'grel): yang mkha' la rgyu ba'i yi dgas rnams bzlog pa'i cho ga yang dag par bshad par bya'o// lcib chu dang bsres pa'i sa// dkyil 'khor yang dag zug par bya// nad pa'i mdun du yang dag tu// de bzhin gzhan yang mkhas 
382b7(rgyud 'grel): pas shes// sa tshon ldani yang dag tu// rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor mdzes par bris// dbus sa sna tshogs pad+ma ma// phyir ma rdo rje ba ste// de phyir 'khor lo sna tshogs rtsibs// de phyir lha rnams zlum por bri// de yi byi 
382b8(rgyud 'grel): grub zhi la// lha rnams pad+ma d+marAgA'i mdog/ grub ni sgo bzhig pa brgyad// dAr bzhi yis yang dge brgyan// dra ba la sogs brgyan pa la// rin chen sna ba na gzhal yas 'ang // gdugs dang bdan de bzhin brgyan// mdzes

388a7(rgyud 'grel): 'khor rnams dur khrod bsil ba'i tshal du 'ongs te/ de dag gis kyang glags tshol ba ste/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi gzi brjid kyis/ glags tshol mi nus par gnas pa'o// nga'i rkang pa 
388a8(rgyud 'grel): la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ zhes bya ba ni/ rgyal po bzhi dang 'byung po de rnams kyis/ bskor ba lan gsum byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das la gus par byas nas/ rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal 
388b1(rgyud 'grel): la rjes su yi rang ba'o// phyogs gcig tu 'khod do zhes bya ba ni rgyal po bzhi dang / 'byung po thams cad phyogs gcig tu 'khod/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ rgyal po chen po bzhis nga'i thad du bsil 
388b2(rgyud 'grel): ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di brjod nas dong ngo zhes bya ba ni/ bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor bzhi la bka' stsal zhing / rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba'i tshal gyi don yang dag par bstan pa'o// khyed kyis/ 
388b3(rgyud 'grel): de dag legs par rab tu nyen la yid la zung zhig dang / ngas bshad do zhes bya ba ni/ sdug bsngal thams cad dang bral ba/ stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin no// rig pa mthar thug pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
388b4(rgyud 'grel): sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsungs pa'o// btsun pa de ltar 'tshal lo zhes gsol to zhes bya ba ni/ dge slong la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams bzhis/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus pa'o// dge slong rnam 
388b5(rgyud 'grel): kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa mnyan nas zhes bya ba ni/ de rnams kyis kyang rig sngags kyi rgyal mo 'di la rjes su yi rang zhing / 'chang ba dang / klog pa dang / bsgom pa la sogs pa 
388b6(rgyud 'grel): byas pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyis zhes bya ba la sogs pa ni/ chad pa med cing tshig la yang ba/ khyab pa ni nam mkha' bzhin du khyab pa/ rig pa phyi nang yang dag par bstan pa/ thabs shes rab 
388b7(rgyud 'grel): gnyis su med pa'o// bcom ldan 'das kyi de skad ces bka' stsal nas zhes bya ba ni/ gzhon nu sgra gcan 'dzin gyi sems can thams cad kyi don la bsil ba'i tshal gyi mdo chen po 'di rgyas par/ 
388b8(rgyud 'grel): bka' stsal te/ de yang bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das nas kun dga' bos sdus pa'o// dge slong dang zhes bya ba ni sgra gcan 'dzin la sogs pa nyis brgya lnga bcu'o// dge slong ma dang / 
389a1(rgyud 'grel): zhes bya ba ni/ zags 'dzin pa la sogs pa'o// dge bsnyed dang shes bya ba ni rgyal po pa skyes dpral sogs pa'o// dge bsnyen ma de dag yi rangs te zhes bya ba ni/ ma skyes 
389a2(rgyud 'grel): dgra' btsun po la sogs pa de dag gis kyang rig sngags kyi bral ma 'di la rjes su yi rang ba'o// gnan yang bral ba chen pa bzhi dang / sum cun gsum gyi lharnams dang / gnas gtsang ba'i 
389a3(rgyud 'grel): rnams dang / gzhan yang lU dang / lha ma yin la sogs pas rjes su yi rang ba'o// rig sngags kyi rgyal mo bsil ba tshal gyi mda'i 'bum 'grel/ srab dpon mkhas pa chen po las 
389a4(rgyud 'grel): kyis rdo rjes mdzad pa rdzogs so// sprin lam stobs kyi zong khyer ma khyer btsas// mkhas par grags pa'i mi mnyam jirje'i sas// skye ba lnga bcu 
389a5(rgyud 'grel): spangs pa'i 'bras bu yis// rig pa'i gnas lha dgal pa rmongs shing // gsang sngags gdams pa ma lus thugs la mnga' ba can// mtshan yang ngan yang rdo rje zhes par grags/ 
389a6(rgyud 'grel): sngon gyi smo la pa dbang gis bo dayul dbus su byon// smon lam stobs kyis dam pa 'bra la'i tha mar gyur// 'jam pa bang byugs brag dmar dpal gyi bas pa yas su// rgyal ba zhud par 'apaH 
389a7(rgyud 'grel): ban+de pa'i gdungs chud sras// stagacig kyad per baphags pa lta tsam dang skyon gyis// bal shis pa zung rdo lung dkan pa ru// la ba Na zhabs nas btegs nas dpa chos 'ad bskur ba// bkur 
389a8(rgyud 'grel): ba'i bsod nams gang thob bsags pa des// bdag dang mtha' yas sems can kun// tha med byang chub myur du thob par she
